Job Description:
- Responsible for achieving the sale target set by the company
- Actively response to customer's needs through face to face, phone call and social media
- Self manage facebook campaign/content
- Act as modeling to promote ford product one needed or required by manager
- Build and grow relationship with existing potential customer
- Attend all training required by company
- Find new prospect customers and maintenance good relationship with new and existing customers
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Sales & Marketing and other related fields
- Fresh graduated students are encouraged to apply
- age 18-35 years old
- Good communicate and problem solve
- Able to use computer (Ms. Office)
- Understand and share knowledge about the industrial markets and competitor’s information
- Clear on product knowledge and internal process
- Follow the standard customer service and customer satisfaction guideline
- Other tasks assigned by direct manager
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Sothea Thannarith (Mr.)  070555494 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 070555494

Job Description:
Job responsibilities and duties:
Internal/External Interactions: 
• Closer relationship with dealership divisions of RMA Cambodia and other dealers and assets suppliers
• Planning and Daily visits new customers\
• More regular, planned, and structured visit to provincial customers 
• Joint Target to improve groups performance in sales, penetration, and profit
• Joint calls to large Target fleet customers
• Weekly meeting with Lending Manager/Senior Collection Officer/Senior Loan Recovery Officer about default customers and review previous months performance
• Weekly meeting with Lending Manager to review previous months performance
• Collect quality applicant rather than quantity by doing careful credit assessment for approval request
• Train and coach sales team of dealers about financing 
• Ensure the effective communication maintained among team and other departments
• Report and update to the Dealer sale team about the application status
• Find out key potential growth of sale and recommend this to management
• Support recovery team and collection team if needed 
• Manage and delegate tasks to lending coordinator 
• Attend trainings as required by the management
Job Requirement:
Job requirements and qualifications:
Education/Certification:
• Bachelor or Master degree in business management or related field
• At least two years of experience in the similar position
Knowledge, Skill, and Experience:
ESSENTIAL:
• Multi tasks and strong organizational skill
• Good in problem solving
• Analytical skills
OTHERS:
• Creative, result-driven, able to take initiative.
• Business Management Ethic
• Strong team player
• Good in problem solving

Job Description:
- To research and develop creative concept for all ford merchandise and other promotion material up to date.
- work with wise range of media including photography and computer-aided design.
- using graphic designed software to develop all promotion material such as brochure, leaflet, banner and others.
- Create visual materials such as motor show & roadshow booths, product display, showroom dress-up & decoration for marketing project.
- Using Sophisticated software to create graphic and animation for using in media as Tv commercial broadcasting, motion picture, social digital media, product launch and other marketing event purpose.
-  Presenting finalized idea and concepts to project team.
- weekly update report and status of artwork/ design progress
- Handling with others task by marketing manager.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's degree in design, fine art, IT or any relate to field is plus.
- At least 3 years experience in graphic design in 2D-3D and video editing.
- Familiarity with design software such as Photoshop, Illustrator, Lightroom, Adobe Premiere, After Effects, etc.
- He/she need to go join event for concept creative and artwork ideas.
- Good communication in English
- Ability  to work methodically and meet deadlines
- Computer skill at micro-soft office, email and other social media.

Job Description: Lead and motivate staff under the Operation Support Department in order to provide reliable and consistent support to all related functions within Foreign Trade Bank of Cambodia (FTB).Manage, supervise, and oversee all offices, units and functions within the Operation Support Department including clearing services, domestic remittances, network-wide cash management, reconciliation and settlement.Work closely with other functions such as IT and Branch Network to improve process by automating from manual where possible.Develop, update, and implement the department manual, guidelines and procedures to ensure accuracy, efficiency, and compliance.Manage, supervise, and monitor cash management of all branches and provide cash transit between branches.Work with related departments to ensure that cash management and movement across the network are in line with the approved process and guidelines.Manage to ensure cash level is sufficiently maintained across the network, branches, and ATM network, and cash report is reconciled and produced as per the required process.Immediately escalate and find solution to any issues or incidents regarding with the Operation Support Department.Ensure all cash withdrawal from NBC and provide to branches on time and properly, and supervise the strong room and the daily cash transfer within the network.Solve and follow-up all issues related to cash deposit/withdrawal in clearing house.Build a good relationship with NBC and other banks.Process outgoing fulfillment, retrieval request, chargeback and other dispute activity under CSS, Visa and other scheme dispute resolution process and rules for issuing and acquiring.Verify and process all related payment and expense under Card Centre and before payment is made by banking Finance Department.Perform transaction receipt debit and credit adjustment related cardholder, merchant and other upon approval.Perform other tasks assigned by senior management.
Job Requirement: Bachelor’s Degree or MBA in Management, Finance and Banking, or related field.At least 8-year banking experience with strong leadership and track record in banking operation.Sound knowledge on local regulatory requirements.A strong desire to work in a team and deal with challenge.High attention to details and accuracy.Practical knowledge and experience in operation, operational risk, and compliance.Solid skills in planning, organizing, and problem solving.Customer centric mindset in managing the operation function
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

Job Requirement: ➢ Degree in Computer Science.➢ 1 or 2 year experience as IT Operation, System Engineer, DevOps Engineer.➢ Extensive experience in Backup and Recovery, High Availability, Disaster Recovery Plan, Cloud Technology, Container.➢ Certificate: Vmware VCA or VCP, Microsoft/Linux certificate, ITIL➢ Knowledge of IT security➢ Can-Do attitude

Company Profile:
Evergreen Logistics Corp is a member of the Evergreen Group established by Dr. Yung-Fa Chang on 1 September 1968 in Taiwan. We provide freight forwarding, logistics operations, customs brokerage, warehousing and distribution, project shipment, advanced IT platforms and customized total solutions － all with value-added services.

ELC have 42 own branches offices and have a very intensive network around the world. The experienced and professional team of our own offices in Taiwan, Mainland China, Southeast Asia , India & United States as well as agents in North East Asia, the Europe, the Mediterranean, Australia, and Africa provides our valuable business partner with the most cost-effective and time-critical solutions. Via a single platform, our worldwide IT solutions provide real-time data to customers wherever they are in the world.

job title: ជំនាញការក្នុងស្រុក
position: ជំនាញការក្នុងស្រុក
Job Description:
ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព សក្ដិសិទ្ធភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អ.គ.ហ. មានត្រូវការជ្រើសរើស ជំនាញការក្នុងស្រុក រៀបចំក្របខណ្ឌ និងយន្តការតាមដាននិងវាយតម្លៃលើការអនុវត្តគោលនយោបាយនិងយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រអភិវឌ្ឍន៍វិស័យហិរញ្ញវត្ថុមិនមែនធនាគារ ចំនួន០១រូប ដែលមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិដូចខាងក្រោម៖
-	មានសញ្ញាបត្របរិញ្ញាបត្រជាន់ខ្ពស់ផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច និង ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ, គោលនយោបាយសាធារណៈ ឬ សញ្ញាបត្រជំនាញប្រហាក់ប្រហែល,
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងហោច ៥ឆ្នាំ ពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការងាររៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាព និងផែនការថវិកា 
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងហោច ៥ ឆ្នាំលើការងារតាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ ការងារសិក្សាស្រាវជ្រាវលើវិស័យសេដ្ឋកិច្ច និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬ គោលនយោបាយហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
-	មានសមត្ថភាពល្អក្នុងការសរសេររបាយការណ៍ជាភាសាខ្មែរ និងភាសាអង់គ្លេសស្ទាត់ជំនាញ និង 
-	មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការធ្វើបទបង្ហាញ ។
Job Requirement:
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងដាក់ឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប សម្រាប់ទាក់ទងសាកសួរពត៌មានដោយមាន (e-mail address, telephone or fax numbers)។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួង-ស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច (Email)  ឬ នៅអាស័យដ្ឋានខាងក្រោមរាល់ម៉ោងធ្វើការយ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃចន្ទ  ១រោច ខែមាឃ ឆ្នាំខាល ចត្វាស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៦ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី០៦ ខែកុម្ភៈ ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។

job title: Internal Audit Manager ($1000-$1500) Boeng Keng Kang
position: Internal Audit Manager ($1000-$1500) Boeng Keng Kang
Job Description: • Establish and implementation of audit framework, policies, procedures to comply with applicable laws and prakas • Audits the company’s financial records, statements, and reports, verifying accuracy and consistency.• Audits the company’s information systems, assessing compliance with data security and storage requirements.• Frequently reviews internal controls, policies, and procedures for effectiveness.• Prepare and present audit finding report and recommendations to improve operations to Mgt and BoD in the monthly and quarterly basic • Implement internal and checking policy, procedures and ensure compliance respective SOP• Verify and assess that appropriate controls or measures are implemented and practiced by the audited.• Investigate and search for fundamental reason of irregularities and errors• Conduct regular field visit as per internal plan including investigate frauds and staff compliants • Periodically monitor and check monthly/weekly reports to National Bank of Cambodia (NBC) and other regulatory reports • Perform testing over internal control system of JCF (i.e. Compliance Function) to ensure a good governance and effectively  • Prepare and submit regulatory report to regulators (i.e. Annual Internal Control Report to NBC) • Assist external auditors for preparing annual audited financial statement for NBC • Assist accounting team and compliance on tax matters   •Assist HR/Admin on some admin work (i.e. register or update company information to Authorities) •Work with other departments in the company to deal with problems and making risk protection procedures• Performs other related duties as assigned by the Mgt and BoD

job title: មេជាងជំនាញផ្នែកសក់ (Salon Technician Leader)
position: មេជាងជំនាញផ្នែកសក់ (Salon Technician Leader)
Job Description:
** Scope of Position / Business Context
បេក្ខជនដែលមានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិតជាមួយនឹងសក់សម្រាប់ការរចនាសម្រាប់មុខតំណែងជាជាងកាត់សក់។ ភារកិច្ចរបស់ជាងកាត់សក់រួមមានការប្រឹក្សាអតិថិជនលើជម្រើសស្ទីលសក់ អភិវឌ្ឍក្រុមហាងកែសម្ផស្សឱ្យយល់អំពីផលិតផលដែលសមស្របជាមួយប៉ុស្តិ៍សាឡន ពិពណ៌នាអំពីអត្ថប្រយោជន៍នៃផលិតផលថែរក្សាសក់ផ្សេងៗគ្នា បញ្ចុះបញ្ចូលអតិថិជនឱ្យទិញផលិតផលលក់រាយរបស់ពួកគេ និងបន្តធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពលើនិន្នាការម៉ូដសក់ចុងក្រោយបំផុត និងវិធីសាស្រ្តធ្វើរចនាប័ទ្មសក់។ លើសពីនេះទៀត ជាងកាត់សក់ត្រូវតែជាអ្នកជំនាញ "មនុស្ស" ដើម្បីទាក់ទាញ និងរក្សាអតិថិជនឱ្យបានយូរ។ នេះទាមទារជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងការសន្ទនា។.

** Main Duties / Responsibilities
• ការពិពណ៌នាអំពីផលិតផលថែរក្សាសក់ផ្សេងៗគ្នា និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍របស់វា។
• កក់សក់ កាត់ លាបពណ៌ និងបន្លិចសក់។
• អនុវត្តការព្យាបាលស្បែកក្បាល។
• ដើរតួជាអ្នកលក់ដើម្បីលក់ផលិតផលលក់រាយផលិតផលថែរក្សាសក់របស់អតិថិជន។
• ការកសាងទំនាក់ទំនងផ្ទាល់ខ្លួនជាមួយអតិថិជន ដើម្បីធានាបាននូវការមកលេងវិញ។
• ប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់នូវស្តង់ដារសុវត្ថិភាព និងអនាម័យនៃហាងកែសម្ផស្ស។
• បន្តធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពលើនិន្នាការម៉ូដសក់ និងវិធីធ្វើរចនាប័ទ្ម។
• រៀបចំផែនការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងសម្ភារៈសម្រាប់បណ្តុះបណ្តាលគ្រូបង្គោលនៃមជ្ឈមណ្ឌលបណ្តុះបណ្តាល
• ត្រូវប្រាកដថាកាលវិភាគនៃការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលសមស្របទៅនឹងកាលវិភាគអាជីវកម្ម និងថ្នាក់
• ចូលរួមប្រជុំប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ជាមួយក្រុម
• អនុវត្តការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជាប្រចាំនៅក្នុងហាង
• បង្កើតផែនការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងប្រតិទិន
• ផ្តល់មតិកែលម្អ និងការបង្វឹកឱ្យជាប់លាប់
• រក្សាឱ្យទាន់ពេលជាមួយនឹងឧស្សាហកម្ម និងនិន្នាការទីផ្សារចុងក្រោយបំផុត។
Job Requirement:
• បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់វិទ្យាល័យ ឬការបញ្ចប់ GED ។
• អាជ្ញាប័ណ្ណពីសាលាកែសម្ផស្ស។
• បទពិសោធន៍ពីមុនជាជាងកាត់សក់ ឬជាងធ្វើពណ៌។
• ក្ដារលាយធំទូលាយនៃបច្ចេកទេសរចនាប័ទ្ម និងពណ៌។
• ជំនាញជាមួយដែកក្តៅ ម៉ាស៊ីនក្រឡុក និងម៉ាស៊ីនសម្ងួតសក់។
• ជំនាញអន្តរបុគ្គលល្អ
• ការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អដោយពាក្យសំដី។
• អាចបត់បែនពេលវេលាធ្វើការបាន តាមការរៀបចំរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
• ផ្នត់គំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងសក់ដ៏ល្អសម្រាប់ការរចនា

job title: Senior Risk Officer ($600-$800) Boeng Keng Kang
position: Senior Risk Officer ($600-$800) Boeng Keng Kang
Job Description: 	Support the Chief Risk Officer in the evolution and management of institution Risk Management Program and Model Risk Management Program.	Assist in the enterprise risk management strategy that safeguards the institution, customers, investors and reputation.	 Proactively manages and advises the institution on potential risks, assure objectives are achieved and disciplines are implemented to drive continuous improvement.	Develop reporting to executive management and the Board Risk & Compliance committee regarding risk management policies, processes and execution.	Develop and implement changes as needed to minimize risks as well as improve internal and external risk characteristics across all business lines.	Provide support and training to build awareness within the institution, achieve growth targets and to protect the institution from future exposure.	Evaluate risk events and/or propose mitigation plans to more senior levels, when appropriate.	Analyze qualitative and quantitative data to develop process efficiencies
Job Requirement: 	Bachelor in Math, Economics, Accounting, or Finance or other relevance 	At least 2-3 years experiences working in BFIs 	has knowledge and understand risk management for MFI	Be able to lead, initiative and implementation of risk management process 	Be able to work independently, under pressure and multi working culture 	Process improvement and technology skills, a plus	Excellent interpersonal skills	Strong verbal/written communication and presentation skills	Must be able to work independently and set goals/prioritize, focus, and have time management skills- Location : Boeng Keng Kang - Salary Rank : $400-$600- Working Days : Mon-Fri (8am-5pm) and Sat (8am-12pm)

Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR HR Manager 010714813 kholel@chamroeun.com #425, St. 271, Sangkat Toul Tompong II, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 010714813

job title: Sales System Operation and Science Specialist
position: Sales System Operation and Science Specialist
Job Description:
Operation:
- Master Data, Promotion and Pricing, KPIs setup in system
- Level-1 support to commercial (sales) systems, provide functional support to users
- Preparing commercial (sales) system user functional manual
- Perform timely facts delivery with aligned accuracy level on sales master data governance, all reports and dashboards. (i.e. Distributors master, customer master, contract master, sales structure, promotion…) 
- Perform compliance standard operation procedure service level agreement timely/properly follow charter of approval.
- Communicate and drive changes, if necessary, to improve data collection productivity.
- Perform quality management and administrate functional set up on master data, outlets, distributors, sales journey route plan, sales call card, promotion, and reporting on a day-to-day basis.
- Perform other tasks related to the position and assigned by manager

Analytical:
- Support sales initiative business cases study and process of execution.
- Perform data sanity checks from trade and challenging the answer the trade in the purpose to ensure quality of data and correct execution.
- Liaise business requirement, change request, system issue between user and technical IT to troubleshoot problem or efficiency improvement.

Communication:
- Present actionable information and insights to team members and management.
- Answer questions about delivered results/ reports through with strong facts and discipline.

Innovation:
- Continuously develop and present innovative ideas based on data driven approach in order to improve current business practices
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Accounting, Finance, Economics, or similar.
- Advance in Microsoft Excel.
- Experience in Microsoft Office applications (Power BI, office 365, Powerpoint, Internet and email)

- Intellectual curiosity and a passion for data and analytics
- Strong desire to take initiative; ability to deal with ambiguity and competing objectives

Job Description:
Purpose of the position:
The Technicians most important task is to ensure that the installations are made professionally and to our customer’s satisfaction, that the equipment are serviced at regular, pre-determined intervals by a professional and dedicated team of technicians. The overall goal of the Technical team, under the leadership of the National Technical Service Manager is to ensure that every single Carlsberg Cambodia Drink served is fresh and meets the consumers’ expectations.

Core Responsibilities:
- Train customers in outlet training module for customers (pouring perfect training, troubleshooting etc.) 
- Performing and using the procedures on installation, sanitation, and trouble shooting. 
- Report to NTSM when ST has to go to outlets and travel for the service of outlet complain and after his return from visit. 
- Need to follow the detail instructions by NTSM/TSM/TSs
  1) Drink system installation and best Practices 
  2) Fault Finding trouble shooting 
  3) Sanitation service by routine. 
  4) Service and maintenance in outlet/store 
   - At sanitation time and in store, cleaning of equipment in a hygienic way 
   - Cleaning all the elements of the counters, drip tray, side panels of cooler and pythons 
   in a mild soap solution, then drying everything with a clean cloth. This also includes 
   ensuring that the cooler has full ventilation capacity and the condenser is not full of 
   dust. Likewise for post mix equipment. 
    - Cleaning and polishing of equipment upon return from outlet or event.
- To achieve a quality and efficiency KPI model for the Technicians by Manager.
Key Tasks Operations 
- Report for progress 
- Feedback information of the market to the immediate supervisor.
Job Requirement:
- Engineering degree 
- Fair in English Language 
- 1 yrs relevant technical experience, ideally in FMCG/beer environment, 
Effective, positive and energetic attitude 
- Ability to communicate clearly 
- Team-orientation and ability to implement the team work 
- Action-oriented, persistent and result oriented 
- Solid organizing skills
- Driving License (A)

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description:

Job Description:
Maintenance 
- Responsible to lead the equipment reliability inclusive maintenance activities at dedicated area as per Maintenance COM
- Responsible for maintenance KPI example OEE, B&D, WO creation & completion, % PM, and total maintenance cost/HL within agreed target
- Responsible for work order (WO) scoping, prioritization, quality of work order detail, distribute of work orders, and the effective follow up and closing out of work orders
- To assign work and manpower scheduling with line responsible through work order system
- To review technician skills matrix and roles from time to time
- Responsible for COM audit with maintenance manager 
- To lead line responsible and communication with production line leader for any production plan and OEE improvement 
- Implement and review WI, SMP & OPL
- To attend daily packaging PMS meeting at related area and escalate breakdown issue during maintenance PMS board
- Weekly meeting with production line leader for maintenance service windows and TBM activities
- Provide and conduct weekly performance evaluation and plan for improvement by RCA or advanced problem solving 
- To carry the overhaul planning, manpower scheduling, spare part list, and review as per COM 
- Troubleshoot and attend for any breakdown even off office hour
- Well maintain all maintenance documents and records system
- To contact OEM for any downtime and spare part detail 
- workshop management

Quality 
- Practice GMP, understand HACCP process and food safety risk
- Apply toolbox hygiene standard and workshop area cleanliness
- To monitor/improve rejection from line within agreed rate which reduce wastage
- Support QC for quality activities

CE 
- Leading and participating in various maintenance improvement project based on Lead TPM
- Ensures ideas of continues improvement are captures
- Update any new ideas into work instructions, OPL and SMP
- Key drive implementation of Lead TPM activities example 5S, Gemba Kaizen, PMS and problem solving at maintenance area
- Support production and maintenance for AM, PM and SMED
Job Requirement:
1. Bachelor/ Engineering degree in mechanical, process engineering, electrical engineering, or relevant areas.
2. Knowledge of maintenance standards and maintenance system
3. English (spoken and written) – an advantage.
4. Willing to learn and drive for results
5. Good interpersonal skill, able to communicate, work together to all level and empowering people
6. Innovative in problem solving
7. Basic technological skill: Microsoft Office software like Excel, Outlook, Word, PowerPoint, and more
8. Able to work under pressure

Job Description:
• Provide support to Production Manager in collecting and providing all the production data to determine overall and individual performances, estimating and following up the production capacity in lines with the plan, quality of all the related sections and theirs workers and reporting any variances and support Production Manager in developing plans to mitigate the issues.
• Support Production Manager in driving Continuous Improvement projects.
• To cooperate with other supervisors in the production department in managing, balancing, training the labor force to maintain the company's production schedule and quality.
• Continuously strive to raise standards of housekeeping in the production area. Support implementation of 6S methodology.
• Should be aware of problem-solving tools and should practice Corrective Action Preventive Action approach in problem solving.
• To create scientific, plan, reporting charts and other necessary diagrams for keeping in record and reporting of productivity.
• Support Production Manager to set the procedure and instruction for the sections as required so that the workers can follow.
• To comply with the health and safety procedure and regulation during the working time.
• To obey all the machine operation manual, company's facilities maintenance, and protection regulation.
• To find out in advance any equipment and production issues to have soon action plan to prevent any serious problem.
• To develop necessary reports and reporting systems in order to record and save all the production data for productivity / quality/ cost analysis. Use the same data to provide feedbacks to workers about their productivity and to manage various production steps with the aim to ensuring and reporting exactly the section's productivity, production cost as well as quality.
• To work closely with other support functions in particular HR, Engineering, Purchase departments towards developing effective feedback loop with objective of improving effectiveness.
• Support production manager to prepare the target chart for trainees and polishers following the company policy. Record
properly the actual stone produced by trainees and polishers, produce the monthly report and submit to production manager and relevant persons as require by the company
• Taking minute of meeting in production or as instruct by manager.
• Keep record of stock and make purchase plans for the necessary tools, equipment and consumable.
• Support Production Manager in tracking budget for the Production and reporting any abnormality and developing action plan for the same.
• Execute other tasks/project as assign by manager.
Job Requirement:
• Strong background in manufacturing environments with experience of logistical and administrative planning and execution
• Excellent computer skills.
• A least three years supervisory experience with good leadership skills.
• Excellent spoken English and good English writing ability.
• Proven track record in the implementation and administration of stock control systems
• Experience in diamond polishing techniques and terminology
• Experience in stock control philosophies and best practices

* Working Days: 5 days per week (MON-FRI)
* Other benefits:
- Breakfast and Lunch is provided free
- Holiday Bonus
- Insurance (NSSF and FORTE 24/24)
- Annual basic increment
- Opportunity to grow
* Salary Range
- Negotiable (Upon experiences)
- If possible, mention the expect salary in the application

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
Raffles Medical Cambodia are looking for a full-time nurse to deliver a high standard and quality of professional nursing care to all patients or clients at Raffles Medical Clinic in Phnom Penh. The incumbent is also expected to work collaboratively with the team and other colleagues to address the needs of patients and other stakeholders, according to specified policies and practices compliant with Raffles Medical and national
requirements.

Key Responsibilities
- Provide the highest possible level of nursing care to all patients consistent with international standards
- Take and monitor vital signs of patients and check for any irregularities in their conditions
- Prioritize health problems and intervene appropriately to assist the patient in complex, urgent or emergency situations, including initiation of effective emergency care
- Maintain and process patients’ records and report patients’ conditions to doctors/physicians
- Help patients to get ready for tests and other examinations
- Implement patient care program
- Clean wounds and cuts
- Advise, support and, where appropriate, administer vaccinations for patients
- Attend various meetings, workshops, and training as required to maintain updated on skills and knowledge of best nursing practices
- Implement in compliance with nursing policies and procedures
- Utilize and demonstrate sensitive communication styles, to ensure patients are fully informed and consent to treatment
- Communicate effectively with patients and caregivers, recognizing the need for alternative methods of communication to overcome different levels of understanding, cultural background and preferred ways.
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- Strong understanding of nursing process.
- Strong understanding of emergency protocols and nursing actions during an emergency
- Attention to details and problem-solving approach.
- Computer literacy.
- Customer focused with good customer-handling skills.
- Ability to interact with various cultures and all levels in a multinational environment.
- Ability to analyze / solve problems in a fast paced environment.
- Multi tasking capabilities to accommodate a multi-unit organization.
- Able to demonstrate a professional manner at all times
- Able to demonstrate friendly, tactful attitude and empathy to patients.
- Will demonstrate knowledge in all aspects of nursing and technical ability to operate all medical equipment.
- Will demonstrate good team work with other staff.
- Will demonstrate punctuality and good attendance.

Required Competencies
- Physically, emotionally, and mentally fit
- Customer care
- Teamwork
- Problem solving
- Interpersonal and communication skills
- Sympathy

Required Work Experience
- At least one year’s experience working as a nurse preferable in a high dependency or emergency area.

Required Qualifications
- Nursing Diploma or Bachelor Degree or country equivalent.

Required Languages
- Proficient in English
- Khmer
Company Profile:
Raffles Medical Cambodia was opened in 1992 and is renowned for the delivery of comprehensive international standards of medical services. The staff consists of well qualified doctors and nurses who are familiar with the health dynamics in Cambodia, and are able to provide full support for expatriates, residents and tourists for day to day health management, vaccinations, medical stabilization and treatment in the event of a medical emergency.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

job title: Chinese-Speaking Clinic Doctor (Fee for Service/Part-Time Contract)
position: Chinese-Speaking Clinic Doctor (Fee for Service/Part-Time Contract)
Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
Raffles Medical Cambodia are looking for a Chinese speaking doctor to provide Fee For Service consultations
at their clinic in Phnom Penh to provide competent, patient-centered care that addresses health needs and
promotes wellness. Such care is based on latest evidence and guidelines and meets legislator requirements.
Also, to provide peer support to other doctors of the same practice.

Key Responsibilities
- Provide skilled health assessment, diagnosis and treatment services to patients
- Order diagnostic tests as needed, check and follow up the results in a timely manner
- Administer and prescribe treatment and drugs effectively
- Refer patients appropriately, in consultation with Supervisor, to other healthcare providers if their needs exceed the range of care the Clinic can provide
- Consult, collaborate and work constructively and harmoniously with colleagues to provide optimal care
- Document all care provided and education or information given to patients within their medical health record, as per professional and practice standards
- Participate in annual performance appraisal and set work and personal goals for the upcoming year
- Maintain a working knowledge of legislation that affects medical practices
- Provide services courteously and respectfully with regard to the cultural beliefs and needs of patients
- Respond openly to complaints or feedback
- Declare vested interests in services that you may be referring to
- Demonstrate a working knowledge of company policy with regard to clinic practices as described in Standard Operating Procedures and Policies
- Report incidents as required
- Protect and maintain the confidentiality of medical information or records of patients
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- Medical Skill
- Chinese and English Communication
- Computer: Word, Excel
- Customer centric.
- Customer Service Mindset
- Good Interpersonal Skill

Required Competencies
- Strong interpersonal communication
- Active listening skill
- Ability to use computerized patient management systems
- Ability to keep a cool head in emergency situations

Required Work Experience
- At least 5 year experience as a general practitioner / doctor
- Experience working in a multinational working environment

Required Qualifications
- Registration or license as a General Practitioner

Required Languages
- Chinese
- English
Company Profile:
Raffles Medical Cambodia was opened in 1992 and is renowned for the delivery of comprehensive international standards of medical services. The staff consists of well qualified doctors and nurses who are familiar with the health dynamics in Cambodia, and are able to provide full support for expatriates, residents and tourists for day to day health management, vaccinations, medical stabilization and treatment in the event of a medical emergency.

Patients will receive the same high level of service and renowned quality of care, with continued access to our panel of international and local doctors. Patients and onshore panel of doctors can also expect to benefit from access to the clinical expertise and support from the Raffles specialists in Singapore.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  023 216 911 / 012 497 761 saly_man@rafflesmedical.com No 161, Street 51 Beoung Raing, Duan Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 023 216 911 / 012 497 761

Job Description:
Overall Purpose Of The Job
Raffles Medical Cambodia are looking for several part-time/locum nurses to deliver a high standard and quality of professional nursing care to all patients or clients at Raffles Medical Clinic in Phnom Penh. The incumbents are also expected to work collaboratively with the team and other colleagues to address the needs of patients and other stakeholders, according to specified policies and practices compliant with Raffles Medical and National requirements

Key Responsibilities
- Provide the highest possible level of nursing care to all patients consistent with international standards
- Take and monitor vital signs of patients and check for any irregularities in their conditions
- Prioritize health problems and intervene appropriately to assist the patient in complex, urgent or emergency situations, including initiation of effective emergency care
- Maintain and process patients’ records and report patients’ conditions to doctors/physicians
- Help patients to get ready for tests and other examinations
- Implement patient care program
- Clean wounds and cuts
- Advise, support and, where appropriate, administer vaccinations for patients
- Attend various meetings, workshops, and training as required to maintain updated on skills and knowledge of best nursing practices
- Implement in compliance with nursing policies and procedures
- Utilize and demonstrate sensitive communication styles, to ensure patients are fully informed and consent to treatment
- Communicate effectively with patients and caregivers, recognizing the need for alternative methods of communication to overcome different levels of understanding, cultural background and preferred ways.
Job Requirement:
Required Skills and Knowledge
- Strong understanding of nursing process.
- Strong understanding of emergency protocols and nursing actions during an emergency
- Attention to details and problem-solving approach.
- Computer literacy.
- Customer focused with good customer-handling skills.
- Ability to interact with various cultures and all levels in a multinational environment.
- Ability to analyze / solve problems in a fast paced environment.
- Multi tasking capabilities to accommodate a multi-unit organization.
- Able to demonstrate a professional manner at all times
- Able to demonstrate friendly, tactful attitude and empathy to patients.
- Will demonstrate knowledge in all aspects of nursing and technical ability to operate all medical equipment.
- Will demonstrate good team work with other staff.
- Will demonstrate punctuality and good attendance.

Required Competencies
- Physically, emotionally, and mentally fit
- Customer care
- Teamwork
- Problem solving
- Interpersonal and communication skills
- Sympathy

Required Work Experience
- At least one year’s experience working as a nurse preferable in a high dependency or emergency area.

Required Qualifications
- Nursing Diploma or Bachelor Degree or country equivalent.

Required Languages
- Proficient in English
- Khmer

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Building relationships with key clients and establishing long-term business partnerships with them- Reviewing reports from managers to identify areas of improvement or new opportunities for growth in the company’s market share- Establishing and enforcing company policies regarding customer relations, sales techniques, and ethics- Developing and implementing training programs for new employees or existing staff members who are being promoted to new positions within the company- Monitoring employee performance to ensure that they are meeting goals and adhering to company policies- Managing a team of employees and ensuring that they are trained to perform their jobs effectively- Reviewing customer orders and inventory to ensure that all customer needs are being met- Conducting market research to identify new opportunities for growth in the industry- Understand customer needs and offer solutions and support- Organize and coordinate sales representatives’ schedules- Research potential leads from business directories, web searches, or digital resources- Recruit, hire and train new sales representatives- Receive and report on all sales leads- Supervise sales representatives and assistants- Answer potential customer questions and follow-up call questions- Work with the sales team when closing sales- Track weekly, monthly, and quarterly performance, and sales metrics- Meet all sales quotas and goals- Assist sales representatives and team to meet and exceed goals
Job Requirement: - A sales supervisor position typically requires a minimum of a bachelor’s degree. A degree in business, marketing, or a related field is preferred by most employers. Some sales supervisors may have an associate degree or a certificate in sales or marketing.- Sales supervisors typically have at least one or two years of experience in a sales position. They may have worked as a sales associate or a sales manager. They may have worked in a related industry, such as marketing or retail management.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: មន្រ្តីការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: មន្រ្តីការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស
Job Description: ១. ទទួលលិខិតអនុញ្ញាតសិស្ស ( អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល ឬសិស្សដាក់ច្បាប់ សងច្បាប់ដែលសុំតាមទូរសព្ទមុន ដូរវេនសិក្សា ដូរថ្នាក់ សិស្សមករៀនយឺត សិស្សសុំចេញមុនម៉ោង  សិស្សសុំមិនជិះឡានសាលាចេញ សិស្សមិនមានកាតសម្គាល់ខ្លនួន និងខុសឯកសណ្ឋានសាលា ) ក្រោយការដោះស្រាយចប់ជាមួយសិស្សរាល់បញ្ហាទាំងអស់ត្រូវបញ្ចូលក្នុងទិន្នន័យ AIS Student Affairs System ២. រៀនចំបែងចែកកាតសិស្សទៅតាមថ្នាក់នីមួយៗ និងតាមកំរិតសិក្សា ( AIS )។៣. ទទួលការស្នើសុំធ្វើកាតសម្គាល់ខ្លួនថ្មីសិស្សខ្មែរ។៤. ទទួលរាល់ឯកសារសិស្ស ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសងឯកសារជំពាក់ពេលចុះឈ្មោះចូលរៀន។៥. ដកវិញ្ញាបនបត្រថា្នក់ទី៦ ទី៩ និងទី១២ ដែលចេញដោយសាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង។៦. ដកសញ្ញាបត្រមធ្យមសិក្សាទុតិយភូមិថ្នាក់ទី១២ ដែលចែញដោយខាងក្រសួងអប់រំ។៧. សម្របសម្រួលការផ្ទេរការសិក្សារបស់សិស្ស និងសិស្សសុំដក ឬខ្ចីសៀវភៅសិក្ខាគារិក។៨. សម្របសម្រួលអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស ឬសិស្សស្នើសុំកែតម្រូវ ឈ្មោះ ថ្ងៃ ខែ ឆ្នាំកំណើត ទីកន្លែងកំណើត និងឈ្មោះឪពុក ម្តាយ។៩. ជួយសម្របសម្រួលអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស  ឬសិស្សស្នើសុំកែតម្រូវវិញ្ញាបនបត្របណ្តោះអាសន្នមធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ។១០. សម្របសម្រួលអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សសុំប្តូរលេខទូរសព្ទ និងធ្វើការផ្លាស់ប្តូរលេខទូរសព្ទរួចបញ្ចូលទៅក្នុងទិន្នន័យ AIS School Management System។១១. សម្របសម្រួលរាល់អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សដែលមានបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗមកកាន់សាលា   ឬខាងសាលាជាអ្នកណាត់ជួបជាមួយចាងហ្វាង និងអ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាសាលា។១២. ជួយសម្របសម្រួលផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស  និងអ្នកអាណាព្យបាលសិស្សក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនងសួរព័ត៌មានពីការចុះឈ្មោះចូលរៀន តម្លៃសិក្សា និងធ្វើឯកសារផ្សេងៗនៅផ្នែករដ្ឋបាលដោយសេវាកម្មត្រជាក់ចិត្ត។១៣. ជួយសម្របសម្រួលដោះស្រាយដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិកពេលបាត់សំបុត្រផ្ញើម៉ូតូ។១៤. ជួយសម្របសម្រួល និងទំនាក់ទំនងទៅកាន់មណ្ឌលសុខភាពសិស្សនៅពេលសិស្សឈឺ។១៥. សម្របសម្រួល និងចូលរួមដោះស្រាយសិស្សរៀនជំនាញ និងរៀនកីឡា។១៦. ចូលរួមសម្របសម្រួល   និងដោះស្រាយរាល់សិស្សមានបញ្ហាខុសច្បាប់វិន័យ ឬការស្នើសុំរបស់អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សមកកាន់សាលារៀន និងសិស្សបញ្ហាវត្តមាន និងទូរសព្ទច្រលំទៅផ្ទះ។១៧. ដោះស្រាយសិស្សមានបញ្ហាខុសវិន័យសេវាកម្មដឹកជញ្ចូនសិស្ស។១៨. ដោះស្រាយសិស្សដែលមានបំណងប្តូរម៉ោងឲ្យឡានដឹកចេញ ដឹកចូល ប្តូរថ្ងៃជិះឡានចេញ និងចូល ប្តូរតំបន់ជិះចេញ ឬចូល ប្តូរម៉ោងជិះឡាននៅរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ និងរៀនបំប៉ននៅពេលល្ងាច។១៩. ជួយសម្របសម្រួល និងជូនព័ត៌ដល់សិស្សនៅពេលមានការផ្លាស់ប្តូរលេខឡានសាលា។២០. ជួយដោះស្រាយណែនាំសិស្សដែលមានបញ្ហាមករៀនយឹតច្រើនដង និងចូលរៀនយឺតពេលក្រោយគ្រូមិនបានចូលក្នុងថ្នាក់ចាប់ពីម៉ោងទី២ឡើងទៅ ឬសិស្សបង្ករបញ្ហាក្នុងថ្នាក់។២១. ទំនាក់ទំនងទូរសព្ទទៅកាន់អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស   នៅពេលសិស្សមករៀនយឺតពេលរៀងរាល់៦ដង និងសិស្សមករៀនយឺតចាប់ពី៣០នាទីឡើង។​២២. ទំនាក់ទំនងទូរសព្ទទៅកាន់អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សនៅពេលសិស្សឈឺ  សិស្សមានរបួស ស្នាម សិស្សសុំចេញមុនម៉ោងសិក្សា សិស្សសុំអត់ជិះឡានសាលាចេញ និងមិនបានជិះឡានសាលាចេញដោយមិនមានការអនុញ្ញាតពីការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស។​២៣. សហការជាមួយផ្នែកដឹកជញ្ជូន និងអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងកម្មវិធីអាហារថ្ងៃត្រង់ ក្នុងការរៀបចំបញ្ជីវត្តមានសិស្សតាមឡាននិមួយៗ និងទំនាក់ទំនងទៅសិស្សឲ្យបានដឹងព័ត៌មាន។​២៤. ចេញលិខិតថ្លែងអំណរគុណរ ចំពោះបុគ្គលិកដែលរើសបានសម្ភារមានតំលៃ។​២៥. ជួយក្នុងការសង្រោះបឋមសិស្សានុសិស្ស និងបុគ្គលិក។​២៦. ទទួលការផ្ញើសម្ភារ និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស។​២៧. ទទួលចុះឈ្មោះសិស្សានុសិស្សគ្រប់កម្មវិធីរបស់សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង។​២៨. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សម្ភារសិស្សភ្លេចប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា។​២៩. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងខែសិស្សមករៀនយឺតពេលជូនប្រធានផ្នែក និងចាងហ្វាង។​៣០. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សិស្សខុសឯកសណ្ឋានសាលាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងប្រចាំខែ។​៣១. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានផ្នែកក្នុងមួយវគ្គសិក្សាម្តង។​៣២. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សរុបលុយកាតប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងសរុបរួមប្រចាំខែនីមួយៗ។​៣៣. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សិស្សផ្ទេរការសិក្សា និងដកសិក្ខាគារិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំសិក្សា។​៣៤. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍សិស្សប្រើប្រាស់ទូរសព្ទ និងគ្រឿងអេឡិចត្រូនិចប្រចាំឆ្នាំសិក្សា។​៣៥. ចូលរួមប្រជុំប្រចាំឆមាសទី១ ប្រចាំឆ្នាំរបស់សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង និងប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ ឬវគ្គសិក្សារបស់ការិយាល័យកិច្ចការសិស្ស។​៣៦. ទទួលពាក្យដាក់អាហារូបករណ៍សិស្ស ( ទៅបរទេស និងក្នុងស្រុក )។​៣៧. ទទួលការ Complain របស់សិស្សជូនទៅខាងចាងហ្វាងទទួលបន្ទុកដោះស្រាយ។ ​៣៨. បញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យលិខិតបញ្ជាក់សងឯកសារសិស្សទៅក្នុង Data AIS Student Affairs។​៣៩. បញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យក្នុងសៀវភៅកំណត់ហេតុសិស្សមានបញ្ហាចូលក្នុង AIS Student affairs។​៤០. បញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យសិស្សប្រើប្រាស់ទូរសព្ទដៃក្នុងម៉ោងរៀនចូលក្នុង AIS Student affairs។

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402 Sangkat Tomnup teuk, Khan ChomkaMorn. phnom penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
The holder will be responsible for planning, deploying and adapting marketing activities in designated the country to build CHINT brand and contribute to continuous business growth in the country, with the practical application of various marketing techniques as well as effective management of the company’s marketing resources.

** Responsibilities:
- Design and execute annual marketing strategy, build and develop CHINT brand for specific overseas regions, ensure local marketing plan in line with the company strategy. 
- Fully responsible for both internal and external communications, e.g. tradeshow, PR, media relations, collaterals and newsletter etc.
- Conduct marketing analysis, develop marketing and competitor intelligence in gaining market and consumer insights to support business operation and drive new opportunities.
- Implement and carry out strategic marketing management plan with the application of product, pricing, channel and promotion management strategies.
- Adapt and deploy various marketing campaigns together with local sales team to enhance the brand image and customer awareness with the application of traditional and new media in designated regions.
- Monitor and analyze the business performance of regional channel partners together with country managers to ensure maximum and optimum effectiveness.
- Keep good contact and connection with local existing and potential clients, initiate and support relevant training activities for customers and partners to introduce new products and generate new demand.
- Take charge of public relation management related tasks, manage and distribute marketing materials to support marketing activities.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree Electrical Engineering or marketing related disciplines
- Above 3 years Sales & marketing experience in dynamic multinational organizations and marketing management role in Low Voltage electrical product segment.
- Have knowledge in marketing planning, sales enablement and brand value propositions Innovative, energetic, strong analytical, result oriented, can do attitude with exceptional interpersonal skills
- Excellent English language skills, be able to travel abroad for business trip
- Can using necessary software, such as photoshop, CAD… 

-  Works day : Mon- Fri  ( 8:00 Am – 05:00 Pm)
-  18 days annual leave 
-  NSSF 
-  Attendance bonus 
-  Holiday follow to Cambodia labour law
-  Job location : Toul Kouk
Company Profile: Founded in 1984, CHINT is a leading global provider of smart energy solutions. It is actively deploying “4+1” industrial sectors including smart electrics, green energy, industrial control and automation, smart home and incubator, forming an integrated whole industry chain of “power generation, storage, transmission, substation, distribution, sales and consumption”. And it boasts an extensive business network across over 140 countries and regions as well as more than 30,000 employees and an annual sales revenue of over USD 11.4 billion. CHINT has been ranking among China’s Top 500 companies for 18 consecutive years. Its subsidiary, CHINT Electrics is the first company in China with low-voltage electrics as its main business getting listed on the A-share market as one of the Top 50 Asian listed companies. Now we are looking for the candidate to joint with us for our new market in Cambodia.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Chhavann  Telegram: 086 541231 / 077 711 817 chhavann@chintglobal.com Street 542, #15, Sangkat Beokng Kok 1, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia. Telegram: 086 541231 / 077 711 817

Company Profile:
Royal De Heus Group is an international organization with a leading position in the animal feed industry. De Heus was founded in 1911 and has its roots in the Netherlands. After more than a 100 years the company is still owned and managed by the De Heus family.

Since its founding Royal De Heus has expanded from a regional feed company to a feed conglomerate with activities in more than 50 countries in Europe, Asia, Middle East, Africa and Latin America. Due to the rapid growth outside the Netherlands the De Heus Group is a global top-15 feed supplier.

De Heus is establishing their production facility in Cambodia and jointing venture together with TMH Company Limited of Cambodia.
Contact Info: Contact Information Amy  012390596 khrecruitment@deheus.com 51 Street, Oudong, Kampong Speu province, Cambodia 012390596

Job Description:
- Define new data mart and collection based on business requirements.

- Collect, interpret data, and analyze results using statistical technique.

- Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics and other strategies that optimize statically efficiency and quality.

- Support initiatives for data integrity and normalization; support the maintenance of the 360 Customer View Data model, Customer Segmentation model and other data models in the DW.

- Support business analytics team in the development of statistical models and machine-learning algorithms and then present the result using data visualization techniques to business users.

- Analyze, prioritize and fix open issues to ensure timely resolution of issues affecting business applications.

- Work closely with EPM (Enterprise Performance Management) and business analytics team to determine business objective and goals.

- Provide an approach and solution to business analytic team.

- Develop, implement and document systems, internal methodology, processes and procedures for software development standards.

- Document database model, data metadata, data analytic design and machine-learning algorithm.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Data Management or related fields.

- Minimum 02 years’ experience in data mining or analytics with understanding of models, structures, theories, principles, and practices preferably in financial service industry.

- Experience in reporting or software development is a plus.

- Knowledge in data modeling tools, data preparation, processing, classification, and forecasting.

- Knowledge in Excel, Python/R, SQL, familiarity with business intelligence tool (PowerBI, Tableau...), Microsoft SQL Server, SSIS, SSRS and SSAS.

- High commitment and be a detail oriented with good interpersonal and problem solving skills.

- Good verbal and written communication in both Khmer and English.
Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Corporate Solution Product and Pricing support (50%) - Generate quotation for Corporate Solution products within the turnaround time. - Assist sales team with special requests. - Collaborate with various functional departments to assist with product and pricing related enquiries.2. Provide actuarial support for new product/ initiative launch (20%) - UAT testing on iPos to make sure the premium calculation, all related wording or sentences in the sales quotation are fully align with the product pricing model. - UAT testing on IL/COAST system to make sure they are all align with the product pricing model.3. Support product enhancement related projects (20%) - Support the system testing and UAT for day2 items. - Support day2 feature such as requests for change payment mode, change sum insured and premium after policy issue.4. Other actuarial related support (10%) - Monthly tracking of the new product after launch. - Calculate persistency for each sale channel for monthly reporting and compensation schemes calculation. - Handling other related customer service queries.

Job Description: Job AnnouncementAutomotive Sales Manager We are seeking an experienced Automotive Sales Manager to oversee our sales staff. Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
Tailor and Workshop Supervisor (500$ up)

Job Description
•Day to day management of workshop staff and makers.
•Assist in planning, designing and delivering new products.
•Manage quality issues in all aspect of production, workshop operation in line with codes of practice.
•Oversee production of orders and commissions, and ensure the accurate and timely completion of them.
•Provide a well-run and maintained workshop including building maintenance and other issues in relation to the management of the workshop.
•Establish that all equipment, plant and substance used are suitable for the task and are kept in good working condition; this includes the regular maintenance and servicing of equipment.
•Taking measurements and agreeing a style and fabric.
•working out how much it will cost and how long it will take to make
•Creating a new pattern or adapting an existing one
•Fitting the garment again and marking any final adjustments
•Stitching the garment together, often using hand stitching
•Control software system and finger print
•Control Stock, office equipment and final clothes.


Job Requirement
•Age: 45 up
•Bachelor’s Degree required 
•1-2 years’ experience in a professional setting, some HR experience preferred.
•Excellent organization skills and strong attention to detail 
•Demonstrated ability to handle privy and confidential information 
•Strong leadership skills 
•MS Office proficiency (Word, Outlook, Excel, Power Point) 
•Excellent communication skills both oral and written 
•Candidate should be ambitious, energetic, and a self-starter 
•Ability to handle multiple competing priorities in a fast-paced environment 
•Good and strong communication skill is a must.
•Honest, reliable, loyalty and positive manner/attitude

Job Description:
Main Goals
- To ensure student education regarding digitalization is high-tech. 
- To lead program apple for education in long term.
- To strong management and monitoring for IT operation both server, networking, and coding development.
- Stay up to date with new technology and digitalization and reporting this information to the IT manager and CEO
- To lead coding developer team for ERP and open-source system
- Work closely with other section/department Managers to assess the growth needs and maintenance of the company’s ICT infrastructure and system development.

Main Responsibilities
- Lead large IT projects, including the design and deployment of new ICT systems and services
- Monitor performance of information technology systems to determine cost and productivity levels, and to make recommendations for improving the IT infrastructure
- Help to define IT infrastructure strategy, architecture, and processes
- Responsibility for deadline assigned by IT Manager
- Strong knowledges in apple products and mac apps regrading to education 
- Availability Management and lead ICT classes

Key Accountabilities
The role is responsible for overseeing the ICT Services Department including, but not limited to, the following:
- Contribute to the School's ICT strategy group (Digital)
- Devise, document and maintain ICT policies and procedures that ensure operational (school) continuity and compliance with relevant requirements. 
- Manage and optimize administrative systems – School information, domain services (Active Directory) including SSO, security, printers, backup, analytics, and communication.
- Implement and manage the School's ICT infrastructure and systems within approved budget and resource allocations.
- Lead an environment in which high quality services are delivered to staff, students, parents, and School volunteers.
- Manage the appointment and relationship of strategic partnerships with ICT hardware, software, and service vendors. 
- Co-ordinate security and risk management for information managed by, and on behalf of School.
- Supervise IT Support staff and their ongoing schedule of work.
- Maintain a leadership position in ICT activities in the sector.
- Communicate with staff, students and parents on any ICT queries that need to be addressed. 
- Develop and present budgetary needs and expenses of the IT department to Management team.
- Manage the allocation and monitoring of ICT resources and prepare appropriate timely reports.
- Undertake high level planning and/or implementation of policies and programs relating to operating systems, storage, and networks.
- Coach IT Services staff, priorities work to meet outcomes, monitor workloads, review progress of projects and provide feedback where necessary to staff.
Job Requirement:
Qualifications
- Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field, or equivalent experience
- 2-3 years of job experience as IT supervisor level
- Experience leading and managing large IT projects and rolling out IT infrastructures across various technologies
- Experience preparing project proposal and timeline.
- Excellent working knowledge of computer systems, security, network and systems administration, databases, apple products and mac app.
- Strong critical thinking and decision-making skills
- Excellent project management skills and strong ability to prioritize

ICS Group seeks a Head of Admin and Human Resource Section who will manage team in leading and creating initiatives, strategic plans, methods, systems, and best practice to recruit, develop, organize, and train a diverse & high performance workforce. Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

position: គ្រូបង្រៀនកម្រិតបឋម
Job Description: - ទទួលបន្ទុកក្នុងការបង្កើត និងលើកកម្ពស់បទដ្ឋានអប់រំខ្ពស់សម្រាប់សិស្សទាំងអស់ ដូចជាការគោរពវិន័យ ការសីលធម៌ខ្ពស់ឧតម្តភាពក្នុងការសិក្សា និងការអភិវឌ្ឍលើចរិកលក្ខណៈរបស់សិស្ស- ទទួលបន្ទុកក្នុងការរៀបចំថ្នាក់ និងមេរៀនដើម្បីបង្កើនការអភិវឌ្ឍការសិក្សា និងយល់ដឹងរបស់សិស្សឲ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ ក៏ដូចជាបង្កើតទំនាក់ទំនងជិតស្និទ្ធជាមួយសិស្សប្រកមដោយក្រមសីលធម៌វិជ្ជាជីវៈដើម្បីសិក្សាបន្ថែមពីភាពខ្លាំង និងភាពខ្សោយរបស់សិស្សក្នុងការរៀបចំកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀនឲ្យសមស្របនឹងសមត្ថភាពរបស់សិស្ស- ទទួលបន្ទុកធ្វើកិច្ចតែងការបង្រៀន ផែនការបង្រៀនសម្រាប់រយៈមួយសប្ដាហ៍ម្ដង រៀបចំឯកសារប្រឡងផ្សេងៗប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សានីមួយៗ។ រាល់ឯកសារប្រឡងផ្សេងៗត្រូវបញ្ជូនមកប្រធានការិយាល័យកម្មវិធីសិក្សាភាសាខ្មែរពិនិត្យ មុននឹងបញ្ជូនដល់នាយកសាលា ឬនាយិកាសាលា- ធ្វើការសហការជាមួយក្រុមការងារកម្មវិធីភាសាខ្មែរ ក្រុមការងាររដ្ឋបាលសាលាអន្តរជាតិ នាយកសាលា ឬនាយិការងដើម្បីជាការលើកទឹកចិត្តដល់ក្រុមការងារ- ទទួលបន្ទកក្នុងការកំណត់កិច្ចការផ្ទះ ឬលំហាត់ផ្សេងៗសម្រាប់សិស្សដែលរាល់កិច្ចការផ្ទះ និងលំហាត់ទាំងនោះត្រូវអនុលោមទៅតាមគោលការណ៍។
Job Requirement: តួរនាទីសំខាន់៖	- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សិក្សា និងទិន្នន័យពិន្ទុកសិស្ស- ​កម្រិត​វប្បធម៌​ថ្នាក់​បរិញ្ញាបត្រ- មាន​បទ​ពិសោធ​ន៌បង្រៀន​យ៉ាងតិច 3 ឆ្នាំ​- មានការ​តស៊ូ​ ភាព​អំណត់​ នឹង​ការងារ​- មាន​អាយុ​ចាប់ពី​25ឆ្នាំ​ ដល់​45ឆ្នាំ​- មាន​បុគ្គលិកលក្ខណៈ​រួសរាយ​រាក់ទាក់​ ស្មោះត្រង់​ និង​ក្រម​សិល​ធម៌​ល្អ​។អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖ - ធ្វើការពីថ្ងៃចន្ទដល់សុក្រ- សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រ៉ងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ការងារ និងថែទាំសុខភាព - ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងឳកាសដំឡើងតំណែង ឬផ្លាស់ប្តូរមុខតំណែងការងារ - ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិ- ពិធីជប់លៀងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ - ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្ត និងប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភផ្សេងៗ

Job Description:
Job Goals
-	Receiving goods, issuing goods, and preparing stock
-	Book-keeping, checking, controlling and tracking inventory movement
-	Responding other tasks assigned by Inventory Controller and Accounting Manager.

Summary of Responsibilities
ICS Group seeks a Stock/ Accounting Intern who will pick and pack, and issue items, materials, equipment to required departments. He/she will organize and maintains storage for efficient material, label and tag items, and organize stock items on shelving. Moreover, he/she will coordinate with warehouse to insure correct pickup, delivery, and transfer warehouse inventory, participate in physical count in the end of the month and report to Inventory Controller and Accounting Manager.
Job Requirement:
Requirements & Qualifications
-	Undergraduate or fresh graduate in Accounting, Business Administration or related field
-	No experience or 3 months working in Accounting field
-	Ability to use Microsoft Excel, Word, and English Language
-	Ability to willing to learn more and work well under pressure
-	Honesty, Transparency and Accountability.

Extra Benefits:
-	High Allowance (150$-180$) and certificate
-	Performance appraisal and salary review
-	NSSF (Accident, Health & Pension)
-	Public Holiday (Apply to Ministry of Labor)
-	Working days: Monday to Saturday’s Morning
