Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To act as a role model for the management of the store team.
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To To participate in the recruitment of personnel in an active and optimal manner.
• To ensure the development of the team towards a high level of knowledge and performance.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To detect the potential of each employee and ensure their development.
• To ensure the optimal management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• To lead the team and correctly and actively manage potential conflict.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To plan the required measures to reach targets.
• To analyze and review management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• To priorities and, during busy periods, dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To ensure the correct execution of administrative tasks.
• To review and apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.).
• To ensure strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To optimize resources and try to minimize expenses e.g. optimization of the workforce, suppliers, etc.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.)
• To ensure and collaborate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To optimise selling space in order to obtain maximum profitability.
• To continuously ensure the correct replenishment of the store.
• To ensure compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Analysis of management indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register program and Pathfinder operation.
• E Leadership qualities – mobilizes and motivates the team.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organization, management and planning.
• Able to analyze and offer solutions.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Prioritization – optimal use of time.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Bunthoeun Keo (Mr.)  088 222 8261 | 016-061 698 602 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 088 222 8261 | 016-061 698 602

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

Job Description:
• Manages and record the loans of books, journals, and other physical and digital materials.
• Keeps the library functional, user-friendly and high quality for students, faculties, visitors, and other stakeholders. 
• Responds to all requests from students, faculties and other library users.  
• Orders books, journals, and other resources.
• Ensures that the library is resourceful that can timely meet the needs of all users.
• Ensures access to both physical and digital library resources.  
• Catalogues and keeps track of library materials. 
• Ensures continuous improvement of the library and library resources.
• Keeps the library tidy and in good order to enhance the library environment for studies and research. 
• Serves as a contact person for any matter related to the library, book sellers, other library service providers in the community, and library management system provider.
• Provides library usage orientation and training if necessary to new students, faculty members and staff. 
• Provides guidance and assistance to students and faculties on information retrieval and reading materials.
• Manages the library staff and projects, if any.
• Engages in events that promote library services to the learning & teaching communities at large.   
• Promotes the usage of the physical and digital resources of the library.
• Carries out other duties as delegated by the Vice President for Administration and Research.
Job Requirement:
• Completed a higher education degree.
• Demonstrates a strong IT skills and familiarity with library databases.
• Has at least 1-year hands-on experience as a librarian using a library management system.
• Demonstrates a good knowledge/skill in classification system. 
• Has a good knowledge of the higher education system.
• Has a strong foundation in study skills and research. 
• Has the ability to make sound judgement and decision.   
• Has a good written and communication skills
• Possess results-oriented and positive attitudes

Additional Benefits
•	National Social Security Fund;
•	Life insurance;
•	Severance and seniority payments; 
•	Public holidays as per government policies, generous annual and special leaves;
•	Free scheduled transportation (Phnom Penh - KIT- Phnom Penh);
•	Free accommodation, laundry service & quality WiFi access; and
•	Three free meals per day.

Contact
Send your CV and Cover Letter to:
Mr. KEA Pengheang, at email: kea.pengheang@kit.edu.kh
Phone: (855) 17 737 800 / 70 747 800

job title: Provincial Sales Manager (to be based in Takeo)
position: Provincial Sales Manager (to be based in Takeo)
Job Description:
• Lead and develop members of your team utilizing the tools and processes developed by HR
• Ensure that the leadership and development of the people in your team is given sufficient time and focus 
• Proactively act as a coach and mentor to your team to enable them to improve their skills and knowledge 
• Identify and resolve employee/team problems and conflict 
• Support in the recruitment of suitable people for your team and the company as a whole 
• Act as a ‘subject matter expert’ in your area of expertise, sharing that knowledge on Sales Operations to your team & colleagues
• Ensure you continue to develop your knowledge and expertise through your own ‘personal career development’ and utilizing training and development offered by company
• Act as an advocate of the company, promoting it internally and externally. This includes creating and managing any social media to share, like and comment on the company’s published content.
• Direct, motivate, & support professional sales team to accomplish their objectives 
• Manage sales activities and daily sales deal status in Odoo-CRM, expenses reporting, and cross-functional reporting (Such as Stock, Service, BPO, etc.) with own area of responsibility. Grow network with own area of responsibility
• Accountable for ensuring all RMA’s policies and procedure are follow within the showrooms and/or responsible area.
• Advise sales team through the sales process, including but not limited to prospecting -> closing area
• Coach and mentor sales team on the following topics; including but not limited to needs, features & benefits, closing deals, time and territory management, negotiating, product knowledge, and productivity improvement
• Create and monitor annual sales department benchmarks and budget, in alignment with the organization’s financial and operational objectives
• Ensure customer satisfaction. Work with the sales team to know the customer’s current and future expectations (Customer Talk) and work with all departments to resolve customer concern/issue.
• Lead the sales team to effectively understand and use manufacturer’s products and programs to attain acceptable market share levels.
• Foster an engaged work environment within the locations, encouraging accountability, open communication, teamwork, and a commitment to serving the customer.
• Ensure that the company/location reputation and image in the community is consistent with RMA/AED Integrated Core Values, and that business relationships with all stakeholders are not compromised
• Responsible for ensuring that sound and safe business practices and processes are implemented and continuously improved to effectively and efficiently achieve ethical business objectives
• Perform all other duties as assigned by management in a professional and efficient manner.
• Full responsible for P & L of own department/area of responsibility
• Manage costs at reasonable levels and in line with Budget
• Actively advise any concerns related to profitability of Sales Department
• Report to TSM/DGM 
• Meet with Aftersales, Marketing, and other Sales Dept., regularly to evaluate inter-departmental concerns on skills and performance required for each individual for improvement 
• Closely liaise with RMA Group on policy matters
• Develop and maintain good relationships with customers, business partners, networking people, government and private sectors
• This position is based in province (s), and  required to travel (>60%) to visit and support sales team in own province (s) of responsibility, require regular routine calendar and respond to urgent needs as per business operations’ requirement 
• Hold valid Driving License
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree level in Business Management  or related fields, especially Agriculture business
• Minimum of 2 years of experiences in Sales or related field
• Record in successfully running Sales Dept. or related field
• Have good knowledge in Agriculture and/or Heavy equipment
• Ability to lead, training, and coach subordinate well 
• Listening, Understanding and Responding
• Mentoring, Coaching & Performance Management 
• Knowledge of business Environment
• Achievement
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Excellent presentation and facilitation skills
• A person of good character – someone in whom the owner/manager can place full trust and confidence
• Ability to use MS office applications – Power Point, Word, Excel & Outlook
• Ability to build relationships with internal and external partners
• Excellent organization skills – able to prioritize
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description: The Song Saa Foundation is a not-for-profit Non-Governmental Organisation (NGO) based in the beautiful Koh Rong Archipelago, Preah Sihanouk, Cambodia. We are partnered with Song Saa Private Island (SSPI) and during the peak season Song Saa Foundation (SSF) is seeking an enthusiastic and articulate Sustainability Educator to support SSPI guest engagement and fundraising efforts of SSF alongside enhancing the resort’s local food sourcing strategy, particularly around a full-time fisher person and planned plant-based menu introduction. It will be a fun and rewarding role for someone with strong interpersonal skills, confidence, and a friendly attitude. If you have a passion for conservation and experience in hospitality, we would like to hear from you!              Primary roles• Daily coordination and delivery of tours with SSPI guests• Fundraising through SSPI guest donations• Communication of SSF work through diverse media channels• Staffing of the SSF Discovery Centre on SSPI and engaging with SSPI guests through the day• Enhancing sustainable food sourcing on SSPI• Understand and articulate the SSF projects, both community and marine, to engage guests in foundation work• Support SSF team by staffing the Discovery Centre, sometimes independently, showcasing current projects to resort guests and promoting guest participation in fundraising tours• Involving guests in SSF activities, such as leading tours, beach cleans, underwater clean-ups• Able to join SFF team in the field when required, both for community and marine projects Comfortable in the water and able to swim.• An understanding of science based social media communication to help promote the SSF online fundraising initiatives• Support the Community Coordinator to write and develop community education presentations• Support the SSF team collecting social data for the 10-year impact report Support the SSF team with drafting the annual report.• Work with the resort chef to produce a policy and communication brief for the resort’s sustainable food journey - highlight why the island employs its own fisher person, why we serve the fish we do (seasonality etc) and why certain fish are not available (food miles & carbon footprints, species of conservation concern)• Liaise with the Marine Scientist to research sustainable fishing methods within the KRA MNP and ensure the uptake of these by the SSPI fisherman role.• Support the Marine Scientist to develop a long term SSPI fishing monitoring plan
Job Requirement: • This position is open to both Khmer and international applicants with strong interpersonal skills• Fluent in English (qualification evidence for Khmer applicants would be ideal)• Proactive and confident – able to reach out and develop friendly relationships with guests• A willingness to learn new information and a dedication to exemplary customer service, with confidence and a friendly attitude• A passion for sustainability and Cambodian community development The ability to swim confidently is highly desired•
Company Profile:
Created with sustainability in mind, Song Saa Private Island reflects the beauty of the Cambodian coastline. It’s a place that breathes in time with nature, built from local materials, by local hands, and infused with local art and soul. An evolved tropical getaway with a pristine private beach, spacious wooden villas, heavenly spa sanctuaries and a preserved coral reef, Song Saa Private Island lets you detach from the world and tune into simple luxuries.

Built with reclaimed timber and materials from the mainland, the resort’s design and architecture reiterates our commitment to sustainability. Each villa is a private sanctuary, a refined blend of thatched roofs, linen-draped canopy beds, up-cycled décor and repurposed furniture. Discarded oil drums find new life as lamps. Driftwood serves as a table or bench. Salvaged wood from old fishing boats and factory yards now forms decks and floors and beams.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078330733 talent@songsaa.com Koh Ouen, Khan Mittapheap, Preah Sihanouk 078330733

Job Description:
Job Description
a. Monitors competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, new products, promotion techniques, etc.
b. Focuses sales efforts by studying existing and potential volume of customers to increase our share in the market.
c. Resolves customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports; marketing recommendation to management.
d. Educate sales team by establishing programs/seminars in the areas of new account sales and growth.
e. Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow the company’s policies and compliance procedures.
f. Perform other duties as assigned from the management team
g. Maintaining and increasing sales of company’s products
h. Reaching the targets and goals set in area (PP)
i. Establishing, maintaining and expanding customer base
j. Supervise all direct and indirect project sales
k. Reporting to sale manager
l. Handling sales and follow up on key accounts 
m. Leverage special events and marketing opportunities to sell products at high volumes
n. PR
o. Develop and execute a sale strategy targeting direct and indirect project customer groups (Apartments, Condo, Designer, constructors, etc…)
p. Updating professionals and consultants with latest products and specs, trying to spec our products into their residential/commercial projects.
q. Coordinate with other divisions / departments to expand product coverage and limit overlap.
r. Occasionally fill in for existing sales representative servicing existing accounts
s. Generate regular sale report
t. Negotiate the terms of an agreement and close sales when needed
u. Other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
2.Job Requirements 
a. Bachelor Degree of Business administration/Marketing or related fields.
b. A minimum of 3-4 years’ experience in a supervisory position in sales 
c. Acknowledgeable about kitchen appliance and specifications.
d. Male or Female can apply
e. Able to communicate in English
f. Have strong organizational skills, leadership & ability to handle multiple tasks under deadlines and pressure.
g. Have knowledge of Microsoft word & Excel and Microsoft Outlook
h. Good communication and team work spirit
Company Profile: MODERN GAS, a fully Cambodian owned and registered company in CMED Group, was established since 1990 with the vision of “Supplying Kitchen Appliances throughout of Cambodia”. Today, with over 170 employees, 9 Retail Stores, and 3 LPG Gas Station, Modern Gas is able to sale products through multiple channels, and is a leading Cooking Gas Appliances in Cambodia Market.

Job Description:
•	Study design briefs (mood board) and determine requirements
•	Prepares work to be accomplished by conducting research, gathering information and materials
•	Prepare rough drafts and present ideas to line manager
•	Work with marketing and creative manager or line manager to produce final design
•	Reviewing final layouts and suggest improvements when necessary
•	Design brochures, flyer, poster, logo, signages, books, magazine, annual reports, advertisements, merchandizes, wall art, certificate, pin, banner, stickers, and other communication materials as required by the Company
•	Ensure final graphics and layouts are visually appealing, follow brand guideline and mood board, and completed on time before deadline
•	Managing graphic designs from conception to delivery
•	Conceptualizing visuals based on requirements
•	Use the appropriate colors and layouts for each graphic
•	Selecting colors, fonts, photographs, layouts and other design elements to communicate creative concepts
•	Thinking creatively to produce new ideas and concepts and developing interactive design
•	Learning how to use a new software or program
•	Keeping up-to-date with industry developments
•	Teaching or lead junior graphic designer/or internship
•	Manage a team of junior designers to ensure all work produced
•	Liaise with third party providers and agencies as and when needed
•	Help to source and manage freelancers as and when required
•	Other tasks assigned by manager.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor's degree in graphic arts, design, communications, or related field 
•	2-3 Years of experience in graphic design 
•	Knowledge of layouts, graphic fundamentals, typography, print, and the web 
•	Knowledge of Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and other graphic design software 
•	Compelling portfolio of work over wide range of creative projects 
•	Strong analytical skills

Company Profile: TUBE COFFEE created by 3 Cambodian Shareholders. Tube is inspired by London’s metro system, the underground TUBE, for which its fast speed, reliable quality, and affordability are world-renowned. Naturally, these are the very essence which Tube coffee strives to be. We aim to bring fast, affordable, and quality services to Cambodia just like our underground counterpart, but in a coffee way. As synonymous as the tube is with London, Tube coffee aims to be the same in Cambodia, simply by being a Khmer brand created in Cambodia and made by Cambodians to compete with foreign brands. By using yellow, we hope to present to the world the warmth, freshness, happiness, optimism, and positivity of the Khmer culture. So, hop aboard and enjoy a smooth ride on the Khmer tube.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   016 55 05 64  recruitment@tubecafecambodia.com TUBE COFFEE OFFICE, St.317, Sangkat Boeng Kak Ti Pir, Khan Tuol Kouk, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 016 55 05 64

Naturally, these are the very essence which Tube coffee strives to be. We aim to bring fast, affordable, and quality services to Cambodia just like our underground counterpart, but in a coffee way. As synonymous as the tube is with London, Tube coffee aims to be the same in Cambodia, simply by being a Khmer brand created in Cambodia and made by Cambodians to compete with foreign brands. By using yellow, we hope to present to the world the warmth, freshness, happiness, optimism, and positivity of the Khmer culture. So, hop aboard and enjoy a smooth ride on the Khmer tube.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   016 55 05 64  recruitment@tubecafecambodia.com TUBE COFFEE OFFICE, St.317, Sangkat Boeng Kak I, Khan Tuol Kouk, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 016 55 05 64

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
- Depreciation calculations and journal entry preparation

- Inventory counted

-Other tasks assigned by Cost Account Manager

- Bachelor Degree in Accounting or other related fields.
- At least 2 years of experience 
- Good in problem solving skill, good interpersonal and communication skills
- Good in Microsoft Office
- Good in English both spoken and written 


Benefits:
- Seniority
- KPI Bonus
- Annual leave
- Sick Leave
- Special Leave
- Public holidays (Labor Law)
- Insurance (NSSF)

Job Description:
-Prepare monthly tax declaration and yearly tax on profit.

-Good interpersonal and communication skill
-Good in Problem solving.

Job Description:

•	Greet walk-in customers and welcome them warmly.

company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
Job Description:
1. Analyze the user requirements and translate it into application features
2. Design creative prototypes according to the requirement and specifications
3. Write high-quality source code to program complete applications within deadlines
4. Perform unit and integration testing before launching the application
5. Conduct functional and non-functional testing to ensure proper application performance
6. Troubleshoot and debug applications
7. Evaluate existing applications to reprogram, update and add new features
8. Develop technical documents and handbooks to accurately represent application design and code
Job Requirement:
1. Education:
   Bachelor’s degree in Computer Sciences, Information Technology, or related fields
2. Experiences:
   At least 1 years working experience as IT Developer
   Good experience as application developer
   Proven experience in designing and building applications
   Ability to program in at least one programming language such as C#, Java (J2EE) etc.
   In-depth knowledge of programming for diverse operating systems and platforms using 
   development tools
   Excellent understanding of software design and programming principles.
3. Skills and knowledge:
   A team player with excellent communication skills
   Analytical thinking and problem-solving capability
   Great attention to detail and time-management skills
   Works with integrity; objectivity, accountability, honesty and leadership
Company Profile: One Fraternity is a Cambodian-owned company specializing in sales, distribution, and marketing of a wide range of consumer products. Since the establishment in 2010, we have extensive experiences and affiliations with diverse stakeholders, including government institutions, businesses, wholesalers, retailers, agents, and customers across Cambodia. With broad distribution channels and industry expertise, from market research and analysis, assessing customer needs, sales, marketing, or distribution, we help build the strategy that works for our business partners who want to grow their businesses in new and existing markets in Cambodia.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mrs. Chan Sokunthearoth  061997333 recruitment@vital.com.kh Phnom Penh Building No. 888K, Road 598, Sangkat Toul Sangke, Khan Russey Keo,Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia. 061997333

Job Description:
- Marketing and Sales Department
- Phnom Penh International Airport

Directly reporting to the Chief Commercial Officer, you will play a key role in supporting the business development activities. The role comprises Business intelligence, strategy analysis and commercial dimensions.

** Part Your assignments will mainly focus on:
• Collect, analyze and interpret data related to the airports activities
• Identify opportunities and risks, across airlines and markets and recommend priorities
• Build accurate forecasts, identify development options to improve insight and lead market research effort.
• Drive optimization of non-aero revenue through analysis and present recommendations to improve category mix and performance management.
• Build models to identify proactive indicators on market and business trends
• Interface with all levels of the organization to build and present recommendations
• Develop and continuously improve Pitch Packs and other customer documentation tailored to individual airlines or partners using a range of media.
• Design and deliver presentations to existing airlines focused on Cambodia and identified opportunities to drive traffic measured by professional and timely presentations ready for all airline engagement.
• Support Commercial team in negotiations
• Build strong relationships externally and internally

** Job Dimensions
✓ 03 international airports in Cambodia
✓ Global stakeholders
✓ Commercial zone: Asia
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree in business and Finance, master’s degree in business, Business intelligence is a plus.
• Commercial experience or Business experience, ideally in the aviation industry
• Excel and other data management software expertise
• Negotiation process knowledge or skills
• Strong analytical skills with solid critical thinking
• Good oral and written communication skills
• Quality focus and Excellence
• Strong interpersonal skills and confidence engaging at all levels
• Teamwork spirit
• Strong planning and organizing competencies
• Proven proficiency in spoken and written in Khmer and English

Job Description: •	Responsible for research and development work in the field of massage and spa.•	Collect data & market analysis of the spa (data collection & market analysis) and develop the company where the shortcomings.•	Develop new marketing strategies to boost the sales of each branch to sell all plans according to the company's policy.•	To find all the ways to increase sales in all branches and develop the shortcomings to be better in order to retain old customers and attract more new customers.•	Manage competitors and market changes in the field of massage and spa in a timely manner to facilitate the preparation of new plans.•	Manage and develop marketing on social media such as: FB page, TikTok, Telegram WeChat, Line, WhatsApp, LinkedIn, YouTube, TV, Newspaper, Magazine and Others.•	Manage and develop marketing materials such as brochures, banners, posters, menus, discount cards and related materials.•	Monitor and monitor the sales of all branches on a daily basis to know if sales have increased or decreased.•	Responsible for the sales plan and lead or train relevant branches in all branches to promote sales to meet all plans.•	Responsible and develop the company's reputation to compete in the spa market.•	Create a new product (meaning: create a new service for sale, find more important points for massage services).•	Review daily, weekly, monthly, annual and annual reports and plan for the next year.•	Responsible for solving staff problems and training its employees to work professionally (ethical, love teamwork, etc.).•	Responsible for dividing the work responsibilities of its employees accurately and clearly according to their roles and divisions.•	Cooperate with the Human Resources and Administration (Facilitate staff who have problems finding additional staff when needed to prepare original documents for HR and keep copies).•	The actual work required is determined by its own supervisor.

Job Description: We are seeking an energetic and capable administrative secretary to assist us with office administration. In this role, you will be responsible for processing documents, maintaining databases, and liaising with the public. You may also be required to manage office supplies.Job duties:* Reporting to management and performing secretarial duties.* Processing, typing, editing, and formatting reports and documents.* Filing documents, as well as entering data and maintaining databases.* Liaising with internal personnels and communicating with the public.* Directing internal and external calls, emails, and faxes to designated personnels.* Arranging and scheduling appointments, meetings, and events.* Monitoring office supplies and ordering replacements.* Assisting with copying, scanning, faxing, emailing, note-taking, and travel bookings.* Preparing facilities and arranging refreshments for events, if required.* Observing the best business practices and etiquette.
Job Requirement: * 1-2 years of experience as an Administrative Secretary would be advantageous.* Advanced proficiency in managing documents, spreadsheets, and databases.* Ability to liaise internally and externally on administrative matters.* Exceptional filing, recordkeeping, and organizational skills.* Working knowledge of printers, copiers, scanners, and fax machines.* Proficiency in appointment scheduling.* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.* Exceptional interpersonal skills.* Language： Khmer & English

job title: Provincial Sales Manager (to be based in Takeo)
position: Provincial Sales Manager (to be based in Takeo)
Job Description:
• Lead and develop members of your team utilizing the tools and processes developed by HR
• Ensure that the leadership and development of the people in your team is given sufficient time and focus 
• Proactively act as a coach and mentor to your team to enable them to improve their skills and knowledge 
• Identify and resolve employee/team problems and conflict 
• Support in the recruitment of suitable people for your team and the company as a whole 
• Act as a ‘subject matter expert’ in your area of expertise, sharing that knowledge on Sales Operations to your team & colleagues
• Ensure you continue to develop your knowledge and expertise through your own ‘personal career development’ and utilizing training and development offered by company
• Act as an advocate of the company, promoting it internally and externally. This includes creating and managing any social media to share, like and comment on the company’s published content.
• Direct, motivate, & support professional sales team to accomplish their objectives 
• Manage sales activities and daily sales deal status in Odoo-CRM, expenses reporting, and cross-functional reporting (Such as Stock, Service, BPO, etc.) with own area of responsibility. Grow network with own area of responsibility
• Accountable for ensuring all RMA’s policies and procedure are follow within the showrooms and/or responsible area.
• Advise sales team through the sales process, including but not limited to prospecting -> closing area
• Coach and mentor sales team on the following topics; including but not limited to needs, features & benefits, closing deals, time and territory management, negotiating, product knowledge, and productivity improvement
• Create and monitor annual sales department benchmarks and budget, in alignment with the organization’s financial and operational objectives
• Ensure customer satisfaction. Work with the sales team to know the customer’s current and future expectations (Customer Talk) and work with all departments to resolve customer concern/issue.
• Lead the sales team to effectively understand and use manufacturer’s products and programs to attain acceptable market share levels.
• Foster an engaged work environment within the locations, encouraging accountability, open communication, teamwork, and a commitment to serving the customer.
• Ensure that the company/location reputation and image in the community is consistent with RMA/AED Integrated Core Values, and that business relationships with all stakeholders are not compromised
• Responsible for ensuring that sound and safe business practices and processes are implemented and continuously improved to effectively and efficiently achieve ethical business objectives
• Perform all other duties as assigned by management in a professional and efficient manner.
• Full responsible for P & L of own department/area of responsibility
• Manage costs at reasonable levels and in line with Budget
• Actively advise any concerns related to profitability of Sales Department
• Report to TSM/DGM 
• Meet with Aftersales, Marketing, and other Sales Dept., regularly to evaluate inter-departmental concerns on skills and performance required for each individual for improvement 
• Closely liaise with RMA Group on policy matters
• Develop and maintain good relationships with customers, business partners, networking people, government and private sectors
• This position is based in province (s), and  required to travel (>60%) to visit and support sales team in own province (s) of responsibility, require regular routine calendar and respond to urgent needs as per business operations’ requirement 
• Hold valid Driving License
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree level in Business Management  or related fields, especially Agriculture business
• Minimum of 2 years of experiences in Sales or related field
• Record in successfully running Sales Dept. or related field
• Have good knowledge in Agriculture and/or Heavy equipment
• Ability to lead, training, and coach subordinate well 
• Listening, Understanding and Responding
• Mentoring, Coaching & Performance Management 
• Knowledge of business Environment
• Achievement
• Excellent written and verbal communication skills
• Excellent presentation and facilitation skills
• A person of good character – someone in whom the owner/manager can place full trust and confidence
• Ability to use MS office applications – Power Point, Word, Excel & Outlook
• Ability to build relationships with internal and external partners
• Excellent organization skills – able to prioritize
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

job title: Assistant Manager, Internal Audit & Risk Management
position: Assistant Manager, Internal Audit & Risk Management
Job Description:
Key Responsibilities

•	Plan and design the scope of internal audit working process and procedure in conjunction with the business process, objective and implementation
•	Monitor internal audit testing and projects are conducted on timely basis and follow the working plan and process of specified area and identify reportable issues
•	Review and update the suitability of internal control design
•	Report audit findings and prepare audit report for line manager to review
•	Prepare the update of internal audit policy upon significant change of company operation
•	Support line manager on oversea and monitor risk assessment of assigned department or functional area in established/required timeline
•	Support line manager for establishing Business Continuance Plan (BCP),
•	Develop and update risk management policies and procedures.
•	Work closely with all Head of Departments and other relevant management team.
•	Carry out other duties appropriate to this post as requested by line manager.
Job Requirement:
Position Requirement 

•	Bachelor Degrees or Master degree (is a plus) in finance/audit/risk or related field.
•	At least 3 years experiences combination in internal audit/risk assessment and/or management required
•	Good communication and interpersonal skills, strong knowledge of Cambodia’s internal statutory requirements.
•	Good knowledge in Business and Risk Regulatory
•	Good mix of corporate, commercial and litigation experience
•	Computer literacy
•	Good command in English
•	Ability to work independently in a fast-paced environment, and strong analytical and negotiation skills
Company Profile: Sovannaphum Life Assurance is a joint venture company between Canadia Investment Holding PLC and Muang Thai Life Assurance PLC. Since starting its operation in 2016, Sovannaphum Life has served to more than 60,000 customers. Sovannaphum Life has been awarded The Fastest Growing Life Insurance Company in Cambodia for 3 consecutive years, 2018, 2019 & 2020. We are here for you, we are you for Cambodia. ​For more info, visit www.sovannphumlife.com or official ​Facebook & Instagram page.

Job Requirement: - Experience in Hotel Management, or Serviced Apartment- English Speaking and Writting, Chinese is a plus- Attention to detail and hard working- Motivated and ready to accept day to day challenges- Honest, and good commitment- Excellent communication skill
Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
Roles and Responsibilities 

Receive and verify claim documents and enter data into the System, and ensure that proper claim filing procedures is followed 

Ensure quality claim services by responding to customers’ inquiries and resolving their complaint 

Ensure effective communication with sale team, claimant, and other related parties, such as hospital, doctor, bank partners, local authority, witness, etc. to gather complete information needed to get the optimum claim results with efficient turnaround time 

Examine and assess claim by reviewing insured’s insurance policy, medical documentations, credit document, and other additional information collected from outside sources, including claimant, hospital, doctor, bank partners, local authority, insured’s employer, other insurance companies, etc. 

Initiating or conducting on-site and off-site investigation of questionable claims 

Confer and consult reinsurers for claim assessment and payment as set out in reinsurance treaty and guideline 

Confer with legal compliance and other related departments, and in some cases outside legal counsel for claim process and litigation  

Ensure that all claim assessment and claim payment are in compliant with policies terms and conditions, Company’s policies and procedures as well as applicable law and regulations. 

Verify claim payment amount, prepare claim payment request and ensure timely disbursement of claim payment to claimant  

Draft claim decision documents (acceptance, rejection, and others) and make recommendation with justifiable reasons for Management’s decision and approval  

Maintain claim file and record, prepare claim reports and other claim administrative process. 

Review and recommend changes to claims process, guideline, and any related document/form 

Carry out other duties as assigned by the line manager.
Job Requirement:
Requirement  

Medical Doctor or Bachelor degree in law or related fields 

Minimum 1 year experience in claim in life or general insurance, and/or underwriting in life insurance 

Knowledgeable in medical terminology  and able to analyze and interpret medical history  

Sound judgment, analytical and good problem solving skill, sale and customer service-oriented 

Strong interpersonal skills and ability to manage and work independently and as part of a team with all levels of employees. 

Initiative with a high sense of responsibility  

Attention to detail and ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively  

Independent, self-driven, and highly motivated 

High integrity and ability to maintain utmost confidentiality of customer’s and company’s information. 

Good communication in both written and spoken English 

Computer literate

Job Description: 1. Handling brainstorming and implementing event plans and concepts to management.2. Handling budgeting and invoicing for the Event.3. Liaising and negotiating with vendors.4. Managing branding and communication.5. Handling post-event reports.6. Perform related duties as assigned from time to time as required by the management.7. Monitor and collate the strategy and tactics of competitors during their ground activations, submit reports to management for further analysis and study.8. Develop and maintain an influential relationship with external partners, such as Agencies, Vendors, Suppliers and etc. to facilitate proper execution of ground activation plans.9. Manage the communication of outdoor visuals, ensuring proper arrangement and coordination with relevant suppliers.10. Carry out marketing activation, team briefing and manage ground activities, ensuring operations are executed efficiently and effectively.11. Engage consumer experience and generate interest so as to inspire brand loyalty, enhancing customer retention and acquisition.12. Conduct post-activation analysis to determine factors and opportunities that can be improved upon future ground arrangements, provide feedback and information to management on market and creative trends observed.13. Keep management informed of the ground operation plans relative to marketing activities that are prepared and ready for launch.
Job Requirement: 1. At least 2 - 5 years of diverse experience in marketing and brand activation.2. Degree in public relations, communications, or hospitality and Communication and marketing skills3. Project management experience4. Highly Organized5. Good time management6. Proficiency in various event software7. Good leadership skills

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Requirement: - Bachelor Degree om Computer Science, IT, or equivalent- 3 years of relevant experience in full stack development,   preferably React Native- Skill in React Native, ReactJS, Firebase, Postgresql, NodeJS,   Git, Agile development

Job Description: * Strategy and Planning- Initiate, define, plan, communicate and follow up company's   business strategy regarding Private Banking business in order   to ensure company’s long-term viability and market share.- Develop an appropriate marketing plan with marketing team to   efficiently and effectively achieve goals and objectives   through design and implement workable and innovative   solutions for client’s needs.- Keep abreast of latest market trend, analyze customers'   behavior, key financial drivers and competitors'' strategy to   sustain a continuous service growth.* Customer Acquisition & Revenue Target- Present and provide highly professional consultations to   target corporate clients and HNWI to address their demands   and match with the Bank’s products and services.- Discuss credit-related issues and loan packaging to provide   sound financial advice and tailored solutions for the clients   as well as to take the opportunity to cross-sell other   banking products.- Closely monitor on recommended/processed loan for timely   repayment and to ensure Portfolio at Risk remains within   acceptable level.- Solicit, build and maintain new and existing local   corporate/HNW individual clients in accordance with the   guidelines stated in the Commercial Banking policies and   procedures to ensure sustainable and secure deposit and loan   portfolios and expending scope to investment and other   products/services as cross-selling.* Customer Relationship Management- Make regular site visits to existing clients to determine the   actual conditions of the business and loan collateral whether   it should remain the same or be downgraded as well as to   develop relationship with clients as part of retention   strategies.- Act as liaison between clients and internal operations team   to timely and effectively understand and provide all types of   banking products including but not limited to deposits,   loans, trade finances and remittance for the clients.- Handle complex clients’ issues or complaints to find an   amicable solution for all and process to higher authority if   needed.* Project Management & Process Improvement- Lead projects on developing and launching new   initiatives/services and creating new service features and   process regarding Private Banking as needed to improve/gain   market penetration/share.- Coordinate with different departments, including Operations,   Finance & IT in streamlining processes, Marketing to drive   business growth and Risk and Compliance in ensuring adherence   of relevant policies and guidelines.* Staff Management- Supervise staff in daily tasks, operations and quality   control.- Coordinate available resources for maximum outcomes.- Act as a role model within the team to question, listen and   give actionable feedback carefully in order to create a   productive work atmosphere towards “speak up culture”.
Job Requirement: - BA in Business, Economics, Accounting, Banking or Finance- Minimum 3 years' experience in Sales & Customers or Partners   Relationship Management / Business Analysis / Project   Management / Transformation / Digital , preferably gained in   Banking or Financial Services industry or consultancy and in   particular in Corporate, Retail Banking, Banking and Cash   Management, Lending / Investment is a plus- Good in spoken / written English and in another foreign   language is a plus- Strong customer/partner relationship, customer services and   deal/project structuring/implementation- Good analytical, communication and interpersonal skills- Having high level of confidentiality, integrity and business   ethic

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Requirement: - Bachelor Degree in Marketing/Business Admin/related field;- 1-2 years working experiences in Finance/Procurement/Marketing;- Have the knowledge about creating purchase request, payment   settlement and familiar with accounting code;- Need to work across department and suppliers/agencies;- Fast learner and can work under pressure.

Job Description: •	Ensure SOP implementation in all departments and check the same during routine operational checks. •	Monitor the purchase request of each department.•	Randomly inspecting the stores (F & B / Kitchen) to check the stock in hand with the F & B Manager and Chef.•	Dealing with Suppliers and Vendors for quality products involving Purchase Manager and providing performance assessment of vendors every quarter to HO Purchase.•	Inspecting all departments for SOP implementation.•	Inspecting all department with their respective Manager's for cleanliness, ambience, service readiness, staff grooming & hospitality culture.•	Monitor the co-ordination between all departments for smooth and efficient operations.•	Assessing and reviewing customer satisfaction and service recovery process.•	Meet all dept. heads to review and train the staff to upkeep the human capital.•	Identifying staff learning needs and assisting with development•	Providing timely and constructive feedback to all direct reports as and when required either formally or informally.•	Conduct weekly and Daily meeting with marketing people for enquiry and follow up & conversion to grow up the business.•	Monitor and maintain operation & overhead cost in order to maintain maximum revenue to the organization.•	Responsible for the overall management of the operation of the hotel.•	Any other duties assigned.

Job Description:
1.   ការងារប្រតិបត្តិប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
1.1  ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពបេតុង(ល្បាយបេតុង ឬស្លាំ) នៅការដ្ឋាន និង ការថែទាំម៉ាស៊ីនសង្កត់ដុំតេស្ត។
1.2  ពិនិត្យការចាក់ដុំតេស្ត​ (Mold Test Concrete) ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
1.3  ពិនិត្យការធ្វើស្លាំរបស់ក្រុមការងារ នៅការដ្ឋានត្រឹមត្រូវ តាមបច្ចេកទេស។
1.4  ត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដាន ការថែទាំដុំតេស្ត និងការសង្កត់បានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
1.5  ត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដាន ទៅលើវត្ថុធាតុដើមអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។  

2.   ការកត់ត្រា ការរៀបចំ និងការធ្វើរបាយការណ៏   
2.1  តាមដាននិងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ស្លាំ នៅតាមការដ្ឋានអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងជាប្រចាំ
2.2  រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សង្កត់ដុំតេស្ត អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា

3.   ការងារផ្សេងៗ
3.1  ផ្តល់ដំណឹងរាល់បញ្ហាកើតមាន មកប្រធានផ្នែកពាក់ពន្ធ័ និងក្នុងGroup ដោយភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងដំណោះស្រាយ។
3.2  មានសមត្ថភាពដោះស្រាយ បញ្ហានានាបានលឿន និងត្រឹមត្រូវ។
3.3  រាយការណ៍មកប្រធានផ្នែកពាក់ពន្ធ័បន្ទាន់ករណីមិនអាចដោះស្រាយបាន។
Job Requirement:
- បានបញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកវិស្វកម្មសំណង់ ឫជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពបេតុង
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់ម៉ាស៊ីនសង្កត់ដុំតេស្ត និង ការថែទាំបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របាន
- មានភាពបត់បែននិងធ្វើការនៅខេត្តបាន

Job Description:
• Analyze market trends and develop sales plans to increase brand awareness, and business opportunity 
• Sourcing, Identify and cooperate with new Sales Agency/business partner 
• Work closely with sales agency to build up and implement business plan to achieve the target 
• Introduce new produce to sales agency 
• Actively up-to-date information of new project and share to sales agency/business partner
• Conduce the research and analyze the market to find out the sales barrier comparing to the competitors 
• Deliver customer presentations and attend sales meetings and agency conferences
• Assist in sales agency marketing activities such as tradeshows, campaigns and other promotional activities
• Evaluate sales agency performance and recommend improvements
• Other duty as per assign.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Sales/Marketing or any related field
• Earned 5 years of experience (in real estate is plus)
• Proficiency in Microsoft Office
• Good in command English 
• Good at sourcing and analytical skill
• Good at negotiation and problem-solving skill 
• Good behavior, Hardworking, Flexible, Honest and Self-motivated
• Able to work under pressure and good at team work

Job Description:
	Develops and implements strategic marketing and sales plans and forecasts to achieve
	corporate objectives for products and services.
	Develops and manages sales/marketing operating budgets.
	Responsible for achieving aggressive monthly targets.
	Manages daily growth and development of assigned campaigns.
	Plans and oversees advertising and promotion activities.
	Formulate, organize and develop marketing activities by identifying the property trend and
new market opportunities.
	Update knowledge sales related legal documentation and property management
	Manage overall sales and marketing activities that include market research, sales
	presentations, analysis of sales and marketing trend, advertising and marketing promotional
events.
	Influences, communicates, motivates and inspires team members to achieve departmental
objectives.
	Control the monthly update of the marketing collators to ensue highest quality standards are
	met
	Monitors and follow-ups on specific tasks and project deliverables.
	Compiles, controls and monitors the budget in accordance with budget allocation/limits.
	Drafts, reviews and implements subject matter related policies, regulations, procedures and
systems of operations.
	Handle the relationship with clients and agents locally and globally.
	Participates in the recruitment process for the Sales & Marketing department, determining
staffing levels for the department.
	Provides recommendations on training and development, planning of subordinates.
	Analyses statistical information pertaining to staff attendance, overtime, leave and addresses
deviations or occurrences of abuse and/ or workplace conflict through the implementation of
corrective measures in accordance with Human Resources Policies and Procedures.
Job Requirement: 	Relevant Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Marketing or Sales or Business Administration or similar.	At least 7 to 10 years of experience within Real Estate / Property Development industry, with atleast 5 years at managerial level.	Experience in strategy development within Marketing & Sales for Properties & Real Estate

Job Description:
1.	Daily Financial Operation Supporting:
o	Daily posting invoice in system
o	Daily cut stock from NAV
o	Maintain all unit payment from customer
o	Support document has been filling for Audit
o	To update customer and AR information
o	Filling document for purpose audit
o	Support AR daily operation of the accounting function smoothly


2.	Support Financial Monthly Report:
o	Accuracy data entry and timely basic

3.	Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o	Support Agency for Stock and Customer status
o	Support Property Mtg team for Property handover
o	Support Legal team for title handover
o	Support Customer Service team for Unit change
o	Support AP team for Commission
o	Support Treasury team for Bank Reconcile
o	Support Credit Collection Team for late customers

4.	NAV System knowledge
o	Accounting system knowledge

5.	Soft skill
o	Honest and responsive
o	Team player
o	Fast learner and willing to learn
o	Well communicate with external and internal
o	Accepts advise and change for self-improvement.
Job Requirement:
1.	កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification
o	University Degree (BA in Accounting and finance or other related field is preferred). 

2.	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge
•	At least one years working experience in Accounting/Finance or related field
•	Proven working experience in construction company is a plus
•	Proven supervisory experience
•	Proven working internal and external customer
•	Knowledge in accounting software (Prefer QuickBooks).


3.	ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills

•	Good at MS Office Word & Excel Skills. 
o	Good at documentation skills,
o	Good at time management skills,
o	Good in English Language.
o	English language proficiency.
o	NAV System is priority.

4.	ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills

o	Good in communication and interpersonal skills,
o	Strong in problem solving and negotiation skills,
o	Strong working commitment, follow up skills,
o	Honesty, friendly and flexible personal manner,
o	Good at stress management and multi working ability.

Job Description:
1. To control material quantity is paralleled with purchase requisition (PR) & BoM
2. Prepare report on potential materials to ensure the actual requirement of material is prepared
3. Implement Warehouse Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) is efficiency
4. Monitor slow moving items are highly control efficiency
5. Adhere all materials are allocated based on items category and proper spaces
6. Prepare re-order level to fulfill the quantity of goods as required
7. Aware of non-usage items ensuring that those are used
8. Monitor or do spot check over physical material
9. Provide feedback and coaching purposes regarding operator error to warehouse team
10. Oversee all inventory transactions are performed and updated properly in the system
11. Control inventory report on time
Job Requirement:
1.	កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification
•	Bachelor’s/Associate degree

2.	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge
•	Over 2 years of work experience in Warehouse
•	2-3 years of work experience in management level
•	Good in English Language
•	MS Office & Email

3.	ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills

•	Good at FIFO and LIFO and FEFO methods
•	Good knowledge of 5s implementation strategy
•	Knowledge in project management, planning skills
•	Good knowledge of storage and organizing

4.	ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills

•	Good at communication and interpersonal skills
•	Leadership and management skills
•	Motivation/Problem solving skills

job title: ផ្នែកសន្តិសុខ (ខេត្តព្រះសីហនុ)
position: ផ្នែកសន្តិសុខ (ខេត្តព្រះសីហនុ)
Job Description:
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យអ្នកចេញ-ចូលឱ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ និងហ្មត់ចត់ ដើម្បីធានាឱ្យបានសុវត្ថិភាព និងសន្តិសុខល្អ
- យាមកាមខាងក្នុង និងខាងមុខផ្ទះ
- ការពារ និងថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិក្នុងផ្ទះកុំឱ្យបាត់បង់
- រក្សាសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងសម្អាតផ្ទះ
- ចូលរួមសហការល្អជាមួយបុគ្គលិក ក្នុងការបំពេញការងារ
- បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗតាមការណែនាំរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល និងប្រធានក្រុមហ៊ុន
Job Requirement:
- មានភាពឯករាជ្យក្នុងការងារ ជាអ្នកឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម ក្នុងកិច្ចការ និងមានភាពទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ
- បេក្ខជន ត្រូវមានរូបសម្បត្តិសមរម្យ 
- ត្រូវមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់
- មានអ្នកធានាច្បាស់លាស់
- មានសុខភាពល្អ និងកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន
- ចេះអាន និងសរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរ
- ផ្តល់អាទិភាពជូនអ្នកមានបទពិសោធន៍
- ផ្តល់អាទិភាពជូនបេក្ខជនដែលស្នាក់នៅខេត្តព្រះសីហនុ

position: ផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល (ខេត្តព្រះសីហនុ)
Job Description:
- ទទួល និងស្វាគមន៍ភ្ញៀវ
- សម្របសម្រួល និងរៀបចំកិច្ចប្រជុំ

Job Description:

Job Description:
•	Support reporting manager to conduct month end closing activities per MEC check list. Records progress and alter major activities behind schedule and take initiative to mitigate. Reconcile accounts as required before closing e.g. intercompany transactions, exchange rate set up etc. 
•	Maintain full list of MJE (manual journal entries) and prepare MJE by collecting input from functions.
•	Prepare TB during month end and propose necessary adjusting entries where necessary. 
•	Support tax manager/executives to reconcile monthly tax filing report from GL point of view. 
•	Maintain MAC (Minimum Acceptance Criteria) procedure to ensure a clean balance sheet with risk assessment approach. Prepare and collect necessary account schedule and review as the 1st layer. Propose schedules to reporting manager for 2nd layer sign off. Summarize major issue trackers and report to finance leadership team per defined time schedule. 
•	Follow up with action plan and propose adjusting entries where appropriate. 
•	Support OCM reporting and review meeting with reporting manager and conduct follow up actions where necessary for cost group: Finance, Professional, Travel, Other cost. 
•	Support Treasury on booking of treasury transactions, payments with GL direct posting. 
•	Support reporting manager to prepare statutory reports per CFRS (Cambodia Financial Reporting Standard). 
•	Support annual audit activities include but not limit to preparing PBC for auditors, supporting evidence, explaining queries, etc. 
•	Support internal customers both finance and non-finance for understanding OCM bookings, any queries regarding financial reports.
Job Requirement:
•	Excellent communication and management skills
•	Hardworking, pro-active and self-motivated
•	Analytical skills to utilize BI and ERP tools for data mining. 
•	Familiar with ERP system (NAV, SAP or Oracle preferable)
•	Excellent Excel 
•	Good command of English
•	Khmer language preferable. 
•	University graduate or above in relevant discipline, and master’s degree preferable
•	3+ years relevant experience in sizable business, controlling experience preferred
•	FMCG experience is preferred
•	ACCA or other accounting qualification holders preferred.

Job Description: - ថែរក្សា និងសំអាតនូវរថយន្តដែលត្រូវបើកបរ- ត្រួតពិនិត្យនិង រៀបចំឡានមុន និងក្រោយពេលប្រគល់រថយន្- បញ្ចូនឯកសារដូចជាសន្លឹកកិច្ចការវិក័យបត្រ និងឯកសារ ផ្សេងៗពីជាន់មួយទៅជាន់ដទៃទៀត- ធានាមិនអោយមានគ្រោះថ្នាក់ឬ ការបះទង្គិចផ្សេងៗទាំងក្នុងនិងក្រៅបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន- បើកបររថយន្តចេញ និងចូល រោងជាងពីប៉ុងសំរាប់ជួសជុលកន្លែងលាងសំអាតរថយន្ត និងពីជាន់មួយទៅជាន់ដទៃ     ទៀតដោយអនុវត្តន៍តាមគោលការណ៍សុវត្ថិភាពដែលបានកំណត់- បើករថយន្តជូនជាងនិងបុគ្គលិកដើម្បីបំពេញភារះកិច្ចតាមខេត្តនិង ក្នុងទីក្រុង- ទិញសំភារះនិងដឹកជញ្ជូនសំភារះ និងឧបករណ៍សំរាប់រោងជាង ឬការិយាល័យ- ផ្លាស់ប្តូរវេនប្រចាំការរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃចុងសប្តាហ៍ នឹងថ្ងៃឈប់សំរាកផ្សេងៗជាក្រុមដើម្បីសម្រួលដល់ប្រតិបត្តិការណ៍           ផ្សេង- ការងារដទៃទៀត ដែលកំណត់ដោយប្រធានក្រុម/ប្រធានផ្នែក
Job Requirement: - មានអាយុចាប់ពី 18 ដល់ 30 ឆ្នាំដែលមានសុពលភាពនៃប័ណ្ណបើកបរប្រភេទD​ (ឃ)- ផ្តល់អាទិភាពចំពេាះអ្នកដែល​បានបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់វិទ្យាល័យ ឬ ការអប់រំទូទៅ- អាចអាន និងសរសេរខ្មែរ​ និង​និយាយភាសាអង់គ្លេសបានច្រើន- ត្រូវមានភាពស្មោះត្រង់,អត់ធ្មត់,រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់,និង មានឆន្ទៈឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ

To make the best choice, the critical survey on market condition such as road condition, fuel quality, driving behavior, weather and so forth is thoroughly conducted and analyzed for the aim of ensuring the conformity of our products. As a result, many different varieties of TOYOTA models have been introduced to satisfy our customer's needs and wants.

Job Description: 	Identify strong potential prospects using initiative and creativity, to generate outbound lead opportunities.	Research local markets, to determine potential sales.	Manage, nurture and convert inbound leads into sales opportunities.	Assess and analyze a prospect’s current process and requirements.	Maintain well organized, up to date and accurate sales information and activity reports 	Provide accurate and timely information as required to higher management.	Work closely with Legal, compliance and technical teams within the company to assure the deal is closed and the client is live.	Gather information on competitors, prices, sales, and methods of marketing and distribution to Provide market feedback to the company 	Prepare and submit weekly and monthly sales reports.	Meet the assigned monthly target.	Planning and coordinating the implementation of business plans.	Adhere to company policies, procedures culture and business ethics.
Job Requirement: 	Bachelor in Business, Economic or relevant field	Language proficiency in spoken and written English, Japanese is plus 	Language proficiency in spoken and written Japanese an advantage	Field banking and FI and works relate to Biz, 	Willing to travel to Province, strong communication, spreadsheet and presentation, problem solving skills, negotiation skills, leading/managing way, team plying skills,Adaptability, emotional maturing or stability include self-motivation and self-initiative	Has knowledge on Agricultural technology is plus 	Encourage Female to apply  	At least 5-10 years working experience with banking, FI- Location : Boeng Keng Kang - Salary Rank : $1300-$1500

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSE & DUTY
1.	Be responsible for answering all incoming calls, resident questions and handling daily mail, Phone Call, Telegram etc, 
2.	Greet prospects and residents when they come into Borey and Condominium , Work with the property management team on incoming applications for prospective residents
3.	Preparing operating reports Ensuring all processes and compliance programs are met Ensuring the efficiency of all building systems
4.	Prepare reports for facility owners and attend regular meetings where the upkeep of the building is on the agenda
5.	Managing facilities planning and space allocation Ensuring all processes and compliance programs are met
6.	Interact with residents, respond to inquiries with high degree of tact and professionalism
7.	Handle certain administrative tasks, Request, Stock Controlling
8.	Work with the property management team and Project team , relevant team on incoming applications for prospective residents
9.	Other Tasks assigned by link management
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENT

1.	កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification
•	Bachelor Degree of Administration, Hotel, Accounting    

2.	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge
•	Experience in hospitality above 1 year 
•	English, Chinese (Option)
•	Understand customer service and analysis customer issue  
•	Administration Skill 
•	MS Office & Email, telegram….. 

3.	ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills

•	Front desk Service 
•	House Keeping
•	Accounting 

4.	ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills

•	Excellence in communication and interpersonal skills
•	Effective team and relationship building
•	Strong knowledge in consultation, coaching and advisory
•	Good at strategic and critical thinking skills

job title: ចុងភៅ (ម្ហូបខ្មែរ)
position: ចុងភៅ (ម្ហូបខ្មែរ)
Job Description: •	ធានាលើប្រតិបត្តិ្កការណ៍ និងគុណភាពផលិតផល ទាំងអស់ត្រូវបានរក្សា នៅក្រោមលក្ខខណ្ឌល្អបំផុត។•	ធានាថារាល់ការដាក់ឱ្យមានបុគ្គលិកតាមទីកន្លែង ត្រូវរៀបចំជាប្រចាំនិងទាន់ពេលវេលា(To do Mise En Place & Station)។•	ធានាថាលើគុណភាព រសជាតិ បរិមាណ ភណ្ឌភាព និងសេវ៉ាកម្មនៃមុខម្ហូបទាំងអស់ ត្រូវបានរៀបចំទៅតាមរូបមន្តត្រឹមត្រូវ។•	ធានាថាបរិវេណផ្ទះបាយរបស់អ្នកត្រូវបានរក្សាភាពស្អាត អនាម័យ និងមានសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់គ្រប់ពេលវេលា។•	ធានាថាបុគ្គលិកផ្នែកចុងភៅនិងសិក្ខាកាមទាំងទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ទាំងចំណេះ ចំនាញត្រឹមត្រូវនិងការណែនាំដ៏ល្អបំផុត។•	រាយការណ៍អំពីភាពមិនប្រក្រតីណាមួយជូនដល់ប្រធានផ្នែក ដូចជាគ្រឿងបរិក្ខារមិនប្រក្រតី	•	ធានាបំពេញតួនាទីក្នុងការអវត្តមានរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកនិងទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះផ្ទះបាយនៅពេលដែលត្រូវដឹកនាំ។•	ធានារាល់ការ បញ្ជារទិញគ្រប់មុខទំនិញឬផលិតផល ត្រូវធានានូវគុណភាព សុវត្តិភាព ការផ្កត់ផ្កង់ ឲ្យសមស្របតាមបរិមាណនៃការលក់ ឬការប្រើប្រាស់។
Job Requirement: •	ធ្វើឱ្យទាន់សម័យជានិច្ចនូវចំនេះដឹងនិងជំនាញរបស់ខ្លួនសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ក្នុងក្រុមការងារ និងក្រុមហ៊ុន។•       មានជំនាញទៅលើម្ហូបខ្មែរ និង​អ៊ឺរ៉ុបខ្លះៗ។•	ជួយជាទៀងទាត់នៅពេលចាំបាច់។•	គោរពនូវច្បាប់វិន័យ និងពេលវេលា។•	មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការសរសេររបាយការណ៍ការ ណែនាំស្តីពីការអនុវត្ត។ មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការបង្ហាញព័ត៌មានប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាពនិងឆ្លើយតបទៅនឹងសំណួរពីក្រុមអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង សមាជិក និងបុគ្គលិក។

Job Description: 1. Developing and executing new product development• Conduct unit/Integration testing • Quality analysis of the programs / system before acceptance testing • Conduct research in areas including Real Estate regulation and process validations.2. Sourcing and verifying the product • Collaborate with business teams to understand and suggest best & efficient solution to cater to business needs• Liaise with suppliers for new Software and Application• Source new Technologies in the innovation process3. Manage and lean team with effective • Enhancement and maintenance application• Ensure the application management functions aligned with company strategy• Analyze problems and implement appropriate technical solutions• Prepare the technical specification • Define and document scope changes during the project life cycle• Collaborate with Operations to achieve project objectives.• Approve Labels to ensure compliance with regulations.• Identifies and advances quality and process improvement opportunities.• Keep current with changes in technologies and regulation for the countries where we do business.• Lead and mentor direct reports while providing developmental opportunities when available.• Other tasks resigned by management
Job Requirement: 1. កំរិតនៃការអប់រំ /Education Qualification• Bachelor/Master degree in field of computer science or related field2. បទពិសោធន៍ការងារនិងចំណេះដឹង /Work Experience & Knowledge• At least 4 years of experience with system and network development• Working experiences in real estate• Experience with high level PHP and Laravel Framework• Understanding of Restful API web service• Understanding of Databases MySQL, MS SQL• Understand trendy design model patterns such at least MVC as an application of OOP• Understanding on Database Design and Analysis• Understanding on SOLID principles or Clean Code• Knowledge with online payment gateway and third-party service integrate• Experience with Loan System• Knowledge with cloud server (Linux)• Basic Knowledge with Agile Development is a plus• Basic Knowledge with DevOps and tools such as Jira, Git Repository and Pipeline, or Jenkins is a plus• Basic Knowledge with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central3. ជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស /Technical Skills• Knowledge of Software Development Life Cycle• Software Development• Web Development• Mobile Application Development• Understanding on Database Design and Analysis• Understanding of Databases MySQL, MS SQL• Knowledge HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Ajax, Json• Knowledge PHP and Laravel Framework• Understanding of Restful API web service• Basic Knowledge with DevOps and tools such as Jira, Git Repository and Pipeline, or Jenkins is a plus• PHP Security• React native, Flutter	4. ជំនាញទន់ /Soft Skills• Analytical and problem-solving skills• Eager to learn and gain new experiences (curious person with passion)• Hard working, patient and be able to work under pressure and complete as deadline• Honestly, Friendly, morality, and high responsible for works• Be a fast learner, smart, flexible, creative person & team player
