Job Description: Job DescriptionUnder the direct supervision of the Systems Support Supervisor, responsible for the support of all information system resources including but not limited to computers, networks, telephones, cell phones, and peripherals. As directed by the QA & System Support Supervisor, support the implementation of information systems and Core system technologies. Tasks include end user support, license tracking, documentation, Training material, Report produce for daily.Scope of Role- Application Support responsibilities, including:    - Provide fourth-level application support. - Application troubleshooting and resolution. - Vendor escalations (through ticketing process and follow-up)- Environment maintenance responsibilities, including: - Environment built-outs. - Training new environments synchronization. - Development and quality assurance (QA) environment maintenance- System administration responsibilities, including: - application installation/maintenance. - Application upgrade. - On-call responsibilities, including: - report any outages - Respond to any failed maintenance/ application notification. - Provide application management support for any weekend work - Analysing system architecture descriptions and translating into operational steps for deployment - Provide feedback to development team regarding required changes or improvement - Other duties may be assigned

Job Description: •	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងតាមដានអគារ-ផ្ទះទាំងអស់ដែលកំពុងសាងសង់ ជាមួយក្រុមសាងសង ក្រុមមេជាង ឬក្រុមវិស្វករ-ល-។•	ជម្រុញ និងពន្លឿនក្រុមសាងសង់ ឬក្រុមវិស្វករតាមកាលកំណក់ ។ •	ត្រួតពិនិត្យរាល់បញ្ហាបច្ចេកទេស គ្រប់ផ្នែក គ្រប់ជាន់ គ្រប់ប្រព័ន្ធ ផ្សេងៗ ពេលទទួលបានអគារ-ផ្ទះដំបូង (សងរួចភ្លាម)។•	កត់ត្រារាល់បញ្ហាបច្ចេកទេស ដែលបានកើតមានពេលកំពុងត្រួតពិនិត្យ ដោយចូលរួមបញ្ញាក់ទទួលស្គាល់ពីក្រុមសាងសង ឬវិស្វករ។•	ផ្ដលពេលវេលា ជួសជុល កែលំអ និងតាមដាន ដល់ក្រុមសាងសង់ ឬវិស្វករយ៉ាងយូរ ១សប្ដាហ៏ត្រូវតែរួច ។•	ផ្ដល់ពណ៌មានជាក់ជាក់ លម្អិតជូនប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រង ដើម្បីតាមដាន និងណែនាំលើកិច្ចការទាំងនោះបន្ថែម ។•	ត្រូវប្រាកដ និងធានាឲ្យបាន អគារ-ផ្ទះ គឺត្រូវបានត្រួតពិនិត្យច្បាស់លាស់ និងមិនមានចំនុចបញ្ហាបច្ចេលទេសផ្សេងៗ ពេលប្រគលជួនអតិថិជនជាដាច់ខាត ។•	សម្របសម្រួល ដោះស្រាយនូវការត្អូញត្អែលើចំណុចបញ្ហាផ្សេងៗទៀត ដែលស្ថិតក្រោមការធានានូវរវាងក្រុមហ៊ុនទៅកាន់អតិថិជន ។•	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៏ប្រគល់អគារ-ផ្ទះប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងសប្តាហ៏បញ្ជូនទៅប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់ ។•	អនុវត្តន៏ និងបំពេញភារៈកិច្ចដែលថ្នាក់លើបានណែនាំ និងកំណត់អោយ ។

Job Description: Scope of RoleA Help desk officer provides technical support and assistance, whether on the phone, in person, or remotely, related to computer systems, network, hardware, and software. A Help desk officer. Job Description•	Provide level 1 technical support across the company and handled projects•	Responding to queries on ITSM system, via email, in person, social media or through remote access.•	Monitoring and Responding in a timely manner base on SLA to service issues and requests on ITSM system•	Offering technical assistance on the delivery, configuration, set up, maintenance, and troubleshooting of computer systems, hardware, and software Telephone system, finger print and CCTV system and network.•	Determine the best solution based on the issue and details provided by customers, repairing and replacing equipment if necessary.•	Ensure security and privacy of networks and computer systems.•	Walk the customer through the problem-solving process •	Escalade the unhandled issues to the next level of support•	Follow-up and update customer status and information •	Pass on any feedback or suggestions by customers to the appropriate channel•	Identify and suggest possible improvements on procedures. •	Other tasks assigned by Supervisor/Manager.•	Documented events and problems and their resolution in logs •	Monthly report to supervisor
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s degree in computer science, information technology, or a similar field.•	1+ years working as a help desk support or relevant field.•	Knowledge of computer hardware systems, networking system, Telephone system, finger print and CCTV system.•	Knowledge of computer software systems, office applications, and operating systems.•	Knowledge of help desk software and remote-access systems.•	Ability to troubleshoot complex hardware and software issues.•	Ability to learn new technologies quickly and willing to learn.•	Ability to work under pressure in autonomy and flexibility.•	Good inter-personal skills, confident and motivated person.•	Patience and understanding.

Job Description:
1.     Operation Management 
Ensure that Operation are running smooth:
1.1  Service: Manage and Make sure that all Machinery are ready to operate for Casting Concrete.
1.1.1      Mixer Truck
1.1.2      Pump Truck
1.1.3      Pump Machine
1.1.4      Wheel Loader
1.2  Productions: Make sure that Mix machine and peoples are ready to produce concrete on time.
1.2.1      Concrete Mixer
1.2.2      Assistant Concrete Mixer
1.2.3      Mix Machine
1.3  Quality Controller: Make sure that the quality of concrete is under control.
1.3.1      Before depart from factory
1.3.2      During casting at site
1.3.3      After casting at site
1.4  Laboratory: Make sure that the testing results of concrete are prepare and issue the report after casting at site.
1.4.1      Testing period: 7days, 14days, 28days …
1.4.2      Testing report from compressive machine
1.4.3      Report from excel by acknowledge from Management.
1.5  Workshop: Repair and Maintenance
1.5.1      Repair: Make sure the machinery is repairing on time, especially once the problem occurs at site
1.5.2      Maintenance: All machinery must have a regular schedule for checkup for maintenance.
1.6  Warehouse: Stock/Inventory
1.6.1      General Materials: Make sure stock movement is OK
1.6.2      Raw Materials: Make sure stock movement is OK and the quantity are maintaining for safety stock

2.     Report Review   
2.1  Review on Daily Production report from mix machine with actual casting
2.2  Review on Daily sale report
2.3  Review on Stock/Inventory report: Raw materials & General Materials
2.4  Review on QC & Labor report
2.5  Review on OT report
2.6  Review on Repair and Maintenance report  

3.     Preparation and Submission
3.1  Prepare and Testing Trail mix with review on mix design

4.     Others
4.1  Document’s control
4.2  Provide training to subordinate related to operation process/work flow
4.3  Schedule to Clean the factory area
4.4  Other’s task is assigned by management
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Business Management or any related field 
- Over 2 years of work experience in Operation.
- 2-4 years of work experience in Supervisor level
- Fluent in English Language
- MS Office & Email
- Operation System
- Strong skills in Operation Management,
- Strong knowledge in Process Improvement & Cost Saving
- Strong knowledge in project management, planning skills
- Excellence in communication, problem solving and interpersonal skills
- Effective team and relationship building
- Strong knowledge in consultation, coaching and advisory
- Good at strategic and critical thinking skills

job title: Disbursement Team Leader ($1000-$1500) Boeng Keng Kang
position: Disbursement Team Leader ($1000-$1500) Boeng Keng Kang
Job Description: 	Develop, maintain and enforce procedures to ensure (i) high standard of internal controls; and (ii) Coherence and integrity of disbursement related data particularly as it impacts the financial statements.	Lead/manage system development activities:•	Evaluate existing systems, identify the need for new systems or modifications to existing systems, identify system issues, and resolve issues identified, in coordination with the Information Systems and Technology department•	Serve as the principal liaison between the Disbursement Division and the institution’s Information Technology Department, particularly on initiatives to continually enhance the efficiency of disbursement processes•	Oversee the data processing and data management of loan and grants to ensure that financial information and disbursement transactions are properly maintained in the if systems	Prepare reports on disbursement activities to Management and the Boards of Directors, as well as verification and exception reports for follow-up by staff in Operations, the Financial Control Department and the Treasury Department.	Be the primary contact person on disbursement harmonization initiatives and activities.	Prepare or update disbursement policies and guidelines for the approval of Management.	Assist as required in training of Regional Member Countries on disbursement procedures and policies	Represent the Disbursement Division on relevant Bank-wide working groups.	Monitor the follow up and implementation of Audit recommendations.	Assist the Division Manager on other assignments, as required
Job Requirement: 	At least filed Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, with a minimum of 5 years of experience	Good knowledge of accounting and financial information systems.	Experience with internal audit and internal control systems and procedures, with the ability to assess such systems and recommend remedial action where necessary	Understanding of management information systems and the application of new information technologies	Capacity to function as a member of multi-disciplinary team, search for common ground, and where appropriate recommend decisive actions	Proven ability to manage and deliver multiple concurrent projects on time.	Strong communication skills, with the ability to prepare, present and discuss technical issues in a manner understandable to non-technicians.	Ability to communicate (write and speak) effectively in English or Japanese with a working knowledge of the other language.- Location : Boeng Keng Kang - Salary Rannk : $1000-$1500
Contact Info: Contact Information Belly (Mr.)  HR Manager 069222004 hrecruitment88@gmail.com Phnom Penh 1st Floor of Altos Hotel, St.148 Corner St.19, Sangkat Phsar Kandal II, Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 069222004

Job Description:
1.   ការងារប្រតិបត្តិប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
1.1  ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពបេតុង(ល្បាយបេតុង ឬស្លាំ) នៅការដ្ឋាន និង ការថែទាំម៉ាស៊ីនសង្កត់ដុំតេស្ត។
1.2  ពិនិត្យការចាក់ដុំតេស្ត​ (Mold Test Concrete) ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
1.3  ពិនិត្យការធ្វើស្លាំរបស់ក្រុមការងារ នៅការដ្ឋានត្រឹមត្រូវ តាមបច្ចេកទេស។
1.4  ត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដាន ការថែទាំដុំតេស្ត និងការសង្កត់បានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
1.5  ត្រួតពិនិត្យ តាមដាន ទៅលើវត្ថុធាតុដើមអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។  

2.   ការកត់ត្រា ការរៀបចំ និងការធ្វើរបាយការណ៏   
2.1  តាមដាននិងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ស្លាំ នៅតាមការដ្ឋានអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងជាប្រចាំ
2.2  រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សង្កត់ដុំតេស្ត អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ និងទាន់ពេលវេលា

3.   ការងារផ្សេងៗ
3.1  ផ្តល់ដំណឹងរាល់បញ្ហាកើតមាន មកប្រធានផ្នែកពាក់ពន្ធ័ និងក្នុងGroup ដោយភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនឹងដំណោះស្រាយ។
3.2  មានសមត្ថភាពដោះស្រាយ បញ្ហានានាបានលឿន និងត្រឹមត្រូវ។
3.3  រាយការណ៍មកប្រធានផ្នែកពាក់ពន្ធ័បន្ទាន់ករណីមិនអាចដោះស្រាយបាន។
Job Requirement:
- បានបញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកវិស្វកម្មសំណង់ ឫជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពបេតុង
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់ម៉ាស៊ីនសង្កត់ដុំតេស្ត និង ការថែទាំបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របាន
- មានភាពបត់បែននិងធ្វើការនៅខេត្តបាន

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSE & DUTY

1.	Facility Management
•	Property Handover and follow project to handover private unit and house to house owner
•	Work with facility management operations; support life safety and security protocols; maintain facilities to be highly functional, clean, and comfortable.
•	Oversee maintenance, repair, construction and renovation work; coordinate work from start to finish.

2.	Leasing Management 
•	Plan and implement the tenancy mix 
•	Conduct regular inspection of properties (vacant units and tenanted units)
•	Network and gather market information on competition and market trends Report on areas that requires attention, repairs, enhancements, etc
•	Lead in negotiation of tenancy agreements, manage lease renewals and arrears

3.	Operation 
•	Preparing operating reports and budgets
•	Ensuring all processes and compliance programs are met Ensuring the efficiency of all building systems
•	Managing facilities planning and space allocation Ensuring all processes and compliance programs are met
•	Preparing cost estimates for moves and equipment

4.	Property Controlling
•	Planning building maintenance and operational programs
•	Maintain complete and accurate property files and records, according to CEC systems, with an emphasis on documentation for future reference. Coordinate with Executive Education and Initiatives Director procedures for processing and distributing information. Provide prompt, detailed and accurate general status reports on all properties assigned.
•	Establish and maintain collaborative working relationships with all tenants and CEC Executive Leadership Team. Keep abreast of new technologies, systems and procedures related to property management.
•	Ensure the security of the building by researching and implementing various security measures, such as surveillance cameras or security staff members

5.	Utility Controlling 
•	Performs routine and preventative maintenance and repairs on booster pumps and equipment, lift stations and equipment, and treatment plant system components.
•	Set up plan and arrange technician to installs new and/or replaces motors, transformers, breakers, controllers, control valves, PLC's, and other electrical equipment as well as conduit, junction boxes, pulling cables and wires.
•	Record and Collect the utility fee

6.	Administrative work 
•	Handle certain administrative tasks, such as preparing reports for facility owners
•	Interview and hire certain facility employees and contractors, such as maintenance staff and janitorial services
•	Prepare reports for facility owners and attend regular meetings where the upkeep of the building is on the agenda

job title: Collection Team Leader ($500-$560) Boeng Keng Kang
position: Collection Team Leader ($500-$560) Boeng Keng Kang
Job Description: 	Supervise assigned accounts to identify unresolved debts.	Develop effective repayment plans.	Follow-up with clients on overdue accounts.	Oversee all monthly payments and refunds.	Research and implement effective collection techniques.	Perform all administrative duties related to ensuring office efficiency.	Create monthly credit records.	Respond to client account queries in a timely and professional manner.	Overseeing staff members and ensuring the accurate and timely invoicing of customers.	Setting payment collection goals and targets for the department.	Creating and implementing a strategy to improve the collection of outstanding credit.	Implementing collection policies and procedures to avoid excessive outstanding credit.	Ensuring that the company policy on recoveries is followed and that it is in line with state and federal regulations.	Implementing deadlines for invoicing and payment collection.	Negotiating with customers in cases when non-payment occurs.	Preparing monthly feedback reports on payment collections.	Remaining informed of any legislative procedural training regarding debt collection.	Training and mentoring of staff members in the collections department.
Job Requirement: 	Bachelor’s degree in finance, accounting, or a related field.	3–5 years’ experience as a collection’s manager.	Experience with accounting software such as QuickBooks and General Ledger and advanced knowledge of MS Excel.	The ability to work accurately and independently.	Good verbal and written communication skills.	Excellent analytical skills and an eye for detail.	Outstanding leadership and managerial skills.	Strong time and people management skills.	Ability to work to strict deadlines.- Location : Boeng Keng Kang - Salary Rank : $500-$560
Contact Info: Contact Information Belly (Mr.)  HR Manager 069222004 hrecruitment88@gmail.com Phnom Penh 1st Floor of Altos Hotel, St.148 Corner St.19, Sangkat Phsar Kandal II, Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 069222004

Job Description: -Support manager in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources-Implement action plans (e.g. make regular calls/visits, take orders, etc.) to achieve sales targets for assigned businesses/territories-Track self/team progress against key performance indicators and sales plans. Prioritize and review daily sales activities performed-Execute sales activities for assigned businesses/territories, including product portfolios and marketing plan introductions, order taking, marketing display set-ups and in-store merchandising-Prepare quotation/tender prices, delivery and commercial terms, in accordance with company policies-Report on the activities and products of the competitors via inputs to the competition reports-Record sales data for reporting and tracking purposes. Maintain relevant customer data in appropriate customer relationship management databases
Job Requirement: -Demonstrate basic knowledge and understanding of the industry/market/competitors/customers-Demonstrate basic knowledge in assigned territories/products/services and strong selling skills-Demonstrate strong communication and negotiation skills-Demonstrate basic research and analytical skills-Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)-Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spoken-Soft skills: Good communication, Honesty-Diploma or professional qualification in Business Studies/Marketing/Economics or a related discipline-Work experience: Up to two years' experience in a similar role
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description:

- Provide general administrative supports to the HR
department

Job Description:
• To adhere to all rules, regulations and hotel policies.
• To have a perfect understanding and knowledge of the Hotel Collective Bargaining Agreement. 
• To anticipate the volume of business, taking into consideration the occupancy, the waiter. holiday, activity in the hotel and community in general
• To maintain communications with all other hotel departments.
• To keep F&B management informed on all items of interest.
• All areas of guest service and core standards including the creation of new ideas to assist with the continuous development of Homeware's image as a leader in food and service offerings and as a Food & Beverage destination.
• To review and update job description for all concerned personnel once a year.
• Daily supervision, coordination and direction of all colleagues.
• Maintaining high staff morale and team spirit within the department.
• Leading and coaching all colleagues and leaders in the department.  
• Overall recruiting, staffing and scheduling ensuring adequate staffing levels to satisfy guest needs.
• Establish/maintain and implement 5-star service levels.
• Create and implement colleague-training initiatives.
• Implementing service standards and follow weekly on the LQA requirements.
• Creating and implementing a preventative cleaning and maintenance program.
• Adhere to all budget guidelines.
• Work together with the culinary & stewarding team to ensure that all food service meets or exceeds guest expectations and to promote teamwork as a strong component of the daily service culture.
• Creation and implementation of guest preference programs.
• Monitoring and continued development of Food & Beverage controls.
• Control and analyzes the level on the Quality of Service, Market Matrix Index, Employees Satisfaction (EES), Operating Equipment, Grooming Standard, LQA standards.
• Conduct Training, Promotional Plans, Interviewing, Employee Orientation, Job Performance Management.
• Works closely with F&B Management to create market-oriented activities. 
• Participate in service as necessary in accordance with restaurant needs.
• Create and innovate new ideas and promotion to generate revenue.
• Liaise with Executive Chef to ensure exceptional work standards.
• Ensuring Safe and Healthy work environment. 
• Participate in the preparation of the Food and Beverage department budget and goals.
• Schedule guest reservation and arrange for private functions or special events.
• Attend and participate in the daily Food and Beverage meetings.
• Check opening and closing duties assigned to the entire colleague.
• Maintain staff log book up dated
• Conduct pre-meal briefing
• Track and compile daily, monthly, yearly sales reports.
• Ensure that the outlet maintain the high-quality service standard are implemented.
• Perform daily checks on staffing level, quality control, maintenance and cleanliness.
• Other duties as assigned by Asst. Director of Food & Beverage and Director of Food & Beverage.
• To have a complete knowledge of the local labor laws and contracts.
• To have a complete knowledge of the local liquor and food service laws.
• To be prepared to accept, understand the values of the local customs, culture, religion and laws.
• Issue quotation of mice
• Others assigned by manager

Job Description:
1. Supervise the day to day cleaning of hotel public areas.
2. Perform routine inspections of all public areas, service areas, and storerooms.
3. Schedule and supervise deep cleaning and any other projects.
4. Supervise and coordinate pest control, flowers, plants and periodical deep cleaning operations on all area of responsibility.
5. Anticipate guest’s needs, respond promptly and acknowledge all guests, however busy and according to time of day.
6. Monitor and maintain cleanliness, sanitation and organization of assigned work areas.
7. Assign duties and coordinate breaks for assigned staff.
8. Clean public areas in emergency situations.
9. Efficiently manage stock control and the maintenance of all equipment.
10. Issue supplies/goods to staff at beginning of shift in order to control inventory.
11. Report all maintenance defects and follow up with Engineering.
12. Complete work orders form for equipment maintenance or repairs and submit to Housekeeping desk control.
13. Complete all paperwork and closing duties before leaving.
14. Informs Management about any damage, theft or loss to hotel property.
15. Answer inquires to maintain controls and ensure guest satisfaction.
16. Provide feedback on staff performance and Report disciplinary problems to Executive Housekeeper.
17. Perform any other duties assigned by the housekeeper.

• Education: Must be BBA graduate in hospitality and related is preferable 
• Work Experience: At least 4-year hospitality management experience in the same position with hospitality industry, and minimum experience of 1 to 3+ years in the same position at 3 star or 4 star hotel

Job Description:
Roles and Responsibilities:  
Be responsible for the supply of products and services essential for our company’s operations (Project and HQ) with the most cost-effective deals and suppliers, and to discover the best ways to minimize our procurement expenses so that the company can invest in its growth and people.
-	Find acceptable suppliers/Vendors
-	Buy good products with low price (by bargaining or finding among alterative vendors)
-	Make the quotation of price and purchase contract with the suppliers on credit (Update new quotation when there are any changes of prices)
-	To check all PR of the company  
-	To check quotation from vendors and submit to Direct Supervisor
-    To process all PO to vendor and confirm delivery 
schedule with vendor
-	Prepare purchasing documents (Purchase Request, Payment Request, Cash Request, Request Letter, Cash Advance & Cash Advance  Clearance)
-	  To Verify all completed documents (Invoice, Goods Received Note, PR … etc.) from Procurement Assistant and submit to Accounting Department
-	Prepare official documents of payment voucher (paid invoice, receipt)
-	Confirm the reason before purchasing
-	Supply the ordered materials correctly and on time
-	Supply materials that are ordered with plan at least two days in advance (without plan for materials that can’t find from any vendors near building Site)
-	Calacuter Wage of worker 
-	To Perform other duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
-	Knowledge of procurement techniques
-	Talent in negotiations and networking
-	Good command of both spoken and written English
-	Proficiency in Microsoft office application
-	Being able to work in team
-	Being honest, high commitment, good attitude, open-minded and work ethic.
-	Strong interpersonal, and problem solving skills,
-	Ability to multi-task, work under pressure and meet deadlines required.
-	Being highly responsible for work completion with accuracy and deadline;
-	Being able to travel to sites/provinces

** Non-Financial Benefit 
- Working Only from Mon-Saturday
- Annual Leave 18 days Per year 
- Sick Leave 
- Special Leave 7 day Per year
- Maternity Leave 90 day Per year  
- Public Holiday Follow by MOLVT 
- Training Opportunities
- Promotion Opportunities

- For more information/ Telegram : 085 638 648

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
2- HLHI (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
3- Royal Hong Lai Haut One Company Limited.
4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Job Description:
• Set Strategic goal and lead the Academic Department to achieve the set goal in accordance with school vision, mission and SLOs
• Report monthly achievement to the School Director and BOD and propose action plan for next month and assist the School Director and BOD in setting school goals and directions of the campus.
• Represent school in the community/media and participate in the school marketing activities, fundraising events, celebrations or other activities to promote school reputation and public awareness.
• Work with department managers to make sure ALL is in compliance with the law and regulations of Cambodia and with the requirements from relevant authorities - Ministry of Education, Youth and Sport (MoEYS), Ministry of Labor, Immigration Office, etc.
• Guide and collaborate with International Principals and Coordinators to evaluate the success of the international curriculum and the effectiveness of the teaching based on data of student learning outcomes from internal assessments and external assessment
• Lead and support Khmer teachers in their work duties including reviewing lesson plans, improving teaching standards/approach and providing training and professional development plan in the Khmer Program,
• Lead and support the Academic Team in their work duties including collecting/reviewing data on student grades, progress, learning approach, behavior, attendance and proposing action plan for improvement with relevant faculty members/managers
• Conduct performance review of staff in the Academic Department and Khmer Faculty and provide reflective feedback and support staff to achieve the set professional growth
• Create positive school climate and culture of thriving for excellence within the whole school
• Review and propose school procedures and policies for teaching staff and academic team members to improve the internal operations and the achievement of guiding statements
• Meet and solve all issues raised by teaching staff, academic principals and program coordinators in accordance with school policies and guiding statements
• Develop professional development plans or training for the Academic Team and Khmer Teachers
• Organize promotional events for school to the public, in the media or session for parent or public,
• Organize sessions to cultivate student culture of growth mindset, desire to learn and independent learners in accordance with the character profile adopted school wide,
• Organize academic competitions and lead students in various educational events/competitions outside of school
• Liaise with third parties to create partnership, improve school programs, and exchange good practices and friendship.
• Meet with parents to discuss about student academic as well as other concerns
• Keep good record of students and academic department in accordance with the school policies and requirements from MoEYS
• Collaborate with MoEYS for licensing and other compliance
• Attend and conduct educational trainings and conferences as needed,
• Attend and conduct academic meetings with relevant staff members and teachers,
• Perform other managerial tasks in accordance with the campus management.
Job Requirement:
- Master's degree in English of Art or Advance
- At least 5 years experience
- Update English programs
- Teachers Training
- Projects Management
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, integrity and willing to work as a team.

- Export shipping arrangement, Freight tracing, Handover the required documents to acct team to issue invoice

Job Description:
1. Implement quality management process and conduct a process review.

8. Review the quality of all materials at the site, ensure compliance with all project specifications and quality, and collaborate with the department for all material procurement and quality materials.			
9. Manage all work methods, maintain knowledge on quality assurance standards, monitor continuous.
10. Create process training and safety meeting arrangement.						
11. Other tasks assign by head of company

Qualified applicants may submit their CVs and cover letters to the Human Resources Department.

The Human Resources Department
CamGSM Co., Ltd.
No. 33 Preah Sihanouk Blvd., Phnom Penh
Tel. 017 333 589 | 077 906 555 | 077 907 555
Email: careers@cellcard.com.kh

Closing Date: 05 March 2021
Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

Job Description: •	Ensure all lab results are released accurately on time.•	Manage and develop workflow process to assure reliable results and pre-defined TAT.•	Validate and be responsible for all lab results •	Lab manager leads lab supervisors, senior lab techs and all lab staff.•	Lead and develop adequate SOPs to determine the accuracy, precision, other performance of the method and bio-risk management.•	Create work environment that encourages all staff to participate actively in the growth of the business •	Supervise and be sure that all approved SOPs are applied properly.•	Ensure that all SOPs applied are compliant to the good practice in laboratory standard (ISO 15189) and supervise actively in corrective action plans •	Ensure that a quality control and quality assurance program assignments which assign by Board Director.

Job Description: •General Planning: conceptualizes the broad goals of the school and plans accordingly to ensure that procedures and schedules are implemented to carry out the total school program.•General Coordination: ensures that the school program is compatible with the legal, financial and organizational structure of the school system. The principal defines the responsibilities and accountability of staff members and develops plans for interpreting the school program to the community.•Enhancement of Personnel Skills: provides activities which facilitate the professional growth of the school staff and enhance the quality of the instructional program.•School Objectives: identifies the annual objectives for the instructional, extracurricular, and athletic programs of the school.•Curriculum Objectives: ensures that instructional objectives for a given subject and/or classroom are developed, and involves in the development of specific curricular objectives to meet the needs of the school program. •Establishes Formal Work Relationships: evaluates student progress in the instructional program by means that include the maintaining of up-to-date student data. supervises and appraises the performance of the school staff.•Supplies and Equipment: manages, directs, and maintains records on the materials, supplies and equipment which are necessary to carry out the daily school routine. •Provide leadership, analysis and advice in relation to policies and procedures regarding students services. •Develops, implements, monitors, and reviews tactical and operational plans, procedures and systems.•Work with the school Coordinators, managers and supervisors to ensure that applicable services and programs are planned, developed, regularly reviewed and updated, ensuringquality standards for program review.
Job Requirement: - Cambodian Nationality- Master Degree in Education Management or General Management or equivalence degree;- Certificate of Pedagogy in teaching is preferable;- At least five-years experience in school management(with international curriculum is preferable);- At least five-year teaching experience (with international school is preferable);- Excellent oral and written communication skills;- Excellent management and leadership skills;- Knowledge of budget planning;- Knowledge of child development ;- Ability to work independently and under pressure;- Knowledge of project management and leading;- Good command of computer (Ms. Word, Excel, Power Point, E-mail, and Internet....)

Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.

position: បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈ ឧបករណ៏ និង សេវាកម្ម (ភេទប្រុស) ($300-$600)
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈ ឧបករណ៏ និង សេវាកម្ម មានតួនាទីជួយសម្រួលការងារក្នុងផ្នែកដូចជា៖
- ​ធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងធ្វើការវិភាគសំណើពីអ្នកស្នើរសុំ
- ​វិភាគទីផ្សារ និងស្វែងរកអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ 
-​ ប្រៀបធៀប និងវិភាគសំនើរដែលបានពីអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់
-​ ចរចារកិច្ចសន្យាព្រមព្រៀងតម្លៃ និងធ្វើការបញ្ជាទិញ
-​ តាមដានលើការបញ្ជាទិញដែលនាំមកនូវគុណភាព និង សេវាកម្ម 
-​​ និងរៀបចំឯកសារនិងរបាយការណ៍ពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗ

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
- ស្វែងរកអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ដែលមានសក្កានុភាព
- ប្រៀបធៀប និងប៉ាន់ស្មានបានពីអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់
- ស្វែងយល់ពីលក្ខខណ្ឌនៃការដឹកជញ្ចូនទំនិញ និងការទូទាត់
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពនៃទំនិញដែលបានបញ្ជាទិញ
- ធានាអោយបាននូវការកត់ត្រាថ្មីៗនៃទំនិញដែលបានទិញ ពត៌មានការដឹកជញ្ជូន និងវិក័យបត្រ
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍លើការបញ្ជាទិញ រួមបញ្ចូលទាំងការវិភាគថ្លៃដើម
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យកម្រិតស្តុក 
- ផ្តល់ពត៌មាននៃការអភិវឌ្ឍថ្មីៗក្នុងការិយាល័យបញ្ជាទិញដូចជាការប្រែប្រួលតម្លៃ លក្ខខ័ណ្ឌទីផ្សារ និងផលិតផលថ្មីៗ

Job Description:

Job Description:

- Excellent time management and organizational skills
- Outstanding communication, interpersonal and leadership skills
- Strong technical knowledge
- Critical thinker and problem-solving skills
- Self-motivated with good leadership qualities

Job Description:
ABOUT THE ROLE
The Sales Officer will be directly responsible for all application forms from client by preparing, communicating, checking and supporting as well as be involved with credit officer. He/she would inform directly to Supervisor and Branch Manager.

- Greet and welcome customers/clients by morality and ethics
- Give and promote all the Company’s products, information and services to clients by clearly and concisely
- Collect and prepare all required documents from lessee
- Cooperate and assist with Credit Officer to collect more documents from lessee and guarantor
- Check and make sure all credit criteria of lessee and guarantor is fully completed and organized
- Rechecks and finalizes all the client’s background, credit information after collected by the Credit Officer
- Insert data entry of lessee’s information and send back to Branch/Head Office

Job Description:
** ABOUT THE ROLE
The Field Officer will be directly responsible for all loan processes by preparing, tracking, facilitating and supporting to all existing/new customers. He/she would inform directly to Supervisor and Branch Manager.

• គ្រប់គ្រងដំណើរការនៃប្រាក់កម្ចីការដែលបានដាក់ពាក្យសុំនិងការវាយតំលៃទាំងអស់ដោយធ្វើការយ៉ាងរលូនជាមួយក្រុមលក់និងទីផ្សារ / អតិថិជន
• ផ្សព្វផ្សាយនិងផ្តល់នូវផលិតផលនិងសេវាកម្មរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនយើងដល់អតិថិជនដោយទំនុកចិត្តនិងវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
• សំភាសន៍និងរៀបចំឯកសារសម្រាប់របស់អ្នកខ្ចីដើម្បីដំណើរការពាក្យសុំដែលបានអនុវត្ត
• បំពេញរាល់ឯកសារនិងទម្រង់ពាក្យសុំរបស់អ្នកខ្ចី
• វិភាគនិងបង្ហាញពីភាពត្រឹមត្រូវនៃសមត្ថភាពនិងប្រាក់ចំណូលរបស់អ្នកខ្ចី
• ធ្វើការណាត់ជួបជាមួយអ្នកខ្ចីមុនពេលធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យនៅតាមមូលដ្ឋាន
• ប្រមូលព័ត៌មាននិងទិន្នន័យរបស់អ្នកខ្ចីទាំងអស់មុនពេលរាយការណ៍ទៅអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងតាមថ្នាក់
• ធ្វើការជូនដំណឹងអំពីស្ថានភាពដល់អ្នកខ្ចីបន្ទាប់ពីទទួលបានការយល់ព្រមឬបដិសេធពីថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង។
• ធានានូវប្រាក់កម្ចីនិងដំណើរការស្របតាមបទបញ្ជាអនុលោមភាព
• អនុវត្តមុខងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។

Job Description:
** ABOUT THE ROLE
Field Collection Officer will be mostly responsible for all bad debt or late payment from the customer by taking fast action, finding a solution, and checking the roots of the problem. He/she would inform directly to Supervisor and Manager.

- Ensure the collection result of each team under supervision is improved and achieved based on the KPI set
- Work with efficiency, quality, and on-time of calling to the lessee by complied to Collection Policy, Guideline,
Procedure and arrangement from Field Collection Supervisor or Managers
- Handle and responsible to lessees that allocated in the Collection System
- Ensure that well aware of checking/verifying the Repayment/Documentation data
- Prepare Daily Visitation Plan and shall visit any locations of lessee/influent person to collect cash/repossess such as House/Office/Hometown/Other places if needed
- Analyze the lessee's history/information to find alternative actions until the lessee paid successfully
- Record Calling/Visiting Activities Result into Collection System on time and accuracy.
- Skillful negotiates with good communication to collect cash/repossess from the lessee or influent person without
complaint
- Manages and closely controls “To-Do-List” and reviews unpaid lessee to find any efficient actions
- Follow-up the daily, weekly, and monthly collection result/report and/or meeting with Supervisor
- Build a good relationship with local authorities to find solutions and take the best action against the lessee
- Repossess the asset from lessee/influent person that lost payment capacity/break Lease Agreement base to
Collection Policy or Management assigned
- Prepare serious cases/action plans for Supervisor in order to get any support
- Report any suspicious cases that suspected as fraud cases on repayment
- Prepare/Send list lessee who lost contact to Supervisor in order to conduct hometown visiting.
- Well collaboration/support teamwork to improve Collection Performance.
- Performs other duties as assigned by management.
- Be a person who focuses on Result-Oriented and high commitment to improvement/self-develop
- Performs other duties as assigned by Supervisor/Management.
Job Requirement:
- Pursuing/Graduated Bachelor Degree in Finance, Banking, or other related fields.
- At least 1-year experience in bad debt recovery or loan collection
- Understanding in MFIs, Banking, and/or Financial Leasing Company is a plus
- Be able to communicate in English is a plus
- Be honest, teamwork, and good communication skill.
- Computer literacy (Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Access, Internet & Email).

Job Description:
•	Analyzing and supporting corporate systems (servers, computers, network, active directory etc.), performing checks, updates, and backups.

•	Require a general knowledge and awareness of agency operations, policies and procedures, and a knowledge of major activities within the work area.
•	Assign, collaborate and follow up all received issues to responsible technical. 
•	Virtual infrastructure and operating system maintenance.
•	Documentation of systems and procedures.

•	Experiences with Microsoft 365 Administration.
•	Excellent problem-solving skills.
•	At ease with prioritizing tasks.

•	Good spoken and written English.
•	Hard-working and well-responsible in works.

job title: បុគ្គលិកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក ($255-$400)
company_name: ជាង បាក់ វណ្ណ ហុង
position: បុគ្គលិកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក ($255-$400)
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
• បុគ្គលិកកាន់ស្តុកគ្រឿងត្រូវបែងចែក មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការគ្របគ្រងស្តុកចេញចូល សំរាប់គ្រឿងមិនទាន់សម្រេច ហើយយកគ្រឿងទាំងអស់នោះទៅ ដំណើរការអោយល្អ និង ទាន់ពេលវេលា។

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
• ទទួលគ្រឿងត្រូវបែងចែក ពីប្រធានក្រុម បញ្ជូនទៅផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ (ប្រគល់និងទទួលមកវិញ)មានដូចជា: 
- គ្រឿងចាស់ទិញភ្ញៀវ និង ទិញពីសាខាបាត់ដំបង (FGBI)
- គ្រឿងចាស់ត្រលប់ពីសាខា
- គ្រឿងបដិសេធខាងកុម្ម៉ង់ និង ខាងទូ ពីផ្នែកលក់
- គ្រឿងស្តុកលោកស្រី អក្គនាយិកាឈប់ពាក់
- គ្រឿងតាំងទូត្រូវផ្លាស់ប្តូរម៉ូត 
- កាំសល់ខាងកម្ម៉ង់ពី ក្រុមស្តុកគ្រឿងក្នុងផលិតកម្ម 
- កាំសល់ទូតាំងពី Theary ក្រុមគណនេយ្យចំនូល
- -ល-
• សំរាប់គ្រឿងដែលត្រូវដំណើរការមានទៅ :
- ផ្នែកខាត់សំអាត (លាងមុនពេលយកទៅពិនិត្យគុណភាពគ្រឿង)
- ផ្នែកពិនិត្យគុណភាពគ្រឿងដាំរួច (ពិនិត្យពេជ្រ, ត្បូង, ពែក្ស, គុជ,,,, ក្រចាប់ និងរាងរបស់គ្រឿងនីមួយៗ)
- ផ្នែកដាំជាន់ផ្ទាល់ដី (ប្រធានក្រុមដាំ លោក ទា ម៉េង) (ពីនិត្យលើនាឡិកា)
- ទៅថតរូប (ដើម្បីមានងាយស្រួលដំណើរការជាមួយផ្នែកពាក់ពន្ធ័ និង សំរាប់អ្នកលក់ផ្ញើរម៉ូតជូនភ្ញៀវពិនិត្យ)
• សរសេរលេខកូដ, ថ្ងៃខែឆ្នាំ, ប្រភេទគ្រឿង នៅលើរូបភាពនីមួយៗ ក្នុងកុំព្យួទ័រ និង សរសេរលេខកូដ, ថ្ងៃខែឆ្នាំនៅលើថង់ និង ប្រអប់ដាក់គ្រឿង។
• បែងចែកគ្រឿងទៅតាមប្រភេទ : 
- គ្រឿងសំរេចចូលទូ: សរសេរពីពត័មានគ្រឿង(ខាត់ឡើងវិញ, ក្រូម៉េហាយលាយ, ក្រូម៉េសអស់…) និង ផ្ទេរ (គ្រឿង,ឯកសារ) ទៅ ផ្នែកពិនិត្យគុណភាពគ្រឿងសំរេច។
- គ្រឿងកាត់កែឬជួសជុល: សរសេរពីបញ្ហាគ្រឿងត្រូវកែ និងផ្ទេរ (គ្រឿង,ឯកសារ) ទៅ ក្រុមស្តុកគ្រឿងត្រូវកែច្នៃ។
- គ្រឿងមិនស្អាតរុះ: ករណីក្រោយការពិនិត្យគុណភាពពី (ផ្នែកពិនិត្យគុណភាពគ្រឿងដាំរួច ) ដោយមានការយល់ព្រមពី
ជំនួយការលោកប្រធានក្រុមហ៊ុន, ពីលោកប្រធានក្រុមហ៊ុន និង មានដំណើរការផ្ទេរ (គ្រឿង,ឯកសារ) ទៅផ្នែករុះរើ។
• ធ្វើដំណើរការរកតម្លៃលក់របស់នាឡិកា លើកទី2 
- ធ្វើតារាងភាគរយសំរាប់ពិនិត្យគុណភាពតាមប្រពន្ធ័ Excel និងប្រគល់ជូន (ប្រធានក្រុមដាំ លោក ទា ម៉េង) ដើម្បីពិនិត្យគុណភាពសំរាប់ដាក់តម្លៃលក់លើកទី2 )។
• ធ្វើដំណើរការរកតម្លៃលក់គ្រឿងFGBI (Hong kong) លើកទី2
- ធ្វើតារាងភាគរយពិនិត្យគុណភាពតាមប្រពន្ធ័ Excel និងប្រគល់ជូន ផ្នែកពិនិត្យគុណភាពគ្រឿងដាំរួច ដើម្បីពិនិត្យគុណភាពសំរាប់ដាក់តម្លៃលក់លើកទី2 ) ។
• ដំណើរការគ្រឿងដែលមិនទាន់គ្រប់លក្ខណះ ទៅបំពេញបន្ថែមដូចជា : មានគ្រាប់ជ្រុះស្រាប់ ពីគ្រឿងទិញពីភ្ញៀវ , ទិញ ពីសាខាបាត់ដំបង (FGBI), គ្រឿងបដិសេធពីសាខាសៀមរាប(SBSR) ដូរពេជ្របែក, ត្បូង, គុជ, និល-ល- ក្នុងករណីអត់ចូលជួសជុល។
• រៀបចំរូបភាពរបស់គ្រឿងនីមួយៗ ដែលមាននៅក្នុងស្តុកផុសចូលគ្រុប Telegram ប្រចាំដើមសប្តាហ៏ (ថ្ងៃច័ន្ទ) ជូនថ្នាក់អគ្គនាយិកា,ជំនួយការអគ្គនាយិកា, សាខាបាត់ដំបង,សៀមរាប និង ផ្នែកលក់គ្រឿងស្រាប់ពិនិត្យ។
• ផ្ទៀងលេខកូដគ្រឿងមុនពេលរាប់ស្តុក (ប្រចាំខែនីមួយ)
• រាប់ស្តុកគ្រឿងនិងផ្ទៀងជាមួយចំនួនគ្រឿងក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ NAV ជាមួយផ្នែកស្តុក នៅក្នុងទីចាត់ការហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និង ជាមួយបុគ្គលិកសវកម្ម
• បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមតម្រូវការរបស់តួនាទីសាមី
• បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមតម្រូវការរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង

Occasional Duties (ភារកិច្ចម្តងម្កាល):
• ប្រគល់និងទទួលគ្រឿងស្តុកត្រូវបែងចែក ទៅផ្នែកលក់ខ្ចីជូនភ្ញៀវពិនិត្យ 
• ជួយសម្រួលការងារ ដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនៅក្នុងផ្នែក ។
Job Requirement:
Qualification (គុណវុឌ្ឍិដែលត្រូវការ):
• កម្រិតសិក្សាបរិញ្ញបត្រគណនេយ្យ ធនាគារ និងហរិញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ
• មានបទពិសោធន៌ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធយ៉ាងតិច ១ ឆ្នាំ ពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក

Skill (ជំនាញ):
• មានចំណេះដឹងក្នុងការកាន់បញ្ជី និងគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក
• មានការយល់ដឹងទូទៅពីការគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុកទំនិញ
• មានសមត្ថភាពវិភាគ និងគណនាលេខ
• មានជំនាញក្នុងការសរសេរ ការទំនាក់ទំនង និងការសហការ
• មានសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រង វិភាគ និងបញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យ

Physical Fitness (កាយសម្បទា):
• មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន
• ស្មារតីវាងវៃ រហ័សរហួន

Personal Characteristics (បុគ្គលិកលក្ខិណៈផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន):
• ម៉ត់ចត់ និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ
• មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ   ស្លូតបូត 
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងគោរពពេលវេលា 
• ព្យាយាម និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់
• ចេះសហការណ៍ និងចេះជួយគ្នា ធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម

job title: Digital Marketing 	(បន្ទាន់_១ នាក់)
position: Digital Marketing 	(បន្ទាន់_១ នាក់)
Job Description:
-	របាយការណ៍ជូន៖ អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
-	ប្រភេទការងារ៖ ពេញម៉ោង(ធ្វើការ ៦ ថ្ងៃ/សប្តាហ៍ សម្រាក ថ្ងៃច័ន្ទ ១ ថ្ងៃ)
-	ទីតាំងការងារ៖ ស្រុក ស្អាង ខេត្តកណ្តាល
-	ប្រាក់បៀវត្សន៍៖ ចរចា


•	រៀបចំផែនការ និងប្រតិបត្តិប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយសង្គមទាំងអស់ និងបង្ហាញយុទ្ធនាការផ្សាយពាណិជ្ជកម្ម។
•	ការរចនាបង្កើតរូបភាពស្អាតៗ ដោយការថតរូប ដើម្បីបញ្ចូលក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយសង្គម
•	ពង្រីកនិងរក្សាកេរ្តិ៍ឈ្មោះ របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនឲ្យកាន់តែរឹងមាំតាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយសង្គម ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយក្រុមទីផ្សារ ការលក់ និងផលិតផលដើម្បីធានាបាននូវភាពស៊ីសង្វាក់គ្នានៃម៉ាកយីហោ។
•	មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិតនៅក្នុងការថតរូបដ៏មានភាពទាក់ទាញ ដើម្បីបញ្ចូលទៅក្នុងទីផ្សារឌីជីថល។
•	គ្រប់គ្រង និងថែរក្សាគេហទំព័រ និងបណ្តាញសង្គមរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
•	គ្រប់គ្រងសកម្មភាពធម្មតាទាំងអស់សម្រាប់ទំព័រប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយសង្គម
•	រចនាផ្ទាំងរូបភាព និងប្រកាសផ្សេងៗ
•	អភិវឌ្ឍ និងគ្រប់គ្រងយុទ្ធនាការទីផ្សារឌីជីថល
•	ត្រួតពិនិត្យយុទ្ធសាស្ត្រប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយសង្គម
•	ស្រាវជ្រាវ និងវិភាគ SWOT នៃភាពជាដៃគូ
•	កំណត់និន្នាការថ្មីក្នុងទីផ្សារឌីជីថល វាយតម្លៃបច្ចេកវិទ្យាថ្មី និងធានាថាប្រតិបត្តិការទីផ្សារគឺស្ថិតនៅជួរមុខនៃការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ឧស្សាហកម្ម
•	អភិវឌ្ឍការប្រើប្រាស់ ការរចនា មាតិកា និងការសន្ទនានៅក្នុងឆានែលឌីជីថល
•	ការងារផ្សេងទៀតដែលអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងចាត់ចែង
Job Requirement:
•	បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកទីផ្សារ រចនា ពាណិជ្ជកម្ម ឬផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច 1 ឆ្នាំក្នុងផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
•	មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែក Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Premiere និង Microsoft Office
•	អាចទទួលយកបាននូវជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងជាលាយលក្ខណ៍អក្សរ និងពាក្យសំដី ទាំងភាសាខ្មែរ និងភាសាអង់គ្លេស។
•	មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ ទំនាក់ទំនងរវាងបុគ្គល និងជំនាញក្នុងការបញ្ចុះបញ្ចូល។
•	បង្ហាញពីការប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់ មានភាពសក្តិសម និងស្មោះត្រង់។


* អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖

•	ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
•	ប្រាក់រង្វាន់ និងប្រាបើលើកទឹកចិត្ត
•	ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍សមត្ថភាពផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន
•	អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗ អាស្រ័យទៅលើសមត្ថភាព និងភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម។
•	ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ អនុវត្តតាមច្បាប់ការងារនៅកម្ពុជា។

* HOW TO APPLY:

- Interested candidates are invited to submit a CV and Cover letters to
- HR & Administration Office Head Office: St 21-N, #159, Borey New World Sen Sok, nearby AEON Mall II.

job title: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកសេវាកម្ម _ (Customer Service)_(០២ នាក់)
position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកសេវាកម្ម _ (Customer Service)_(០២ នាក់)
Job Description:
-	របាយការណ៍ជូន៖ អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
-	ប្រភេទការងារ៖ ពេញម៉ោង (ធ្វើការ ៦ ថ្ងៃ/សប្តាហ៍)
-	ទីតាំងការងារ៖ ស្រុក ស្អាង ខេត្តកណ្តាល
-	ប្រាក់បៀវត្សន៍៖ 

*	ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ៖

•	គ្រប់គ្រងការផ្តល់សេវាម្ហូបអាហារឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាជូនភ្ញៀវ
•	ស្វាគមន៏ភ្ញៀវ និងយកតារាងមុខម្ហូបជូនភ្ញៀវ
•	កត់ត្រានៅមុខម្ហូបដែលអតិថិជនចង់បាន
•	យកម្ហូបនិងភេសជ្ជះដែលអតិថិជនបានកម្មង់
•	យកវិក័យប័ត្រពីបេឡាទៅអោយភ្ញៀវ
•	ត្រូវផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ទឹកប្រាក់អោយត្រឹមត្រូវជាមួយវិក័យប័ត្រនៅពេលទទួល
•	ត្រូវរៀបចំតុភ្ញៀវអោយបានស្អាតជានិច្ចគ្រប់គ្រងការលក់សំបុត្រ
•	បណ្តុះបណ្តាលបុគ្គលិកថ្មី អំពីបច្ចេកទេសដាំផ្កានិងការថែទាំ
•	រៀបចំចាត់ចែងការងារសួនផ្កា ការថែទាំ និងការតាមដានផ្កានៅក្នុងតំបន់នីមួយៗ
•	ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
•	ប្រុស/ស្រី និងមានអាយុចាប់ពី ១៨ ឆ្នាំឡើង
•	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារដែលបានបញ្ជាក់ជាមេការសួន ឬតួនាទីស្រដៀងគ្នា
•	ចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកផ្កា,ដើមឈើនិងរុក្ខជាតិផ្សេងៗ។
•	ជួយជាទៀងទាត់នៅពេលចាំបាច់។
•	គោរពនូវច្បាប់វិន័យ និងពេលវេលា។


* អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖

•	ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
•	ប្រាក់រង្វាន់ និងប្រាបើលើកទឹកចិត្ត
•	ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍សមត្ថភាពផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន
•	អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗ អាស្រ័យទៅលើសមត្ថភាព និងភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម។
•	ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ អនុវត្តតាមច្បាប់ការងារនៅកម្ពុជា។

job title: មេចុងភៅ_ (Chef)_(០១ នាក់)
position: មេចុងភៅ_ (Chef)_(០១ នាក់)
Job Description:
-	របាយការណ៍ជូន៖ អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
-	ប្រភេទការងារ៖ ពេញម៉ោង
-	ទីតាំងការងារ៖ ស្រុក ស្អាង ខេត្តកណ្តាល
-	ប្រាក់បៀវត្សន៍៖ 

*	ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ៖

•	ចេះធ្វើម្ហូបខ្មែរគ្រប់មុខ(ដុតមាន់ឬត្រី,ម្ហូបឆា,និងសម្លផ្សេងៗ)
•	គ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទះបាយនិងគ្រឿងផ្សំផ្សេងៗ
•	ពិនិត្យគុណភាពផលិតផលឱ្យបានទៀងទាត់ និងស្រាវជ្រាវមុខម្ហូបថ្មីៗ
•	វាយតម្លៃការអនុវត្តបុគ្គលិក និងផ្តល់មតិកែលម្អដើម្បីបង្កើនផលិតភាពការងារ
•	ធានាការអនុលោមតាមច្បាប់អនាម័យ និងសុវត្ថិភាពដល់ភ្ញៀវ។
•	 ធានាថាលើគុណភាព រសជាតិ បរិមាណ ភណ្ឌភាព និងសេវ៉ាកម្មនៃមុខម្ហូបទាំងអស់ ត្រូវបានរៀបចំទៅតាមរូបមន្តត្រឹមត្រូវ។
•	ធានាថាបរិវេណផ្ទះបាយរបស់អ្នកត្រូវបានរក្សាភាពស្អាត អនាម័យ និងមានសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់គ្រប់ពេលវេលា។
•	ធានាថាបុគ្គលិកផ្នែកចុងភៅនិងសិក្ខាកាមទាំងទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ទាំងចំណេះ ចំនាញត្រឹមត្រូវនិងការណែនាំដ៏ល្អបំផុត។
•	រាយការណ៍អំពីភាពមិនប្រក្រតីណាមួយជូនដល់ប្រធានផ្នែក ដូចជាគ្រឿងបរិក្ខារមិនប្រក្រតី
•	ធានាបំពេញតួនាទីក្នុងការអវត្តមានរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែកនិងទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះផ្ទះបាយនៅពេលដែលត្រូវដឹកនាំ។
•	ធានារាល់ការ បញ្ជារទិញគ្រប់មុខទំនិញឬផលិតផល ត្រូវធានានូវគុណភាព សុវត្តិភាព ការផ្កត់ផ្កង់ ឲ្យសមស្របតាមបរិមាណនៃការលក់ ឬការប្រើប្រាស់។
•	គ្រប់គ្រងការចំណាយប្រតិបត្តិការ និងកំណត់វិធានការកាត់បន្ថយកាកសំណល់នៅក្នុងការដ្ឋាន។
•	បណ្តុះបណ្តាលបុគ្គលិកថ្មី និងបច្ចុប្បន្នអំពីការអនុវត្តសេវាកម្មអតិថិជនឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
•	ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
•	ប្រុស/ស្រី និងមានអាយុចាប់ពី ១៨ ឆ្នាំឡើង
•	បទពិសោធន៍ការងារដែលបានបញ្ជាក់ជាមេការភោជនីយដ្ឋាន អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងភោជនីយ ឬតួនាទីស្រដៀងគ្នា
•	ចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកអាហារ និងភេសជ្ជៈ (F&B) យ៉ាងទូលំទូលាយ ជាមួយនឹងសមត្ថភាពក្នុងការចងចាំ និងរំលឹកគ្រឿងផ្សំ និងមុខម្ហូប ដើម្បីជូនដំណឹងដល់អតិថិជន។
•	មានជំនាញទៅលើម្ហូបខ្មែរ និងអ៊ឺរ៉ុបខ្លះៗ។
•	ជួយជាទៀងទាត់នៅពេលចាំបាច់។
•	គោរពនូវច្បាប់វិន័យ និងពេលវេលា។

* អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖

•	ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
•	ប្រាក់រង្វាន់ និងប្រាបើលើកទឹកចិត្ត
•	ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍សមត្ថភាពផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន
•	អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗ អាស្រ័យទៅលើសមត្ថភាព និងភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម។
•	ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ អនុវត្តតាមច្បាប់ការងារនៅកម្ពុជា។

Job Description:
* Objective:
The Head of Recruitment responsible for managing all aspects of staff recruitment. He/she oversees the process to ensure procedures are followed in a fair and transparent manner.

-	Supporting and participating in all recruitment Process (staff, intern, volunteer...) collecting applications, facilitating the candidate’s assessment (written Test and Interview), sending reference checks, negotiation, offering and probationary contract.
-	Manage all aspects of recruitment activities to meet requirement of each department 
-	Preparing the induction frame works by coordination with all relevant departments to provide the full inductions to the new staff
-	Review JD format as CAM-ASEAN Standard, cross checking with Salary Grades and Position Classification Framework
-	Communicate the outcome of interview and process recruitment paper work for Approval.
-	Responsible and support for development of recruitment strategy and recruitment & selection process to meet standard
-	Build relationship with all reputable university, college and other NGO to promote the company image as employer of choice by hunting candidates or the outstanding students
-	Handle and manage internal and external job announcement
-	Responsible for screening candidates for all level of staffs if needed
-	Connect Recruitment pool
-	Send job offer in verbal and written to successful and notify unsuccessful candidate
-	Coordinate the logistic arrangement for new staff to ensure that new staff receive adequate information about the organization and its systems, policies and procedures, work desk, computer, email address, etc.
-	Ensuring that probations for new staff are set and assessed properly and on time.
-	Ensuring that all required documents are collected from new staff including family book, degrees, ID Card, Marriage Certificate (if married), bank account...etc.
-	Keep track of all ongoing recruitments
-	Be an interview panels as requested
-	Ensure Recruitment Form with other supporting document approved including budgets
-	Manage hiring channels and source candidates, shortlist, and arrange interview with relevant person or department.
-	Performs any other tasks as requested by director
Job Requirement:
-	Having minimum 2-year related work experience (Advantage);
- Bachelor Degree in Business Administration, HR or related field.
- 	Demonstrated flexible approach and ability to work under pressure and to organise and manage workload to meet deadlines.
- Willingness to take initiative and collaborative, positive attitude and keep confidential.
- 	Strong awareness of candidate pools
-	Good knowledge of relevant computer application
- Good communication skills in English and Khmer (both written and spoken).
-	Good negotiation and interpersonal skills, teamwork and professionalism.

Job Description:
Market Insights
- Follow & analyze the food & beverage market as well as factors driving consumer trends and the influence:
- Branding and activity
- Presenting recommendations based on appropriate data and insights on a continuous basis.
- Supporting the creation of storylines to promote our products & capabilities.

On-trend Marketing Management
- Drive the understanding of different customer needs and convert insights into on-trend solutions, new product concepts & marketing tools
- Commercialization of projects; responsible for the product launches from the designated launch program including all activities from pre- to post launch:
- Developing value propositions & key messaging.Identify market potential, supporting commercial teams.
- Preparation and presentation of internal & external promotion materials.
- Ensure follow-up & measurement of success and suggest/implement proper actions based on the outcome.
Digital Marketing
- Plan and execute all web, marketing database, email, social media and display advertising campaigns
- Measure digital media consumption and consumer online behavior.
- Capitalizing on analytical data and online metrics to provide digital experiences for user brand engagement.
- Design, build and maintain our social media presence
- Measure and report performance of all digital marketing campaigns, and assess against goals (ROI and KPIs)
- Utilize strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across
- Evaluate emerging technologies. Provide thought leadership and perspective for adoption where appropriate

Sale & Business Development
- implement and manage sales strategy
- Develop, implement, and manage sales forecasting activities and set performance goals to achieve company objectives
- Review and analyze sales performance against plans to determine effectiveness
- Monitor, prepare and report on sales activity
- Manage and give direction to sales teams
- Coordinate sales campaigns and initiatives to achieve business objectives
- Direct staff, training and performance evaluations to develop and control sales and marketing programs
- Meet with key clients to ensure relationships are maintained and developed
- Identify and understand client’s business needs and objectives to develop marketing and sales campaigns
- Coordinate liaison between sales and other departments
- Develop and manage marketing/sales budgets
- Maintain effective internal marketing communications
Job Requirement:
- Ability to understand the impact of operational initiatives from a sales or marketing person's perspective
- At least 3 years working experience in related role
- Experience in Food and Beverage industry will be advantage
- Ability to manage multiple projects and work to tight deadlines
- Proven success working in a fast-paced, high-growth environment
- Keen business sense, with the ability to find creative business-oriented solutions to problems
- Presentation Skills
- Client Relationships
- Emphasizing Excellence
- Negotiation
- Prospecting Skills
- Creativity
- Sales Planning
- Independence
- Motivation

Job Description:
*	Responsible for the company's overall financial accounting work, responsible for formulating and completing the company's financial accounting system, regulations and methods. Explain and answer the regulations and systems related to the company's financial accounting; analyze and check the implementation of the company's financial revenue and expenditure and budget.
- Strengthen security awareness and security measures, strictly implement security systems, and carefully manage cash, various seals, blank checks, blank receipts and other securities.
- Review the company's daily expenses and strictly implement the company's reimbursement system. When handling capital payment, follow the company's financial system and leadership's instructions to handle the relevant financial procedures. Without the approval of the general manager, no external payment shall be made, and no financial information shall be provided.
- Review the company's original documents and handle the daily accounting business; prepare the company's accounting vouchers and register the accounting books; prepare the company's accounting statements and submit them to the general manager every month.
- Carry out overall planning and management of corporate taxation, and complete tax declaration and annual audit work on time.
- Compile and calculate the salary and bonus payment table of employees, and do a good job in payment.
- Regularly check whether the company's cash on hand and bank deposits are consistent.
- Responsible for the report management of the company's raw materials and finished products in and out of the warehouse, and regularly check and count whether the company's raw materials and finished products are consistent with the accounts.
- Manage employees within the department, train and guide subordinate employees to work, and maintain relationships with other departments of the company.
- Participate in the review or formulation of important economic contracts and economic agreements from the perspective of accounting and economic law. Review the contracts signed by the company with suppliers and customers, put forward reasonable suggestions, safeguard the rights and interests of the company, and do a good job in contract management.
- Provide the management and functional departments with necessary financial information and data support for decision-making, assist the smooth and orderly development of the company's financial information, and help ensure the compliance of the company's operations (auditing, taxation). Participate in business decision-making, preside over the formulation and assessment of financial budgets.
- Establish and maintain good relations with relevant government departments such as taxation and banks, accounting firms and other relevant institutions.
- Undertake other work assigned by the general manager.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Accounting or Finance. CPA or MBA preferred.
- Advanced Microsoft Excel skills. Experience with other financial systems.
- 6 up years of progressive accounting experience with a portion of it being in a supervisory role.
- Good in English speaking and writing or Chinese 
- Ability to manage multiple tasks simultaneously and effectively in a complex environment.
- Attention to detail and the ability to analyze large amounts of data.
- Excellent verbal and written communication abilities across all levels of an organization
- Strong leadership skills with a dedication to driving and achieving results
- Knowledge of employee relationship building and performance management techniques.

Job Description:
1. Good knowledge about Air & Ocean for export and import.
2. Be aware of e-filing requirements for export shipments to USA, CANADA, JAPAN…etc.
3. Mainly responsible for coordinating the daily operation and co-operation between the operation team and the customs clearance team, customer service (including booking, customs declaration, box making, expenses, inspection, compensation, etc.).
4. For customers maintained by customer service, if customer service is not in the company or can't be contacted, the operation manager has the responsibility to contact customers at the first time, solve problems and act as customer service.
5. Check the expenses with suppliers and cooperate with finance department to check the payment content.
6. Supervise the daily operation and standardize the operation process.
7. System input management.
8. Convey the tasks assigned by the company leaders and express the feedback information of subordinates.
9. Staffing, job adjustment, job assignment, weekly meetings for operation team, analysis of recent work.
10. Manage and coordinate the overall operation of the operation Department and be responsible for formulating the service and document process of the operation Department.
11. Daily management of subordinates, work guidance, training, work arrangement, inspection and supervision, follow-up.
12. Other assigned jobs.
Job Requirement:
1. Bachelor’s degree or above.
2. At least 5 years of operation and management experience in shipping or international freight forwarding and other related fields, including at least 3 years of freight forwarding operation team management experience.
3. Familiar with ocean import and export process and operation, familiar with customs clearance and inspection process, with import and export trade knowledge of documents, freight forwarding, customs declaration, inspection, port operation, container transportation, etc.
4. Familiar with the operation process of refrigerators and other special containers is preferred.
5. Be able to operate related office software skillfully.
6. Good communication skills and team management skills.
7. Careful work, strong sense of responsibility, strong sense of service and team spirit.

Job Description:
* Objective:
- The Head of Recruitment responsible for managing all aspects of staff recruitment. He/she oversees the process to ensure procedures are followed in a fair and transparent manner.

* Responsibilities:

-	Supporting and participating in all recruitment Process (staff, intern, volunteer...) collecting applications, facilitating the candidate’s assessment (written Test and Interview), sending reference checks, negotiation, offering and probationary contract.
-	Manage all aspects of recruitment activities to meet requirement of each department 
-	Preparing the induction frame works by coordination with all relevant departments to provide the full inductions to the new staff
-	Review JD format as CAM-ASEAN Standard, cross checking with Salary Grades and Position Classification Framework
-	Communicate the outcome of interview and process recruitment paper work for Approval.
-	Responsible and support for development of recruitment strategy and recruitment & selection process to meet standard
-	Build relationship with all reputable university, college and other NGO to promote the company image as employer of choice by hunting candidates or the outstanding students
-	Handle and manage internal and external job announcement
-	Responsible for screening candidates for all level of staffs if needed
-	Connect Recruitment pool
-	Send job offer in verbal and written to successful and notify unsuccessful candidate
-	Coordinate the logistic arrangement for new staff to ensure that new staff receive adequate information about the organization and its systems, policies and procedures, work desk, computer, email address, etc.
-	Ensuring that probations for new staff are set and assessed properly and on time.
-	Ensuring that all required documents are collected from new staff including family book, degrees, ID Card, Marriage Certificate (if married), bank account...etc.
-	Keep track of all ongoing recruitments
-	Be an interview panels as requested
-	Ensure Recruitment Form with other supporting document approved including budgets
-	Manage hiring channels and source candidates, shortlist, and arrange interview with relevant person or department.
-	Performs any other tasks as requested by director
Job Requirement:
- Having minimum 2-year related work experience (Advantage);
- Bachelor Degree in Business Administration, HR or related field.
- Demonstrated flexible approach and ability to work under pressure and to organise and manage workload to meet deadlines.
- Willingness to take initiative and collaborative, positive attitude and keep confidential.
- Strong awareness of candidate pools
- Good knowledge of relevant computer application
- Good communication skills in English and Khmer (both written and spoken).
- Good negotiation and interpersonal skills, teamwork and professionalism.

Job Description:
- Kampong Chhnang support ACs of Kampong Chhnang (8), Kampong Speu (9), SEUAC (1)


Poultry Project of National Pride in Cambodia (PPNP) is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, status as a protected veteran, among other things, or status as a qualified individual with disability.

FUNCTIONS: Field Facilitator is responsible for building financial management capacity of the Agricultural Cooperatives (AC) and improving their access to financing. S/he will help AC to adapt to the BanhJi Digital Financial Platform by providing direct training and coaching, and assisting ACs in preparing monthly financial reports. S/he will work in close collaboration with the project team based in Phnom Penh to assist ACs in managing financial platforms, and facilitate them to adapt to digital solutions such as payment and financing solutions.

** RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Strengthen Self-help groups and Agricultural Cooperative
● Conduct AC capacity development assessment and provide
the recommendation to help support AC in financial management.
● Provide direct training on accounting software which is capable of control and capture the financial data of AC’s 4 corebusinesses.
 ● Perform periodic review of the financial records & implementations to identify any areas for support or improvement.
● Support ACs to ensure the AC’s financial reports, data, and Catalyze Leverage Fund (CaLF) reports are produced and
submitted on time.
● Facilitate AC in adopting to digital payment and digital
financing
● Assist ACs in developing business and budget plan to help
them understand how to manage their business effectively
● Conduct follow-up and provide appropriate technical solutions and timely document and report on issues and resolutions.
● Work with project coordinator on the project update, and
support needed for effective implementation

2. Project Management (database and reporting)
● Plan and implement the activities/deliverables according to the project workplan and logframe
● Prepare project monthly, quarterly, semester, and annual
reports including project impact stories.
● Participate in project design, developing annual workplan and budget plans.
Job Requirement:
● Bachelor or associate degree in Rural Development or Business Administration, and Accounting and​ Finance
● Have knowledge in accounting basics and experience in​accounting software is a plus
● Experience in agriculture extension in poultry and​aquaculture is a plus.

** ESSENTIAL COMPETENCIES:
● Knowledge of and experience with or within community​organizations
● Demonstrated proficiency in Khmer, both spoken and written;​proficiency in English is a plus
● Good communication and facilitation skills
● Good understanding of and sensitivity for poverty, social​and ethnic issues
● Knowledge of project management
● Ability to perform multiple tasks with minimal supervision.
● Time management and ability to prioritize multiple tasks.
Company Profile: BanhJi is a financial operating platform that empowers organizations in various industries across Cambodia. Since 2016, we have helped MSMEs, Public, and Nonprofit entities with easier access to financing, achieve complete accounting & tax compliance, improve performance through insightful data visualization, and facilitate payment collection and disbursement, all within our platform.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Chhe Vanna   (855) 69 988 967 / +855 11 571 464 info@banhji.com No.7, 1st Floor, St300, Sangkat Beoung Keng Kong II, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.  (855) 69 988 967 / +855 11 571 464

Job Description: - Implement trade marketing plans for relevant channels and product categories to achieve defined business objectives- Conduct market research on market trends/sentiments, consumer behavior, competitor information, etc. and provide analysis as inputs to marketing plans- Track monthly actual trade spend against sales and analyze return on investment of each trade activity. Accrue and track trade marketing expenses according to existing plans- Implement trade marketing standardized processes, tools, administrative activities (including approvals), etc. for smooth execution of trade marketing activities- Execute and track progress of above the line marketing campaigns and go-to-market activities, including in-store promotional initiatives- Provide sales and trade spend analysis by channels, product categories, etc. Supervise feedback gathering from various sources on trade marketing plans effectiveness- Work closely with internal stakeholders in the execution of trade marketing initiatives to ensure holistic integration of efforts to meet customers' needs- Work closely with clients and vendors to ensure execution of trade marketing plans (e.g. merchandising/planograms, trade promotions, in-store execution, etc.)
Job Requirement: - Work experience:Minimum two to five years’ experience in a similar role- Education: Degree or professional qualification in Marketing/Economics/Business Administration or a related disciplineFunctional skills and knowledge:- Demonstrate a good working knowledge and understanding of the business and industry, including product categories and channels- Demonstrate a good working knowledge in marketing planning, market research and demand forecasting- Demonstrate basic research and analytical skills- Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)- Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spokenDelivery growth - in Asia and beyond . Join DKSH.DKSH’s strength lies in our great diversity of services, industries, clients, products, regions and employees from various nationalities. We are proud of our people: they are the reason we are successful. Our people are the best in the industry. They are passionate about their career growth and about business success. They work as part of an energetic and committed team, positively impacting millions of lives through the products and services we provide. Join us today if you are ready to “Drive growth. Be the Difference.” With DKSH, you will experience a world of learning and development, own your career and take business responsibility and have a positive impact that touches people’s lives.
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root
Contact Info: Contact Information DKSH Cambodia Administration Manager 087800338 jobs.kh@dksh.com Phnom Penh No. 797, Corner Preah Monivong Boulevard and Street 484, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 087800338
