Job Description:
Job Summary:
The Human Resource Manager will lead and direct the routine functions of the Human Resources (HR) department including hiring and interviewing staff, administering pay, benefits, and leave.
Supervisory Responsibilities:
 Recruits, interviews, hires new staff, and takes care of training
 Oversees the daily workflow of the department.
 Provides constructive and timely performance evaluations. 
 Handles discipline and termination of employees in accordance with company policy. 
Duties/Responsibilities:
 Partners with the leadership team to understand and execute the organization's human resource and talent strategy particularly as it relates to current and future talent needs, recruiting, retention, and succession planning.
 Ensure with the Admin Manager that job descriptions are up to date and compliant with all local, state and federal regulations
 Provides support and guidance to HR generalists, management, and other staff when complex, specialized, and sensitive questions and issues arise; may be required to administer and execute routine tasks in delicate circumstances such as providing reasonable accommodations, investigating allegations of wrongdoing, and terminations.
 Manages the talent acquisition process, which may include recruitment, interviewing, and hiring of qualified job applicants, particularly for managerial, exempt, and professional roles; collaborates with departmental managers to understand skills and competencies required for openings.
 Analyzes trends in compensation and benefits; researches and proposes competitive base and incentive pay programs to ensure the organization attracts and retains top talent.
 Creates a compensation strategy for all employees based on market research and pay surveys; keeps the strategy up to date
 Develop training materials and performance management programs to help ensure employees understand their job responsibilities
 Creates learning and development programs and initiatives that provide internal development opportunities for employees.
 Oversees/ handles / participates in employee disciplinary meetings, terminations, and investigations.
 Investigate employee issues and conflicts and brings them to resolution
 Maintains knowledge of trends, best practices, regulatory changes, and new technologies in human resources, talent management, and employment law.
 Ensures all company HR policies are applied consistently
 Maintains company organization charts and employee directory
 Maintains HR systems and processes
 Conducts performance and salary reviews
 Performs other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
 Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
 Excellent command of verbal and written English. 
 Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and conflict resolution skills.
 Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
 Ability to prioritize tasks and to delegate them when appropriate.
 Ability to act with integrity, professionalism, and confidentiality.
 Thorough knowledge of employment-related laws and regulations.
 Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite or related software.
 Proficiency with or the ability to quickly learn the organizations HRIS and talent management systems.
Education and Experience:
 Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field required.
 A minimum of three years of human resource management experience preferred.

Apply To:
Interested candidates are requested to submit CV together with recent photo (4 x 6) and salary expectation to Admin Department.

Job Description:
** Location : Head Office of Arthemis Co., Ltd in Phnom Penh 

1. Import Duties 
- Keeping and regularly updating products lists and price lists from main suppliers and sharing them with our main customer.
- Organizing with customers the receipt and check out of the deliveries in terms of quantities, quality, expiry dates and compliancy with the order. 
- Receiving and checking tentative purchase orders from customers before sending them to suppliers for validation
- Reporting shortages, losses, damages, and any discrepancy to the suppliers and managing all claims until final settlement. 
- Assistance Import Manager of hold import processes. 
- Following up closely with the company Finance Manager the timely payments to suppliers and service providers
- Any other task assigned by the Import Manager.

2.  Accounting Duties 
- Ensure accounting records and supporting documents are systematically organized and filed and be able to retrieve documents requested promptly
- Ensure payment transactions are valid and accurately processed per supporting documents in a timely manner and in compliance with company policies, procedures, laws and regulations
- Calculating the final price of each item taking into account all the costs (item price, packing, FOB transportation, shipping, insurance, custom clearance, local transportation to final destination, exchange rate, gross margin, VAT etc..) 
- Preparing and forwarding the final VAT invoices to the customer and closely following up the receipt of the payment.
- Verify and reconcile customer payment transactions and follow up closely with the timely payment to ensure accuracy and validity and make the adjustment if needed.
- Oversea daily transactions including account payable, receivable, bank, and general ledger.
- Perform banks reconciliation
- Prepare and check documents for monthly and yearly tax declaration
- To liaise with the company Finance Manager and share all information in relation with the payment of the suppliers and all service providers involved
- Any other task assigned by the Finance Manager.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Accounting, Business Administration, or any other related fields
- At least 2 years of experience in accounting or/and import or similar duties
- Gender: Male or Female (Cambodian only) 
- Knowledge of import and accounting processes.
- Good command of Khmer and English 
- Good communication and interpersonal skills
- Willing to learn and take up challenges
- Good knowledge of excel is a must 

BENEFITS
- Salary: negotiation 
- Work schedule: 8:00am-12:00pm and 1:30pm-5:30pm (full Mon-Fri and a haft day on Sat)  
- Public holiday compliance to labor law
- AL 18 days per year
- Yearly salary review
- Phone allowance
- Seniority payment compliance to labor law
- NSSF
- Bonus/incentive..........
- Other benefits

APPLY TO: 
Interested candidates are requested to submit CV together with recent photo (4 x 6), a cover letter and your salary expectation to Admin & HR Department.

At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Job Description:
** Key Responsibilities:
S/he will manage on TB information system to demonstrate a high level of internal data consistency (COMMIT) and inter-operability of TB information with HMIS and hospital service program database in improving services. S/he will also be responsible for reviewing the current TB-MIS indicators, features, parameters into the TB-MIS database, new customizing, troubleshooting, and software connection to the server at the central level (CENAT). S/he will play a key role in liaising with CENAT and support them in the selection of best suited TB-MIS in Cambodia, including review the TB-MIS guideline, training curriculum, and procedure. S/he will oversee the design, customization, development, pilot, and implementation of TB-MIS application and other technology initiatives of the project. S/he will also be supporting the implementation and initialization and use of TB-MIS at CENAT and health facilities (OD and HC).

** Main Responsibilities
•	Provide support to CENAT on technical management of TB-MIS system including customizing the system features according to NTP’s requirements, and inter-operability of TB information with other platforms (diagnostic connectivity system, HMIS, etc.)
•	Provide support the introduction and scale-up of the diagnostic connectivity system and to connect with TB-MIS.
•	Provide support with TB-MIS team to CENAT in updating the TB-MIS user’s guideline, training materials and curriculum for conducting the drilling down training of the utilization of TB-MIS at health facility level.
•	Monitor the implementation of planned activities through monthly progress, review meetings, and field trips.

** Personal Skills 
•	Knowledgeable in software programming (Java), database management MySQL, Hibernat.
•	Knowledgeable in web-based solutions HTML, JavaScript, JQuery.
•	Knowledgeable in application development frameworks JBoss, Seam, Maven.
•	Skills in management and coordination of HIV and TB related project
•	Ability to plan and organize a substantial workload comprised of complex, diverse tasks, and responsibilities
•	Strong communication and presentation skills in Khmer/English, and the capacity to identify and develop opportunities with an organization-wide perspective
Job Requirement:
•	Master of Management Information System, or other related fields
•	At least 6 years’ experience in working on information management of HIV/TB project
•	At least 3 years’ project management experience is desirable
•	Skills in management and coordination 
•	Ability to plan and organize a substantial workload comprised of complex, diverse tasks and responsibilities
•	Strong communication and presentation skills in Khmer/English, and the capacity to identify and develop opportunities with an organization-wide perspective

Interested candidates must send your resume to our email address at recruitment@khana.org.kh before or not later than 14th February 2023 – 5.00 pm. Only short-listed candidates will be notified for further process.

Note: Detailed Job Description for the position will be sent to those who request and mention in the email. Please kindly mention your expected salary.

KHANA is committed to equal opportunities and welcomes applications from appropriate qualified people from all sections of the community. Qualified TB Survivor, people experiencing with TB, people living with HIV, Transgender Person, MSM, Female Entertainment Workers, People with Disability and other women are particularly encouraged to apply.

job title: 平面设计师  ( អ្នករចនាក្រាហ្វិក  )
company_name: ZHONG GUO SHANG HE MEDIA CO.,LTD.
position: 平面设计师  ( អ្នករចនាក្រាហ្វិក  )
Job Description: * ការពិពណ៌នាការងារ ៖-  ចូលរួមក្នុងគម្រោងរចនាផ្សេងៗ។-  ផ្តោតលើការរចនាក្រាហ្វិក និងការផ្សាយពាណិជ្ជកម្ម។-  មានសេរីភាពក្នុងការគិតប្រកបដោយភាពច្នៃប្រឌិត។-  ផលិតស្នាដៃសិល្បៈប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព។-  បំពេញតាមស្តង់ដារខ្ពស់នៃសោភ័ណ្ឌភាពនិងការរចនា។-  ធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម និង ស្មារតីសហការ។- មានឱកាសច្រើនក្នុងការរៀន និងរីកចម្រើន។* 职位描述：- 参与多元化的设计项目。- 专注于平面设计、广告。- 自由地创造性地思考。- 高效地制作艺术品。- 达到设计美学和复杂性的高标准。- 以团队精神和合作精神工作。- 对于高级职位，指导初级同事。- 大量学习和成长的机会。- 经验较少的候选人将被考虑担任初级职位。* តម្រូវការការងារ ៖-  សញ្ញាប័ត្រ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែករចនា និង ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ។-  មានជំនាញកម្រិតខ្ពស់ក្នុង Photoshop, Illustrator & Corel Draw។-  មានចំណេះដឹងបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងការរចនាក្រាហ្វិក។* 工作要求：-  设计与广告专业的文凭或学位。-  Photoshop，Illustrator & Corel Draw 的高级技能。-  图形设计方面的知识和经验。-  对广告、品牌、营销趋势的敏感性。-  激情与想象力。-  注意详情。-  渴望通过曝光来做好设计。
Job Requirement: -  បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ ៖ លើសពី ១ ឆ្នាំ-  មុខងារ ៖ ប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយ/ការផ្សាយពាណិជ្ជកម្ម-  ដំណឹងជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ៖ ២-  ឧស្សាហកម្ម ៖ អភិវឌ្ឍន៍បុគ្គលិក /គ្រប់គ្រង-  កម្រិតសិក្សា ៖ បរិញ្ញាបត្រ-  ភាសា ៖ ខ្មែរ - ល្អ ចិន - ល្អ-  អាយុ ៖ 18 ~ 35 ឆ្នាំ-  ទីតាំង ៖ ភ្នំពេញ-  工作经验：1年以上-  职能：媒体/广告-  招聘：2-  工业：开发/管理人员-  学历：学士学位-  语言：高棉语—好，华语—好-  年龄：18 ~ 35岁-  地点：金边* ព័ត៌មានទំនាក់ទំនង ៖-  ហ្សុង ហ្គ័រ ហ្សាំង ហឺ មេឌា ឯ.ក (ផ្នែកបុគ្គលិក)-  ឈ្មោះ ៖ ហូយ វ៉ស៊ីញ-  ទូរស័ព្ទ ៖    016 85 16 85-  Telegram : 016 85 16 85-  WeChat : vorsinh-  អ៊ីមែល ៖ vorsinh@gmail.com-  ទីតាំង ៖ JVV3+XCGមហាវិថីមិត្តភាពភ្នំពេញហាណូយ (1019) រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ប្រទេសកម្ពុជា ។* 联系信息：-  上合传媒 《人事部》-  姓名：许和成-  电话：016 85 16 85-  电报：016 85 16 85-  微信：vorsinh-  邮件：vorsinh@gmail.com-  地址：JVV3+XCG，金边河内路 (1019)，金边市，柬埔寨。
Company Profile:
上合传媒从事广告传媒行业已有近二十年，以“服务至上，合作共赢”为宗旨，提供专 业的广告媒体服务。积极响应中国“一带一路”的号召，2018年上合传媒柬埔寨分公 司成立，用“热情、专注、高效、负责的精神和态度为客户提供全方位的服务；公司 成立至今，已服务近千家大大小小不同的行业，以创新的理念、卓越的设计、精细的 品质、体贴的服务获得业界一致好评。

advertising media services.Actively responding to the call of China's "One Belt, One Road", SH Media Cambodia Branch was established in 2018, providing customers

Job Description:
- Assist Internal Audit Manager to drive department and lead audit mission according to annual plan approved 
- Review internal control systems by updating audit programs and questionnaires; recommending new policies and procedures.
- Direct the identification and evaluation of the organization’s risk areas and oversees the development of the annual Audit Plan.
- Direct the overall performance of audit procedures, including identifying and defining issues, developing criteria, reviewing and analyzing evidence, and documenting client processes 
- Monitor and follow up all the irregular transactions and check compliance with applicable laws and regulations. 
- Check over Operations business at head office and branch level 
- Review financial statements, NBC reports, and tax declaration monthly 
- Direct the audit staff, interviews clients and/or stakeholders to confirm the concern and suspicious transactions, reviewing documents  
- Draft audit result, summarize audit reports and recommendation to send to internal Audit Manager for reviewing
- Involve in the debriefing of audit result to management to make sure that they understand well about detail audit finding issues with immediate recommendations to follow up action.
- Communicate the results of audit and consulting projects via written reports and oral presentations to management and the Board of Directors.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in banking management or equivalent.
• At least 2 years’ experience in banking services development at least.
• Knowledge in banking business, banking risk or banking operation.
• Demonstrate high passion, and commitment.
• Pleasant personality & professional responsibility
Company Profile:
Royal Micro Finance PLC (RMF) was established as a public limited company holding license, number: M.F-56 from National Bank of Cambodia in July 2015 to provide financial services to indeed clients, and it was officially registered at Ministry of Commerce, number ៣០៣២ ពណ ចបព. Royal Microfinance​ PLC fully operates services to all targeted clients for micro and small financial need on both business and personal purposes.

Royal Microfinance PLC has a strong commitment to perform a standard and professional operation in both management and MIS. Moreover, wide varieties of competitively marketable products and processes have been prudently designed in responding to the rising demands of various micro finance services.

The fundamental core value of RMF is to provide clients with fair and transparent micro-finance services to obtain mutual benefit and growth.

Job Description:
- Assess Loan Application and Prepare Diary Note to ensure the compliance of Credit Policy before committee meeting
- Review the completeness of the Legal Documents and Collaterals before drawdown in conjunction with Customer Service Department
- Site Visit 
- Inquire Customer Record on CBC 
- Summarize meeting minute after Committee approval
- Attend Loan Committee
- Type Loan Contracts (Quick Loan)
- Coordinate Property Valuation
- Coordinate Insurance Purchase/Renewal
- Coordinate Cardkry Processing
- Prepare Monthly CBC Data Sample Based Verification with IT Department
- Prepare Monthly CBC Fee Reconciliation
- Prepare Deviation Report
- Prepare Monthly Report on Credit Risk’s Performance
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in banking management or equivalent.
• At least 2-3 year experience in banking services development
• Knowledge in banking business, banking risk or banking operation.
• Demonstrate high passion, and commitment.
• Pleasant personality & professional responsibility

Job Description:
- Find potential clients to get the loan products and services in their geographic areas or boundaries. 
- Build a very good relationship with all levels of local authorities to get their supports on loan   documents process. 
- Analyze borrowers’ business plan and financial flows to get more and more reliable data and information related to their businesses income and family status.
- Assess and evaluate borrowers’ properties with the up to date market price and check the legal ownership.
- Educate the credit rule and policies strictly to borrowers before processing the loan documents.
- Set up the plan with OM for loan disbursement projection as monthly, quarterly and annually basis.
- Closely follow up the borrowers on their business change or any problems then report to direct supervisor for taking early action on time. Ensure the loan repayment with 100% & follow up.
- Work closely with marketing and product development officer to research competitor business strength and weakness and new product development.
- Make a daily report to OM for consolidating all data to make a daily client information and loan document submit record to OM.
Job Requirement:
• 3rd Year / 4th Year / Fresh graduate or Bachelor degree in banking management or equivalent encourage to apply.
• Honesty, initiative, flexibility, high commitment and good inter-personal and communication skills.
• Good working knowledge of computer (Ms. Office & Internet).
• Ability to effectively communicate in English and Khmer.
• Good understanding of Cambodian micro finance rules and regulations, law on real estate and contract law.
• Minimum 1 year relevant working experience with MFI or Bank.

job title: 现场管理员 ( អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងការដ្ឋាន )

position: 现场管理员 ( អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងការដ្ឋាន )
Job Description: * ការពិពណ៌នាការងារ ៖-  ពិនិត្យការរចនានិងគំនូរបច្ចេកទេសដើម្បីធានាថាត្រូវបានអនុវត្តយ៉ាងត្រឹមត្រូវ។-  ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយផ្នែករៀបចំផែនការទាក់ទងនឹងការបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈ។-  ត្រួតពិនិត្យការងារសំណង់។-  ធានាថាគម្រោងត្រូវនឹងលក្ខខណ្ឌដែលបានព្រមព្រៀង ថវិកា ឬពេលវេលាកំណត់។-  ពិនិត្យសម្ភារៈនិងការងារដែលកំពុងដំណើរការស្របតាមតម្រូវការ។-  ផ្តល់ប្រឹក្សាបច្ចេកទេសនិងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានៅកន្លែង។-  បំពេញភារកិច្ចផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលចាត់ចែងដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។* 职位描述：-  检查技术设计和图纸以确保它们得到正确遵循。-  就材料订购与计划部门联络。-  进行调查。-  监督建筑工程。-  确保项目符合商定的规范、预算或时间表。-  检查材料和进行中的工作是否符合指定要求。-  现场提供技术咨询和解决问题。-  履行管理层分配的其他职责。* តម្រូវការការងារ ៖-  បរិញ្ញាបត្រវិស្វកម្ម។-  មានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកវិស្វកម្មច្រើនជាង 1 ឆ្នាំ។-  យកចិត្តទុកដាក់លើវិធីសាស្រ្តស្តង់ដារនៃការសាងសង់។-  ស្វែងយល់ពីកម្មវិធីដែលប្រើក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងគម្រោង។* 工作要求：-  工程学士学位。-  1年以上工程经验。-  基本设计和绘图程序。-  注重细节，特别是在合同要求、设计/现场图纸、装修工程质量和施工标准方法方面。-  了解项目管理中使用的软件。-  人工管理。
Job Requirement: -  បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ ៖ លើសពី ១ ឆ្នាំ-  មុខងារ ៖ ប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយ/ការផ្សាយពាណិជ្ជកម្ម-  ដំណឹងជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក ៖ ២-  ឧស្សាហកម្ម ៖ អភិវឌ្ឍន៍បុគ្គលិក /គ្រប់គ្រង-  កម្រិតសិក្សា ៖ បរិញ្ញាបត្រ-  ភាសា ៖ ខ្មែរ - ល្អ ចិន - ល្អ-  អាយុ ៖ 18 ~ 35 ឆ្នាំ-  ទីតាំង ៖ ភ្នំពេញ-  工作经验：1年以上-  职能：媒体/广告-  招聘：2-  工业：开发/管理人员-  学历：学士学位-  语言：高棉语—好，华语—好-  年龄：18 ~ 35岁-  地点：金边* ព័ត៌មានទំនាក់ទំនង ៖-  ហ្សុង ហ្គ័រ ហ្សាំង ហឺ មេឌា ឯ.ក (ផ្នែកបុគ្គលិក)-  ឈ្មោះ ៖ ហូយ វ៉ស៊ីញ-  ទូរស័ព្ទ ៖    016 85 16 85-  Telegram : 016 85 16 85-  WeChat : vorsinh-  អ៊ីមែល ៖ vorsinh@gmail.com-  ទីតាំង ៖ JVV3+XCGមហាវិថីមិត្តភាពភ្នំពេញហាណូយ (1019) រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ប្រទេសកម្ពុជា ។* 联系信息：-  上合传媒 《人事部》-  姓名：许和成-  电话：016 85 16 85-  电报：016 85 16 85-  微信：vorsinh-  邮件：vorsinh@gmail.com-  地址：JVV3+XCG，金边河内路 (1019)，金边市，柬埔寨。

Job Description:
- Work independently with assigned tasks from head of department 
- Ability to lead team in software/mobile development 
- Ensure agreed deadlines are met and project scope and benefits are delivered 
- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications 
- Support helpdesk when user has problem both software and network.
Job Requirement:
• Experience in mobile development (flutter) more than 1 years
• Knowledge with third-party libraries and APIs 
• Experience with lead projects. 
• Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
• Experience in Web Technology (PHP, HTML/CSS3, AngularJS/React, framework codeigniter). 
• Experience in Win Technology (VB.Net, C#) is a plus. 
• Experience in Database Technology (SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL). 
• Teamwork, honest, flexible, creative ideas, hardworking 
• Able to work under pressure and longer term

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Job Description:
- Communicate with EDC NCC for switching activities in respective substation. (Follow NCC instruction)
- To record substation electrical data and network data as per EDC NCC’s requirement and Operation Procedure.
- To perform daily visual inspection as per maintenance plan. (Routine daily inspection)
- To report any unusual finding or defects found during routine visual inspection.
- To respond and immediately report to ASM or DGM /GM for any tripping, breakdown or fault inside happened inside the substation.
- To attend inspection, corrective action, assist and supervise maintenance & any repair work within the area of responsibility or any in Substation premises when is required.
- To perform work and attend in any Preventive and Corrective Maintenance as per requested by Superior.
- To participate any Operation and Safety Activities like Trainings, Meetings, Fire drills and
Others and to reports near miss, unsafe conditions and others incoordination to Environment, Health & Safety.
- To ensure all visitors and worker working in substation perimeter adhere to safety regulation and guideline.
- To organize and ensure documents and recording data are in order.
Job Requirement:
- Diploma or Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering
- Minimum 1 year experience of working in electrical background, or working in a LIVE substation
- Good knowledge of electrical principle and safety working with electrical apparatus
- Good in communication, interpersonal relationship, strategic thinking
- Basic English Communication and Computer knowledge
- Willing to work in High and Medium Voltage substation

Company Profile: Cambodian Transmission Limited is a wholly owned subsidiary of Leader Energy Holding Berhad. LEADER ENERGY was founded in 1994 when its subsidiary signed the first IPP concession agreement in Cambodia with the State utility Electricite du Cambodge. In conjunction with the power project, we upgraded Phnom Penh’s transmission network capabilities to enable the distribution of power throughout the city. LEADER ENERGY has developed and acquired additional power and transmission projects in Cambodia as well as in Vietnam and Malaysia. Today we continue to fulfill our vision of building a balanced portfolio of generation technologies and geographical diversification in the high-growth markets of Southeast Asia in a safe, sustainable, and environmentally responsible manner.

Job Description:
Reporting to the Manager, this role will involve acting as the first point of contact for visitors and clients of LLFitness. You will be responsible for ensuring our members and guests receive a warm and friendly welcome and any enquiries are dealt with in an efficient and professional manner. The receptionist will also deal with membership and sales enquirers as well as carry out administrative duties. 

PRINCIPLE RESPONSIBILITY AREAS 
1. To provide excellent customer service to our members and guests 
2. To deal with membership and sales enquirers and carry out administrative duties 
3. To ensure the gym studio areas are maintained to a high standard during each shift 
4. Provide support to management where required.
5. Full Time 
6. Can work at night shift
Job Requirement:
MAIN DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITES 
- Build a good rapport and relationship with all of our members and guests 
- Deal with customer enquirers in a friendly and efficient manner 
- Ensure that all financial transactions are completed in accordance LLFitness finance procedures 
- Manage the door entry and exit system 
- To actively promote and sell the various memberships available at LLFitness 
- Maintain and update the membership database system 
- Promote member challenges and initiatives 
- Able to seek solutions and resolve problems, as and when they arise 
- General administrative duties 2 

PERSONAL SPECIFICATION 
- Have a friendly and professional approach 
- First Aid Qualification desirable or willing to obtain 
- IT Skills including PC applications 
- Outgoing and confident with people of all ages 
- Speak/read/write English and Khmer 
- Ability to work shifts (flexible ours considered)

Job Description:

Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.

Job Description:
The Warehouse and Logistics Manager is responsible for the purchase of specific equipment relating to the bottling and transport of mineral water. He/She ensures the warehouse inventory and transport shipments to the company warehouse, consumers or wholesalers in a safe environment. He / She oversees receiving, warehousing, distribution and maintenance operations. The duty includes analyzing logistics data, negotiating business relationships and communicating with suppliers and distributors.

** Main Duties and Responsibilities
●	Manage the warehouse and the supply chain in compliance with company’s policies and SOP's 			
●	Create supply chain management strategies that increase efficiency and speed	
●	Responsible for purchasing specific equipment relating to the bottling and transport of mineral water.			
●	Oversee the reception, the warehousing, the distribution and the maintenance operations in a safe environment.			
●	Setup the layout of the warehouse and ensure that efficient space is utilized to store the product.			
●	Prepare long-term schedules to ensure that the company has enough stock at any time to meet demand.			
●	Manage stock control and reconcile with data storage systems.			
●	Understand how the production, manufacturing and distribution process works together.			
●	Implement processes to reduce waste and implement cost control.		
●	Initiate, coordinate and enforce optimal operational policies by following HACCP procedures.			
●	Maintain standards of health and safety, hygiene and security at all times. Train the staff accordingly.			
●	Recruit, coach and motivate employees. Train and mentor employees, including reinforcement of safety guidelines.			
●	Collaborate with Production Dpt. and QC/QA Dpt. to avoid operational gaps.
●	Handle communications and negotiations with suppliers and clients (wholesalers, retailers...)			
●	Attend meetings, submit reports, keep accurate documentation and analyze data to improve the efficiency of the Department.
●	Any other duties relevant to the needs of the organization and as directed.
Job Requirement:
●	Bachelor Degree and proven expertise in Warehouse management procedures and best practices.			
●	Hands on experience with warehouse management software and databases.		
●	Hands-on experience with purchasing processes and cost control.			
●	Proficiency in Microsoft Office, Word, Excel				
●	Understanding of procedural best practices in supply chain management and warehousing management.
●	Good knowledge of Health & Safety regulations.				
●	Leadership skills and ability to manage staff.			
●	Strong decision making and problem-solving skills; planning and organizational skills.			
●	Ability to work well under pressure in a fast-paced environment.			
●	Excellent time management skills with a proven ability to meet deadlines.			

** Salary & other Benefit 
●	Salary: Negotiation
●	Working hour: Mon-Sat
●	Day Off: Sunday
●	Public Holiday & Annual Leave in compliance with Cambodian labor laws
●	Seniority Pay & Annual Bonus
●	Training & Development
●	Insurance

Job Description:
We are looking for a manager for our project supporting our work with government partners and
leading our inputs in to national policy on trafficking and migration. We need an individual with a
strong background in policy development and experience working with government structures. You
will need to have commitment to transparency and accountability, excellent initiative, great people
skills and a passion for quality of services to people who have experienced exploitation and influencing
national policy. In return we can offer you a chance to develop both your technical and leadership
skills. You will play an important role in shaping the support of trafficking survivors in Cambodia. We
have a competitive salary and benefits package, and the opportunity to be part of a committed team.
• Location of work: Phnom Penh
• Hours of work: 40 hours a week.
• Travel requirements: Occasional travel to the provinces with overnight stays (2-3 days per
month). Regular regional travel (1-2 times/year).
• Salary grade: 1350$-1970$ (starting salary range $1350-$1531)
• Additional benefits: 13-month salary, indemnity payments, health allowance & insurance,
meals, self-care allowance and education allowance.

Job purpose and brief
Purpose: To improve the quality of services to trafficking survivors, in Ratanak and nationally, through
analysis and development of internal and national policy. .
Brief: The National Technical Support Project Manager is responsible for understanding and improving
the national frameworks for anti-human trafficking work with a consistent focus on improving the
experience of human trafficking survivors. They will review and compare Ratanak’s work to national
standards and identify both gaps and learning from front-line staff work. This will involve managing
project staff, overseeing all relationships with government partners, and advocating for positive
change.

** Duties
• Manage staff, providing clear leadership, standards and support.
• Ensure clear systems and project activities are in place, understood and followed.
• Gather, review and analyse national policy documents related to Ratanak’s work, and relevant
research and practice from Asia and globally.
• Review project implementation by Ratanak and other partners, assessing quality of
implementation and gaps against policy and best practice.
• Analyse reports to identify patterns of information. Summarise results of analysis into
documented conclusions, with clear recommendations and action steps to address identified
issues.
• Draft policy and procedure documents in collaboration with relevant stakeholders, both
internally and at the national level, ensuring alignment with existing policy and best practice.
• Contribute to technical working groups at department and ministry level to improve
the quality of care for trafficking survivors.
• Develop and improve the procedures and tools for Ratanak and for the department as defined
in annual plans, including supporting database/client management systems implementation.

• Provide clear information for the production of Ratanak reports to International Headquarters
in Canada, other country offices and required Cambodian government offices in line with
agreed standards and timelines.
• Manage the project budget effectively to ensure spending is monitored and on target, making
adjustments at mid-year and alerting relevant staff to any concerns.
• Organize and attend team meetings and briefings with Ratanak as needed to ensure excellent
communication and coordination.
• Attend and make strategic contributions to the Ratanak senior management team, including
developing immediate and long-term plans related to the program.
• Engage in ongoing personal development to ensure a comprehensive knowledge of key issues
related to providing excellent care and reintegration to survivors of exploitation and trafficking.

*** Note: Application Information
If the job description above is a good fit for you and you want to apply, we would be delighted to hear
from you.

Please email your CV and Cover Letter explaining how you meet the requirements to the email
address mentioned in the contact details. Please do not include certificates or other documents at this
time.
We value all applications but will only contact those shortlisted for interview.
This is a re-advertisment. Previous applicants need not apply.
Job Requirement:
Experience and knowledge
Essential:
• Degree and/or post-graduate qualification in social work, psychology or other relevant field.
• At least 3 years experience of working with government agencies.
• At least 3 years experience in program management in a relevant sector
• Knowledge of government formats and protocols
• Fluent in English (equivalent to IELTS Level 6 or above)
• Experience of using MS Office suite of programs to communicate and manage information effectively in a range of contexts.
• At least 2 years of active membership in a church community.
Desired:
• Experience of developing policy at the national level.
• Thorough knowledge of national policies on trafficking and the rights of trafficking survivors
• Experience of developing tools and policies related to victim identification and protection.
Attitudes and skills
• Uses a systematic approach to improve client services
• Promotes diversity
• Addresses conflict and strengthens the team
• Assesses and responds to underlying issues
• Develops learning plans and creates opportunities
• Analyses results to achieve effective achievement of goals
• Writes at a publishable level
• Actively manages own reactions
• Develops team
• Challenges stakeholders for growth
• Influences through multiple actions
• Allocates appropriate resources and ensures quality delivery
• Ensures good stewardship of funds through effective planning and monitoring
• Develops and updates materials for workforce development
• Effectively supports performance improvement
• Follows up development results
Company Profile: Ratanak International is a Christian-based charitable organization which started in 1989 in Cambodia. Ratanak is dedicated to the recovery, development, and support of the most vulnerable in Cambodia.  During the past 22 years, Ratanak has supported many NGO partners related to medical, social, and child exploitation/rehabilitation programs.  Ratanak also is currently setting up its own operational programs including the Ratanak Achievement Program (RAP) which is a community home that will equip and prepare young women who are former victims of sexual exploitation to become more independent and to be reintegrated back into society

Job Description: •	Involve in setting sale target for the team.•	Meet and exceed the set targets•	Check and follow-up sales activities and sale plans.•	Monitors competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, new products, promotion techniques, etc.•	Focuses sales efforts by studying existing and potential volume of customers to increase our share in the market. •	Resolves customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports; marketing recommendation to management.•	Educate sales team by establishing programs/seminars in the areas of new account sales and growth.•	Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow the company’s policies and compliance procedures. •	Perform other duties as assigned from the management team
Job Requirement: •	Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if  at least 3 years’ experience in similar positions•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)•	Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.•	Strong time management and result oriented.•	Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure. •	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities•	Discretion and Dedication

Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Sokha  0182828502 182828502@huione.com #23 ST.2007 PHUM TA NGOUN 1, SANGKAT KAKAB 1, KHAN PORSENCHEY, PHNOM PENH, CAMBODIA#3 0182828502

Job Description:
•	Access current market situation, competitive landscape and trend to identify revenue growth opportunities.
• Design local OBPPC by category, brand, and channel
• Develop PTC guideline to improve investments effectiveness
• Access consumer promotion effectiveness and provide feedback
• Define process & tools to develop RGM.
• People Development: building competencies and strong performance of RGM team.
• Internally, the role has liaison with related stakeholders to drive effectiveness of investment and maximize return.
• Externally, the role requires to connect with BIG network and MEC to provide insights for business, adopt or share best practices when are relevant.
• Lead in collecting internal and external data and analysis to propose RGM plan.
• Access and improve RGM, PTC and promotion analysis by leveraging BIG best practices/tools
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree /master’s degree or related field is required. 
• At least 2-3 years’ experience in related business planning, data management, marketing.
• Results oriented and self-driven.
Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information TALENT ACQUISITION TEAM  010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444 hrd@coca-cola.com.kh No.287, National Road 5, Mittapheap Village, Russey Keo District, Phnom Penh,  Kingdom of Cambodia. 010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444

job title: Sales Supervisor (ចុះលក់តាមខេត្ត )
position: Sales Supervisor (ចុះលក់តាមខេត្ត )
Job Description: •	Involve in setting sale target for the team.•	Meet and exceed the set targets•	Check and follow-up sales activities and sale plans.•	Monitors competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, new products, promotion techniques, etc.•	Focuses sales efforts by studying existing and potential volume of customers to increase our share in the market. •	Resolves customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports; marketing recommendation to management.•	Educate sales team by establishing programs/seminars in the areas of new account sales and growth.•	Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow the company’s policies and compliance procedures. •	Perform other duties as assigned from the management team
Job Requirement: •	Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if  at least 3 years’ experience in similar positions•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)•	Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.•	Strong time management and result oriented.•	Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure. •	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities•	Discretion and Dedication
Company Profile: KONG NUON GROUP is well known for tire’s product through product durability and high brand image. To develop and expend operation in Cambodia, We are seeking dynamic candidate to fill position as
Contact Info: Contact Information Chea Puthdavann HR Manager 081 78 79 80 / 078 888 910 kng.hr@kongnuongroup.com Phnom Penh #220, St 182, Sangkat Phsar Depo I, Khan Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 081 78 79 80 / 078 888 910

job title: Senior Sales Executive 300$-500$ (Others allowance and incentive included)
position: Senior Sales Executive 300$-500$ (Others allowance and incentive included)
Job Description:
1.	Recruiting new potential outlets, pharmacies & relevant potential corporate partners for new deal of placing NB’s products to be sold there
2.	Maintaining, negotiating, overseeing all corporate outlets’ relationships, concerns & others requests
3.	Maintaining accurate records of the total number of sales made, potential and existing outlets
4.	Achieving sales plan target
5.	Analyzing sales metrics to determine whether current sales strategies are effective.
6.	Cultivating solid relationships with major customers to ensure a continuous flow of sales revenue.
7.	Make the regular report daily, weekly and monthly 
8.	Conducting in-depth research on competitors' products, pricing, and market success to gain insight into customer preferences and interests.
9.	Ensuring that all sales administration and customer service activities run smoothly.
10.	Visiting all corporate outlets regularly for products visibility updates
11.	Other tasks assigned by Sales Manager
Job Requirement:
1.	Bachelor's degree in business management or administration, marketing, communications, or related field is preferred.
2.	Good at written and spoken English and Khmer language
3.	Must strong at communication skill, negotiation skill and problem-solving skill
4.	Computer Skill (Microsoft Words, Excel Power Point………….) 
5.	Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines
6.	Proven sales management experience.
7.	At least 1 year experience with FMCG, Trading or Pharmacies field
Contact Info: Contact Information Thim Mengleang  HP or Telegram: 081 51 54 87 mengleang@samrors.com #678, St. 271, Prek Tanou Village, Sangkat Chak Angre Leu, Khan Mean Chey, Phnom Penh. HP or Telegram: 081 51 54 87

job title: STORE SUPERVISOR  (ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងហាង លក់ភីហ្សា) (2pax)
position: STORE SUPERVISOR  (ប្រធានគ្រប់គ្រងហាង លក់ភីហ្សា) (2pax)
Job Description:
•	Responsibilities include, day to operation, training and on-going development of team members
•	Monitors food & beverage services and quality on a regular basis to maintain key quality standards
•	Utilize leadership skills and motivation to maximize employee productivity and satisfaction
•	Selects and develops strategies to improve guest service, productivity and efficiency
•	Identifies training needs and ensures staff receives training, including daily skills training to provide consistent, knowledgeable, and reliable service
•	Proficient in Duty Management Shifts 
•	Understand and able to manage the operation procedure including the front line service and able to assist the F&B Manager
•	Marketing and other promotion
•	Selects and develops strategies to improve guest service, productivity and efficiency.
Job Requirement:
•	Good command of spoken and written in English
•	Excellent computer skills and proficient in Ms. Office, outlook and Internet Email, POS system
•	Proven records of knowledge in the areas of food hygiene, food handling and other 
F&B related health and safety requirements
•	Experience of leading and motivating a team
•	Ability to handle the multiple tasks and reach the tight time frame
•	Excellent planning, control skills, problem solving skills and interpersonal skills 
•	Able to work under pressure and long hours when required.

** Benefit:
•	Salary: (Negotiation)
•	Working hour: (7:00AM – 16:00PM) OR (01:00PM – 22:00PM)
•	Food Allowance: 20$ 
•	Annual leave and medical leave and Forte Insurance 24h/24h 
•	Other benefit
Company Profile: With the vision of offering high quality F&B standard and enhancing lifestyle to the Cambodia market, Star Food Enterprise was established since 2015. Being the first and leading company to introduce the market with Big Apple Donuts & Coffee, we continue to grow with new concepts in 2019 by introducing Pezzo Pizza: Pizza by the slice. We still are one of the pioneers in F&B industry and expanding further.

Job Description:
•	Access current market situation, competitive landscape and trend to identify revenue growth opportunities.
• Design local OBPPC by category, brand, and channel
• Develop PTC guideline to improve investments effectiveness
• Access consumer promotion effectiveness and provide feedback
• Define process & tools to develop RGM.
• People Development: building competencies and strong performance of RGM team.
• Internally, the role has liaison with related stakeholders to drive effectiveness of investment and maximize return.
• Externally, the role requires to connect with BIG network and MEC to provide insights for business, adopt or share best practices when are relevant.
• Lead in collecting internal and external data and analysis to propose RGM plan.
• Access and improve RGM, PTC and promotion analysis by leveraging BIG best practices/tools
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree /master’s degree or related field is required. 
• At least 2-3 years’ experience in related business planning, data management, marketing.
• Results oriented and self-driven.
Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information TALENT ACQUISITION TEAM  010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444 hrd@coca-cola.com.kh No.287, National Road 5, Mittapheap Village, Russey Keo District, Phnom Penh,  Kingdom of Cambodia. 010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444

Job Description:
- Work with external vendors to execute promotional events and campaigns
- Collaborate with various departments within the company to coordinate brand awareness and marketing efforts
- Ensure brand consistency across the company’s channels
- Manage and ensure the completion of staff employment documents;
- Facilitate and coordinate effective on boarding process;
- Contribute into development of differentiation strategy for the company
- Assist in analyzing marketing data: campaign results, conversion rates, traffic etc., to help shape future marketing strategies
- Perform other tasks assigned by management team
Job Requirement:
- University degree in marketing, advertisement, communication or equivalent professional qualifications
- Minimum 03-year experience
- Proven experience of marketing or branding specialist or similar role
- Thorough understanding of marketing elements, both traditional and digital marketing, and market research methods
- Demonstrate experience in marketing data analytics and tools
- Commercial awareness partnered with a creative mind
- Good computer literacy, Proficiency in Microsoft suite, possess presentation skills
- Well-organized and detail oriented
- Excellent command of Khmer and English, both communication and writing
- Portfolio of brand-building projects is a plus

***Working Days and Hours
▪ Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
▪ Saturday: 8:00AM to 12:00AM
▪ Lunch Time: 12:00AM to 1: 00 PM

** Salary and Benefits
▪ Salary 350$ - 400$
▪ Annual Salary Increment
▪ Annual Trip
▪ Internal and External Training
▪ Annual leave (18days)
▪ Special leave (5days)
▪ Insurance or NSSF
▪ And Other Benefits base on Company Policy

Job Description:
•	Handle Account receivables, Sales,Tax processing, petty cash and cash flow
•	Ensure timely and accurate monthly and year-end closing and reporting
•	Managing the day-to-day operation of the accounts payable/receivable functions and expenses analysis and managing payment processing matters
•	Perform journal entries and reconciliations for accounts closing
•	Inventory auditing once a month
•	Liaise with banks and participate in audit procedures
•	Other adhoc duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
•	Candidate must possess at least a Diploma/degree in Accountancy
•	At least 1 years of working experience in related field
•	Proficient in MS office applications, (Excel and Quickbook)
•	Independent, mature with excellent communication and teamwork
•	Meticulous with an aptitude for figures and able to multi-task effectively
•	Strong Problem-solving skills

** Benefit:
•	Salary: 180$-250$
•	Working hour: 8.00AM – 5.30PM (Monday to Saturday half)
•	Annual leave and medical leave and Forte Insurance 24h/24h
•	Other benefit

Job Description:
* Job Responsibilities
• To handle day to day human resource management with his team to meet human resource current and future plan

* Duties:
Human Resource
• Human resource planning
To base on current and future factory needs to shape the recruitment, selection, performance management, learning and development, and all other HR functions.

• Recruitment and selection
- To involve in HAC management branding recruitment strategies to attract people to work for selecting the best candidates
- To support HR Executive to manage Unit Head approved manpower request, post job advertisement and organizing resumes and job applications
- To organize new applicant assessment test on skill, reading alphabet & numeric, eye sight & color blind 
Prepare new employee files (employment contracts and age proof documents etc  as stated in Human Capital guide) and apply for Bank account, Wing account and enroll to NSSF
- Arrange with IT to pre-set up email, zoom etc address, and work application in laptop or desktop computer as require.
- To provide an efficient and high-touch experience for every candidate from application stage to offer, evaluating skill level, driving the interview process and offer process, including reference checks, salary recommendations and closing of candidates.

• Performance management
- To base on company’s performance management system which involves good leadership, clear goal-setting, and open feedback to assess employee performance to make them stay productive and engaged.
- To evaluate employee’s performance, taking corrective action when necessary.

• Learning and development
- To support HAC Executive to enable employees to develop the skills they need for the future, bridging the gap between the workforce today and the workforce needed in the near future.

• Career planning
- To support HAC Executive to do career planning, guidance, and development for employees, aligning their ambition with the future of the company, helps to engage and  retain them and  company benefits of better succession planning, higher productivity, and a stronger employer brand.

• Function evaluation
To support HAC Executive to conduct technical function evaluation on employee qualification, the  quality, and availability of workers, job location, working times, the  economic situation, job responsibility, and  job value.

• Health and safety
- To implement health and safety regulations to meet or above compliance standards.

• HR Administrative responsibilities
- To understand government laws, employment act and Human resources capital guide and implement in effective way as required by buyer’s Code of Conduct and Labor Law.
- To manage daily attendance and work with payroll to handle employee legal wages, benefits, pay & allowances, government contribution etc  as mentioned in labor law/ organization’s human capital guide. 

• Compensation & Benefits (Salary)
- To support HAC Executive to articulates offers from time to time to attract the best talent in the industry, to retain the existing talent in the company.

• Other duties as required and that may occasionally be necessary to support the business.
Job Requirement:
• At least 3 years experiences in Human Resources or Administration or Compliance experience	
• To have sound knowledge on process & procedures of certification
• To experience in handling health & safety issues covering fire safety, electrical safety & building safety.
• Exceptional employee service skills/focus and the ability to handle sensitive matters with tact and diplomacy
• Exercise independent judgment and discretion while utilizing company policies and practices to determine appropriate action
• Exceptional leadership and time, task, and resource management skills.
• Strong problem solving, critical thinking, coaching, interpersonal, and verbal and written communication skills and Chinese (Mandarin) is advantage
• Proficiency with computers, especially MS Office.
• Willingness to continue building skills through education opportunities.
• Ability to work independently being remotely managed, self-starter and fast learner requiring minimal direction on a day to day basis.
• Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
• Hands on position, you will roll up your sleeves every day in the team
Company Profile: A new bag factory, Established in 2023

Job Description:
* Job Responsibilities 
•	To assist accountant to manage AP & payroll payment, Asset & petty cash control and data accurately into ERP Accounting system.

* Job Duties 
•	Checking and Updating Accounting Entries in Accounting System
•	GL Entries and Updating in Accounting System
•	Payment Processing and Payment Voucher Arrangement
•	Checking on Internal E-Billing between Entities
•	Misc. Payment and Petty Cash Payment
•	Monthly Tax Return Checking and Submission
•	Month End Closing JV, Accruals and Prepayment Schedule, Items to be Reinvoiced Account Updating
•	Maintaining of Fixed Assets Register
•	AP Aging and Statement Reconciliation
•	Bank Reconciliation Statement
•	Other duties as required and that may occasionally be necessary to support the business.
Job Requirement:
•	At least 3 years experiences of relevant experiences
•	Bachelor Degree in accounting or equivalent
•	Thorough knowledge of accounting procedures
•	Experience with accounting software
•	Excellent analytical skills with an attention to detail
•	Integrity, with an ability to handle confidential information
•	Excellent accounting software user
•	Strong attention to detail and confidentiality
•	Self-motivation and Responsibility
•	Organizational skills and ability to manage deadlines
•	Team Player
•	Analytical ability
•	A methodical approach and problem-solving skills
•	Advanced MS Excel skills
•	Excellent analytical and numerical skills
•	Sharp time management skills
•	Strong ethics, with an ability to manage confidential data

Job Description:
•	Involve in setting sale target for the team.
•	Meet and exceed the set targets
•	Check and follow-up sales activities and sale plans.
•	Monitors competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, new products, promotion techniques, etc.
•	Focuses sales efforts by studying existing and potential volume of customers to increase our share in the market. 
•	Resolves customer complaints by investigating problems; developing solutions; preparing reports; marketing recommendation to management.
•	Educate sales team by establishing programs/seminars in the areas of new account sales and growth.
•	Manage the quality customer portfolio, maintain accurate records, and always follow the company’s policies and compliance procedures. 
•	Perform other duties as assigned from the management team
Job Requirement:
•	Minimum Bachelor degree or lower degree accepted if  at least 3 years’ experience in similar positions
•	Computer literacy and English language proficiency (Chinese language is a plus)
•	Good knowledge of communication skill and customer focus.
•	Strong time management and result oriented.
•	Outgoing personality, confidence, hard working with positive attitude and ability to work under pressure. 
•	Desire to go extra and beyond responsibilities
•	Discretion and Dedication
